choices: One of your school buddies join you.
1.content:
"Hey, Hiroki! Wake up, or you are going to be late for school!"

The loud voice of your sister waking you up shattered your "sweet dreams", and you slowly crawled out of bed. You still wished you could go back to sleep, but you knew you could not. High school had came by so quickly, and now you are in the second year.

"Uhhh ... morning, Reiko ... " you groaned, still a little sleepy.

"Hurry up and get changed! You will be late!"

With that, Reiko left your room and went to prepare breakfast. You finally got out of bed, and started getting changed. As you changed into your school uniform, you can't help but think about your past. Though you were a bright student and your looks aren't too bad, somehow girls shunned you. This may be due to your interests, including watching anime and collecting manga volumes, not to mention the huge figurine collection on your shelf. Your good friend once told you that high school is the best time to score a date, and that if you did not, you are destined to stay single forever. The thought of you growing old and no women in your life was a scary thought lingering inside your head, one that you wish will stop by the end of high school.

"Hiroki! Breakfast is ready!"

You quickly rushed down to the kitchen, eager to taste Reiko's cooking. You and your sister live together in this small two-storey house in western Tokyo. Your parents, though alive, are seldom home due to work. Your father's a manga artist, and your mother a fashion designer who often flies between cities. Perhaps because of this background, Reiko had matured relatively quickly and even takes care of you despite being 3 years younger. As you two sat down for breakfast, Reiko could not help but notice that you had a new uniform type.

"Hey! You got a new uniform, it seems!"

"Yeah! My old school got merged with 3 others in some M & A (Mergers and Acquisions) scheme, so from today, I'll be attending school at the new school building down the street."

"You mean that old girls' school which was renovated recently?"

"Yes, that one. I wonder what was the school board planning?"

"I hear Yuriko will be in the same class as you. Are you going to make your move?"

You spilled coffee at hearing Reiko's comment. Although Yuriko was your childhood friend and was beginning to mature in age and in her figure, you did not think that you might end up with her some day.

"REIKO! That's not funny!"

"Oops! Sorry, my bad! Here is a tissue. (You took it and wiped the coffee off your face) Still, I can tell you are not that popular with girls. You sure Yuriko is not the one for you?"

"No, probably not. Besides, it also looks like she's already dating."

"Oh, too bad. Well, hurry up, or you are going to be late!"

Your breakfast went by uneventful, and after cleaning up, you and Reiko went your seperate ways to your different schools. As you walked to school ...
1.title: First Day of School

11.content:
"Hiroki! Behind you!"

You had a look behind and saw your childhood friend, Yuriko. She had changed quite a lot, cutting her hair short and sporting a cute hairband in addition to her already bright eyes and cute face. Though her uniform somewhat breaks the outline of her figure, she still looks pretty good in it.

"Y ... you look very pretty today."

"Aw, shucks, Hiroki.You flatter me."

The two of you took a slow stroll as you headed to school, chatting along the way.

"Tell me, Hiroki. Are you looking forward to studying in this new school? I mean, suddenly bought over and merging schools. What was the board planning?"

"Beats me. I just want to be done with high school, so I don't really care."

"OK, enough about school. How are your parents doing?"

"Same as always, rarely home. Their careers are flying, so they are not quitting anytime. Looks like it's going to be me and Reiko at home for a while."

Yuriko giggles slightly.

"OK, if you two need help, I can always drop over."

She then handed you a packed lunch wrapped in a piece of cloth.

"Don't forget to take care of yourself. OK, Hiroki? Promise me!"

Yuriko then left, waving to you as she left. You just stood there, still holding Yuriko's packed lunch. She was a kind and gentle person, not to mention caring, but you still wondered if she was the right person for you.

As you entered school, you ...
11.title: With Yuriko

112.content:
The former girls' school compound was familiar to you as your mother was a former student there, and after the school was abandoned a few years back, you and Reiko had often entered the building (usually ending up being scolded by 1 of your parents) to check it out. You looked around the place, as there is still plenty of time, and everything familiar with this place is gone. All the walls have been rebuilt, water and power supply had been restored, and the compound is also expanded to accomodate more students.

You would love to bring Reiko here to have a look, but the odds of the two of you studying together is impossible. Even if Reiko did enrol as per normal, you would have graduated. The consulation prize, however, is that Yuriko is also studying here, and from the looks of it, more girls have enrolled in this school, meaning you have a better chance at getting a date.

Putting the thoughts aside, you decide to continue exploring. Where did you go?
112.title: Explore The School Compound

1123.content:
You decide to go somewhere further, and peered outside a window to have a look. Curiously, a block of the old school had not been touched, so you decided to head to the old school building to have a look.

To your surprise, despite the outside relatively untouched, the inside of the old school building is just as new as the new school buildings. Interestingly, some of the rooms appear to be occupied, and there are people inside. Curiously, you went forward to have a look.

After walking around for a while, it appears that there are 3 rooms that are operating. There is the "Technology Club" room, a room with a "Join Us" label, and an unlabelled room, yet you can hear sounds coming from behind. Which to go first?
1123.title: Old School Building

11231.content:
Curiously, when you entered the room labelled "Technology Club", nobody is inside despite hearing voices and the lights on. Looking around the room, there seems to be no activity and even though the gadgets on the work desks are tempting you to touch, it still does not answer your question.

Your eyes caught attention to a strange object on a seperate workdesk. It looks like one of Reiko's digital alarm clocks, except without the timer display, only a label with the words "SHRINK DEVICE" on it. You saw two buttons on it, one red and one blue. Curiously, you pressed the red button.

ZZAP!

Your body felt a huge jolt of electricity flowing through it, causing you pain and giving you a bad hair day. Next thing you knew, as you felt the electrical shock throughout your body, the workdesk above you felt like it was growing. It went by for 5 seconds, and the electric shock subsided. You don't feel any pain, but you look around, and got a shock of your life. You had shrunk! The so-called "SHRINK DEVICE" really works!

From the device, you know that the red one shrinks the person while the blue one reverses the effect. However, you have bigger problems, literally. The shrink device is still on its workbench, high up above your head. Making matters worse, you heard footsteps from behind the door. A few voices mingled with the sound of the rumbling footsteps, and you know those are female voices. You panicked, and rushed towards the workbench, but is it too late?
11231.title: Curiosity Shrank The Cat

112311.content:
You managed to reach the workdesk without panting or stopping, but climbing up one of the workdesk legs to reach the device still poses a problem. Making matters worse, you heard the door swing open, followed by the sound of huge stomping feet. It was a student, as shown by her uniform,namely her loafers as seen from your perspective.

She walked towards the workdesk with the shrink device, blocking you access to light in the process. You had not yet began climbing the leg, and yet you know something bad's going to happen.

"I'd better take this. The Chairman's probably getting impatient too."

She took the shrinking device in her hands, and walked out. You saw her holding the shiny device in her hands, and cursed yourself. You had touched the device without permission, resulting in you being shrunk, but the device taken away from was a clear slap in the face for you. You cannot revert back to normal, at least for now.

It did not say whether there is a time limit for your shrinking, but until then, you are stuck at your size. If you are patient, you can continue exploring the school in this state. Otherwise, you can chase after the shrink device, namely the girl holding it.
112311.title: So Close, So Far

1123112.content:
You decided to go after that girl and the shrink device she took. As she exited the room, you chased in hot pursuit, keeping a distance from her feet to avoid being squashed. The sound of her footsteps crashing onto the pavement also helped masked your advances towards her.

She leaves the door, still holding onto the device, and closed it shut, with you managing to slip out at the last moment. She kept walking forward, but by now, you could not follow her physically now, and you started panting like mad. All you could see is the girl continously walking forward and disappearing into the distance.

You know the shrink device is beyond you now, but you heard rumbling noises approaching your position fast. You turn around, and you see three girls, all normal-sized, jogging in physical education attire, and their feet are approaching you! Did you avoid them in time?
1123112.title: Out In The Open

11231121.content:
If you had stayed there back then, you would have been crushed much faster than any bullet train can travel. Luckily, though you were in the way of the joggers, you managed to slip by their rampaging feet in time before you could get crushed. Like the girl before you, the joggers also ran away into the distance, leaving you behind.

Your thought now is that the girl could go to only one place now: the main school building. As shown by the joggers, classes probably had already begun, so she might have taken the shrink device to class. The main issue right now is where to find her.

You made your way to the school, avoiding encounters with the students' feet, and crawled in through a small hole behind the school. The hole was dark, but it was large enough for you to slip in. There was light at the other end of the hole tunnel, and as you crawled out, you find yourself inside a ...
11231121.title: Next Stop, Your School

112311212.content:
You entered one of the school science labs, and from the looks of it, there is activity as the lights are on and you hear something from a corner of the lab. Sounds of girls speaking, but even though their voices won't pierce your ears at your current position, it's still too hard to make out what they're saying.

You got a little bit closer, and to your surprise, you see three girls around a single workdesk. Their full standing heights feels like looking up at 6 very tall pillars that are their legs. You heard their voices as they continued talking despite the loud sounds above you that is their voices.

You continued eavesdropping at the three girls, and to your surprise, you hear your nemesis' voice among them. Shizuka Kinugawa, the two-faced social butterfly, is meeting in secret with two other girls, one of them is the same person who took the shrink device back at the Technology Club. You could try and get yourself back to normal, but you risk being spotted and ridiculed by Shizuka and her friends. Then again, they could take the shrink device away, and you have to make another long walk before you get close to the machine again. What would you do?
112311212.title: Secret Meeting

1123112122.content:
You decided against going for the device, as one tiny man will not stand a chance against 3 normal-sized teenage schoolgirls. As you played the "patient hunter" game against Shizuka and her friends, you got word of their shocking plan.

"With this device, we can grow or shrink anything we like. Think of the possibilities, ladies!" That was Shizuka's voice all right. It appears she also had a hand with developing the shrinking device.

"We could shrink all the boys in school and turn them into our pets. That would be nice." The second voice boomed. You identified her as Madoka Yamaguchi, a former student in your old school and literally lives in Shizuka's shadow all her life.

"I don't know. You sure we should be doing this, Shizuka?" The third person is a former classmate and often the "misfit" of Shizuka's group, Mikako Nagama. She has a soft spot for you, but sticks to Shizuka for some reason.

"Dream all you want, ladies, but the Chairman wants the device too. We've all agreed to let the Chairman use it first, so until then, nobody can touch it."

However, when Shizuka examined the device even closer, she then stomped her foot so hard, your earth shook as her foot landed inches away from you. She is clearly furious at something.

"Someone had used the device, someone aside from us! From the looks of it, the culprit had hit the shrink button, so we can expect him or her to be really tiny. If you find a tiny person walking around, catch him and do whatever you want to him. No one must know about this, NO ONE!"

You wanted to run away, but your legs are now too frozen to even move. As the three women spread out and searched for their target, namely you, you saw that each went their different directions. It could be an advantage, as you can slip away while they searched for you. Then again, being exposed will certainly get you caught. Your call.
1123112122.title: Revelations

choices: They Have Given Up Chasing You
11231121221.content:
It looks like you are the only one here who knows of the Technology Club's secret plot, and now it is up to you to stop them. But to stop them, you have to get away from here. You know you aren't the best runner (you are the worst, in fact), but it seems you are the only one to stop them.

As Mikako walked away from your position, you saw your chance, and bolted for the door. As you ran, you didn't care if your legs feel tired; you have to leave the science lab. For the first time in your life, you have to run to save yourself.

Unfortunately, Shizuka spotted you midway through your mad dash, and sounded the alarm.

"HE'S HERE! GET HIM!!!"

Shizuka's pounding footsteps are heading towards you with loud thunderous steps. Not looking back, you dashed through the science lab and reached the door, but the three girls are now closing in. There is only one place for you to go: under the door. Using your size advantage, you rolled yourself through the door before Shizuka's hand can grab you.

You were out of the science lab, and into the corridor. Even though your legs are aching and you are almost out of breath, you still kept running away. You turn back and had a look, and you see that ...
11231121221.title: The Chase Is On

112311212211.content:
"YOU'RE NOT GETTING AWAY, TOAD!"

Shizuka threw the door open with such force, and promptly gave chase. You kept running down the corridor, despite your whole body giving out signals telling you to stop. You don't want to be caught by Shizuka, not especially after you learnt of her mad plan. Pushing your body to the limits, you didn't stop running.

Shizuka gave chase, and distance is not a problem to her as compared to you as she is normal sized. A few short strides, and you can hear the sound of her footsteps approaching fast. Looking back again, her huge loafers seemed bigger and bigger as she closed in on you.

You were reaching your limits, and you had to stop. Looking around, you notice a small hole where you can crawl in and Shizuka's hand can't reach in. Using whatever strength you have left, you made one last dash to the hole, but did you make it?
112311212211.title: Hot Pursuit

1123112122111.content:
You bolted into the hole, and managed to get inside it. As you looked back at the entrance, all you see is Shizuka's huge hand slamming at the other side. As the hand moved away, all you saw next was Shizuka's huge eye looking into the hole. Her eye felt like a eyeball monster looking at you, and you never looked back.

Shizuka gave an angry grunt, and then left. As her loud footsteps got softer, you took a peek outside at the corridor, and to your relief, you saw Shizuka's huge figure walking away. You look the other way, and to your relief, you didn't see Madoka or Mikako anywhere. It looks like only Shizuka came out after you.

You were safe, but you were VERY exhausted from all the running. The distance from your starting point at the science lab all the way to the hole was not very far for a normal-sized person, but what you went through made you feel like you are a soldier doing physical training for the very first time.

"I really need to work out some time, or come up with better running shoes." You said to yourself.

As you caught your breath, you felt like you could inhale more air than usual, and even though your legs hurt, you felt good. Whether it was from your running or you outsmarted Shizuka, it felt really good. Now, you had rested up, do you want to explore the hole or do you want to leave?
1123112122111.title: Safe Haven

11231121221111.content:
You saw that the hole actually extended as far as it could go, so you decided to explore the place in detail. Even though it was dark and you had no light with you, it was still better than going out and getting caught. As you walked deeper into the darkness, you saw a strange light. You decided to go towards it, even though you don't know what's in store for you.

To your surprise, you find people behind the other side of the light, and they are people your size. Strangely, all of them wore the same uniform as yourself. They are obviously students of the school, and it is obvious you are not the only victim of Shizuka and her mad plan.

"Hiroki! Is that you?" A familiar voice came out. You look around, and to your surprise, it was Daisuke, at your size.

"Daisuke! How on earth ... "

"I had no idea either. One moment I was minding my own business, and suddenly I was shrunk down to this ridiculous size. Luckily I had help from these guys. Otherwise, I would have been crushed to death."

"These guys?"

"The former members of the Technology Club at our school. Namely the male members."

"Well, if it isn't Hiroki Iketani, one of the smartest students in our ex-class."

The two of you turn around, and you recognize the voice and face. He was the so-called "Emperor of the Geeks" back at your old school, Tetsuya Takahashi. You and Tetsuya were friends, but not as close as Daisuke or Yuriko.

"You too? Let me guess, Shizuka did this to you!"

"Yes, she and the new Chairman of the Technology Club did all this. As you can see, we are all victims. I built this base underneath one of the classrooms as a sort of relief for us. Shizuka and the new Chairman will pay for ruining my beloved club."

"Who is this Chairman anyway? I have heard them saying that, but no names come to mind."

"Oh, it's ... "

Before you guys can continue chatting, you heard rumbling sounds, but as you looked around, everything is intact, though the other guys are running about like mad. It was only after you see some soil crumbling down on your shoulders did you look up, and surely, there is a faint light coming from above.

"Oh no! They found me! We have to get out of here!" Tetsuya exclaimed.

The light above you got brighter, and then it is revealed. The ceiling is actually a tile inside one of the classrooms, and sure enough, the view from the open "window" shows a classroom alright. As more tiles are removed, it revealed ...
11231121221111.title: The Secret Base

112311212211111.content:
It was Shizuka's gigantic face looking down at you guys! It seems like she now knows about Tetsuya's secret base, and she's here to destroy them!

"HI TETSUYA! MISSED ME?"

Shizuka then got up to her full height, and lifted her right foot. She hovered it above the base, ready for the kill.

"Tetsuya! Watch out!"

You leaped forward and pushed Tetsuya away before Shizuka's foot crashed into the hole. Her foot alone occuiped much of the hole that is Tetsuya's secret base, indicating the sheer size difference. As she removed her foot from the hole, it looks like she is about to strike again.

"This way!"

Tetsuya signalled you and Daisuke to follow him, and the three of you crawled inside a secret foxhole that Tetsuya had uncovered. The three of you managed to crawl into the hole before Shizuka's foot slammed right down again.

"WELL, THAT TAKES CARE OF THAT!"

Shizuka then proceeded to retile the classroom floor back together. As she did so, Tetsuya and his band of followers made their way through the dark tunnel, their secret passage. After a while, you guys managed to find yourselves at the other end of the school building. Luckily for you guys, no one seems to be around at this time.

"I can't believe Shizuka still found me! I had always covered my tracks!"

"No use complaining now, Tetsuya. You have to make a new base elsewhere."

"I guess you're right. There's no point crying over spilled milk. I'll need time before I can get another base up and running. This is where we part ways, Hiroki. I believe only you can stop the Technology Club's mad plan."

"Hey, how come I have to do it?"

"Let's just say you have your powers, and I have my own. I'll also try to find a way to reverse the shrinking. Godspeed, Hiroki!"

You bid goodbye to Tetsuya and his band of geeks, Dsiauke included. You were alone again, and even though Tetsuya was not of much help, it seems he was right. It is up to you now. You can head back to the Technology Club, or explore the school to find some clues.
112311212211111.title: Escape! Escape!

1123112122111112.content:
Going back to the Technology Club is absolute suicide, so your best bet is to explore the school for clues. You walked around the huge school yard, but it looks like there's trouble. Both Madoka and Mikako are at the yard, trying to look for you. In addition, it looks like it's the first break at school, so a lot of students are hanging around the yard, and the chances of you being stepped on is too real.

Meanwhile, Yuriko have had a weird day. Even after saying goodbye to you and going for classes, everything still felt strange. The male students all seem to disappear into nowhere when you talk to them, and above all, a few students from class 2-C, namely Hiroki and Shizuka, did not attend classes the whole time. She was worried for you, especially if anything somehow happen to you, she was going to have a hard time explaining it to your sister.

As if by chance, Yuriko had lost a piece of her favorite charm bracelet a few years back, when the abandoned school building was still standing. It had always disturbed her that she is missing a piece in her charm bracelet. As the piece is really small, she had brought a magnifying glass to help in her search. She remembered that she dropped in the school yard, and luckily, no real changes have been made to the yard. The challenge is finding it in such a huge place.

Looking and avoiding the students walking around the school yard, you tripped onto something, and fell flat on the floor. You had no idea what tripped you, but whatever it was, it was too big to be a small rock. You turned back, and to your surprise, you had found Yuriko's missing piece of her charm bracelet! It wasn't too big for you, but it felt like the side of a basketball to you.

As if by coincidence, you saw the huge figure of Yuriko walking and looking around on the school yard. You tried waving your free arm, but Yuriko still didn't see you. It looks like the piece is your only solution out of this, so you raised it high up in the air, hoping it will get Yuriko's attention. Yuriko spotted something, and is heading towards you. As her thundering footsteps get closer, you wonder if it's a bad idea to do this. Did she see you?
1123112122111112.title: Getting Spotted

11231121221111121.content:
Yuriko saw something move around, and she went to have a look. Unfortunately, whatever it was, it was too small for the naked eye to see. Imagine her surprise when she pulled out her magnifying glass and had a look at whatever it was. She saw you, holding her charm up high above your arms, calling out to her, but the voice barely audible.

As she crouched down to have a closer look, you could see her pinkish-white panties underneath her skirt. Though it was a pleasant sight, you decided to focus on getting Yuriko's full undivided attention.

"HIROKI-KUN! WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU? HOW DID YOU GET THIS SMALL?"

Even her softest voice felt like the wind's shouting at you. On your part, your voice is too inaudible for her ears. All you could do now is signal to her to pick you up and get you off the ground before you get stepped on. Although Yuriko didn't get your gestures, she still wanted to get you to safety, and reclaim her charm bracelet.

"OK, I understand!" She can't hear herself whispering, but to you, you recognize the melodious voice anytime. You nodded, and when Yuriko got her hand out, you leaped on. As she got up to her full height, you can't help but feel a little sorry for Tetsuya and his band of geeks and how small they are to normal human standards.

Yuriko then realized she could not always hold you in her hand, so she promptly slipped you into her breast pocket, thinking you would be safe. You had no complaints about being stuffed in her pocket, especially when you can see the bulge that is her nipple sticking out above you, though you wished she had told you sooner. With her bracelet piece and her shrunken friend recovered, Yuriko then went back into the school building.
11231121221111121.title: You Found Me!

112311212211111211.content:
Break time was almost over, so Yuriko headed back to class, with you still in her breast pocket. As compared from being chased by gigantic feet, being carried around by a giantess seemed to be a better option. The pocket was quite empty, aside from the bracelet piece, and all you see inside was dark blue, the same color as the uniform. Still, it was the best place for a shrunken person to be in.

Meanwhile, classes had already started back at class 2-C, with the teacher a bit puzzled at the number of students present. Many of them, especially the male students, are all missing in action. Shizuka was also nowhere to be found. Luckily for you, Yuriko came up with an excuse for you, saying that you fell ill and had to go home immediately. You were safe, for now.

The rest of the day went by eventless, and the both of you started counting down till school's out. You got the better end of the stick, as you could get some sleep after running around the schoolyard all day, whereas Yuriko had to pay attention in class or risk getting detention. Inside the pocket, you fell asleep, exhausted and giving in to the warm afternoon weather. Yuriko had a glance inside the pocket, and found you asleep. Though she can't hear you snoring, she still smiled, knowing that you are OK.

You woke up after having a good sleep, and decided to crawl out and have a look at where you are. Surprisingly, you were able to sleep all the way till school's over, as you saw Yuriko walking down the familiar alley where you two first met this morning. Yuriko saw you crawling out of her pocket, but said nothing. She walked on for a while before stopping in front of a house. You had a look, and you recognize it. The kanji on the door label read ...
112311212211111211.title: In The Pocket

1123112122111112111.content:
It was your own house that Yuriko had stopped at, possibly to drop you off before she went home. She knocked on the door, and after a while, your sister opened it. She had shorter school hours, and arrived home sooner. She was wearing a sleeveless top and short shorts. Your sister was still experiencing puberty, but you had joked that she had yet to "produce" any results, usually resulting to being smacked on your cheek.

"Yuriko-san! What are you doing here? Where's my brother?"

"Uh, Reiko-chan. There's something I have to tell you." She pointed at her breast pocket, and you crawled out, waving at Reiko. Reiko had to come really close before she saw you inside Yuriko's pocket.

After a while, after all of you were settled down at the living room, you told them your tale, though it was hard as your voice was barely audible to Reiko's ears (she had good hearing since young). Reiko narrated your tale to Yuriko, who was jotting down notes about your encounter. Even after telling your tale to the two giant women, they still wanted to have a good look at you. You were perfectly normal, except much smaller, so small that Yuriko needed a magnifying glass to see you.

"I still find it unbelieveable, Yuriko-san. You mean my brother was shrunk by the Technology Club at your school, and that he was just one of the victims. His nemesis was also the perpetrator of this whole thing."

"Believe it, Reiko-chan. Luckily I had my magnifying glass with me, or I would be here delivering his dead body. I always knew Shizuka was a little nutty somewhere, but I never thought she would go this far. We will find somthing to reverse the effect."

"In the meantime, all this talk had made me thirsty. You want some tea?"

"OK, sure. I'll go buy some tea leaves. Can I bring Hiroki with me?"

Reiko said ...
1123112122111112111.title: At Home With The Iketanis

11231121221111121111.content:
"OK! Just take good care of my brother, OK?"

"I will. Back in my pocket, little one!"

Yuriko picked you up in her palm, and then dropped you back inside the familiar dark blueness that is her breast pocket. By this time, you had gotten used to being treated like a small toy, so you didn't mind. Yuriko then left your house to the convinence store nearby to get some tea leaves.

"Say, Yuriko. Why did you insist on bringing me anyway?"

"I just liked having you inside my pocket." Yuriko smiled at you, a mesmerizing sight for you from inside her pocket. All is forgiven when she shows her sweet look that had not changed over the years. "Besides, I need to know what brand of tea do you guys enjoy anyway."

"OK. I'll help."

The shopping trip went by without anything happening, and you chose the familiar brand that you and Reiko had always enjoyed. Yuriko then headed back to your house and handed the tea leaves to Reiko, who then started brewing the tea. Yuriko, meanwhile, went back to your living room and started doing her homework, with you giving her help.

It was about 30 minutes when you heard Reiko's voice again.

"OK, Yuriko-san! The tea's ready!"

"Hang on! I'm coming!"

Yuriko then headed to the kitchen to take a whiff at the freshly-brewed tea. Reiko always had talent at doing domestic work, and a member of the tea club at her school, which she was a natural as described by her teacher. Yuriko bent down and took a sniff.

"Mmmm ... That smells good! I can't wait to have a sip."

You crawled out of the pocket as Yuriko bent down to have a whiff at the tea. You too smelled the aroma coming from the tea. She's really a natural, you thought to yourself. However, as Yuriko bent down, she inadvertly tipped you out of her pocket, and you fell into one of the tea cups. Yuriko then carried the tray containing the tea cups, not knowing that her "passenger" is no longer in her breast pocket.

Inside the tea cup was not too hot, like you having a soak inside hot water like those in the sento (Japanese public bath), though the color didn't feel right for soaking. The smell from the muddy brown water helped relaxed your nerves, so you decide to just lay down and enjoy it, until you see a huge face hovering above the tea cup. It was ...
11231121221111121111.title: Let's Make Some Tea

112311212211111211111.content:
"NO! REIKO! DON'T DRINK THE TEA YET! I'M STILL IN HERE!"

Inside ...
112311212211111211112122212212211.title: The "Reunion"

1123112122111112111121222122122111.content:
The five of you then entered the large office, and what a looker of a room it is. It has a ruby red carpet on the floor, multiple doors that might lead to other rooms, but the main attention was at the end of the room, where a young schoolgirl wearing your school uniform seated on an ornamental chair, probably symbolizing power, being flanked by two other schoolgirls. One of them is Shizuka herself, standing on the right.

"Hiroki Iketani! I never thought I would see you here! I should have crushed you back there!"

"Be patient, Shizuka!" The seated girl finally spoke. "Hiroki Iketani, it is an honor to meet you. I am Hanako Mizuki, Chairwoman of the Technology Club. I have always heard a lot about you from Shizuka, though I have my doubts after seeing you. You seem quite decent to me."

"Uh ... thanks ... Chairwoman Mizuki ..."

"I guess an explanation to whatever is going on is in order. My apologies for your unfortunate shrinking adventure, but it was all part of the 'Master Plan'. Hope you don't mind."

"I've heard about this Master Plan from Mikako and the Yamamoto brothers there. Could you at least tell us what exactly are you planning?"

"Since you already know so much ... very well. The Master Plan involves the resizing device you had used. We plan to use it to shrink the world's population down to a more ... managable size."

"WHAT! I won't allow it!"

"If you will listen, Iketani-san. As you can see, the world is always fighting over scarce resources, land, food, ... you name it, wars have always been fought over. Why not look at our country itself: our country is mountainous, with very little plains and natural resources. Our country cannot expand under these constrains, and history had shown us that we were wrong once. If the human population was smaller in size, there would be more land to spare, and more room to grow our own food. If people were smaller, we won't occupy too much space on this planet, and with so much land available, no one would be fighting over territory anymore. Everyone benefits."

Chairwoman Mizuki had got you there, as you had always been concerned with the growth of Japan, and in the way, the world. But she is proposing a very radical solution: shrinking the world's population down to size. It all boils down to your decision. Yes ... or No?
1123112122111112111121222122122111.title: The Meeting

11231121221111121111212221221221111.content:
You thought long and hard in dealing with this radical plan. The world's population is exploding at an alarming rate, and there might not be enough space for everyone in the near future, and attempts at building space stations and platforms have all failed. If people were smaller, you would put this upcoming space problem on hold for a while, but then again, shrinking people down against their will was simply too much.

"HEY! Do you have an answer or not? I don't have all day!" Shizuka snapped.

"Patience, Shizuka-chan! He needs time to think."

After a long "debate" inside your mind, you had your answer. You then stepped forward.

"Chairwoman Mizuki ... I accept your proposal. I'll go with the Master Plan!"

Everyone went in shock at your answer, especially Yuriko, who came up to confront you.

"Hiroki-kun! Do you know what you just said?"

"Yes, Yuriko-san, I know. If you think about it, our nation is already struggling with the growing population. In time, out descendants will have very little space to support themselves. History had shown us that aggressively taking over space will only backfire on us, and if we do nothing, we will all die out. I know how much you don't like this, and I too have my doubts about this, but I want to go on with this Master Plan, no matter how whacked out it sounds. I'm not doing this for them, or for me, but for the future ... our future, if we have one!"

Yuriko nodded after hearing your answer, while Chairwoman Mizuki simply applauded after hearing your speech.

"Well said, Hiroki Iketani. I'm glad you have the future on your mind."

"Wait, before we begin, I have a request."

"Let's hear it, then!"

You went up to her chair, and whispered your request into her ear. Her eyes widened at first after hearing it, but eventually, she agreed.

===

One month passed ...

It was a Sunday afternoon, and you were sitting in front of your TV set with Reiko, watching the news.

"The government today approved a massive construction project to establish 18 new settlements. A month has passed as the world marvelled at the discovery of new lands all over the world. As Prime Minister Takeo Fujimura described in his speech, 'We will not have to worry about our population boom any longer.' ... "

The world is going along with life as per normal, though the lengths and heights of rivers and mountains have to be remeasured. Chairwoman Mizuki's Master Plan was complete, and the world's population, flora and fauna were now reduced to no more than an inch in height (comparison to original sizes). Buildings and structures all over the world had to be shrunk carefully, but it was successful. You were already used to your current height, being shrunk and all in your adventure a month ago, but most of the girls in school were still not getting used to their new sizes.

"It's been a month, and for some reason, I still feel that I'm not the right size. I don't know why, but something says that I was ... bigger ... "

"Your imagination never fails to amaze me, Reiko. Yuriko-san was also saying the same thing for over a month. Seriously, I don't know why you girls keep saying that."

You had to take a vow of secrecy to make sure the world never found out about the shrinking devices or the Master Plan, or it would be all for nothing. As much as you want to tell them the reason for their weird thoughts, you had to keep it to yourself.

"In other news, the gigantic shoe in the middle of downtown Tokyo continues to draw attention from tourists and locals alike. Our scientists are all stumped at how such an item of this size could be made. The shoe itself continues to remain a marvel up till today."

You smiled to yourself upon hearing the news, as you had requested Chairwoman not to shrink one of Yuriko's shoes just to see how the world would react to it. A secret only you know.

"Hey Hiroki, why are you smiling like that?"

"Oh, nothing! I was thinking maybe we could go see that giant shoe for ourselves. I'll call Yuriko, and the three of us can go together."

"OK, let's do it then."

The world continues to move on ...
11231121221111121111212221221221111.title: A "New" World

11231121221111121111212221221221112.content:
"NO! I refuse to go with this! It's too much!"

Chairwoman Mizuki appeared calm after hearing your answer, but gave a long sigh before speaking again.

"Sigh ... I had always thought that you would be one who cares about the state of the world. Still, I should have expected this from you."

By saying no, you had probably got yourself into trouble. While you had no idea what Chairwoman Mizuki or the other girl might do, but Shizuka was one who would take action. Shizuka then stepped forward and from her bag, pulled out an object that looked like a carbine of sorts. You got a little shock at seeing a "gun" being pulled out, but you stood there unmoved, despite being very scared.

"Hiroki Iketani! I have always wanted to do this!"

She adjusted a dial of sorts on the carbine, and aimed the device at you.

"You remember how you got shrunk to 0.5 cm? With this portable shrink ray here, I'm going to shrink you down to a size of 0.0005 cm! You will be as small as a germ, perfect for scum like you!"

As she aimed the device, did she fire it in time?
11231121221111121111212221221221112.title: The Threat

112311212211111211112122212212211121.content:
A/N: I planned this as a two-pronged shrunken ending.

Shizuka fired her shrink device, and shot you with it. You were going to shrink, but what were you doing while she shot you?
112311212211111211112122212212211121.title: She Shot You!

1123112122111112111121222122122111211.content:
When Shizuka aimed her shrink device at you, you rushed to defend Yuriko from getting hit by the ray, but you end up being shot. Very rapidly, your body started shrinking much faster than before, and unable to cope with the sudden change in size, you blacked out.

You finally regained consciousness after a long hangover, and found yourself in a weird place. Everything around you was fleshy pink, while the sky looked very dark bluish. The surface seemed quite bouncy, and in a far distance, you could see a very large hole. While you wondered if Shizuka had shrunk or teleported you, you still went towards the large hole out of curiosity.

Upon closer examination, you could see that the closer you went to the hole, there was another feature ahead of you: a really huge fleshy mountain. It was then did you realize where you were: Yuriko's body! It was no joke: Shizuka had shrunk you down so small, you were now just a tiny little human-germ on her body. Even the gravity around you had changed. That was it: you wanted to become a part of Yuriko's life, and you got it.

As for Yuriko, all she could see was a rapidly shrinking you fall into her uniform, and never seen again. She could try and find you, but now she would need a portable microscope, and even then, you and her were now worlds apart.

A/N: Anyone who wants to add on to this story, feel free to drop me an email.
1123112122111112111121222122122111211.title: Yuriko's Universe

1123112122111112111121222122122111212.content:
Your efforts to disarm Shizuka by charging at her was in vain, and she shot you at point blank range. You were shot, and rapidly shrank, disappearing into the red carpet inside the room. Everyone watched in horror as Shizuka committed her deed while you disappeared into the carpet after getting shrunk.

You went unconsciousness after being shot, and even as you regain consciousness, there was a massive hangover that still revolved around your head. When you came to your senses, you found yourself surrounded by giant red fibers of hair that extend all the way to the sky. You could not really see what was above you until you felt your world shaking, more powerful than a super earthquake. Squinting your eyes to try and look beyond the carpet fibers, it was horrific, at least to you. If Shizuka was as tall as a skyscraper to you back then, she would be the size of whole planets to you now!

The "goddesses" above you don't seem to care that you had disappeared, though Shizuka just wanted to make sure, and with that, dropped her continential-sized shoe onto the carpet, creating another powerful world shaking shockwave, at least to you.

This was your life now: always running in fear from being stepped on inside the carpet, with little food and no way of escaping, with nobody able to help you out anymore. Imagine that.
1123112122111112111121222122122111212.title: Life In A Carpet

112311212211111211112122212212211122.content:
With your improved instincts, you managed to avoid Shizuka's shot, and the laser instead hit a nearby bookcase. Imagine your surprise when you saw the bookcase rapidly shrinking into nothingness. If you were shot there and then, you would surely be just a tiny germ on the carpet by now!

"Tch! I missed! I won't miss a second time!"

As she gets ready to aim again, Shuhei was already close to her and with quickly disarmed her, with the shrinking carbine falling onto the floor. Before Shizuka could reach for the carbine again, Shuhei stood in her way, preventing her from getting it.

"That was for shrinking my brother and I yesterday!"

Shizuka had the nasty look on her face, but could do nothing as she does not have her precious shrinking carbine anymore. Incidentally, all of you suddenly heard a sound of a gong going off. It went on for a while before stopping.

"Oh well! I guess it's time to put the Master Plan in action! Hitomi, Shizuka, let's go!"

Chairwoman Mizuki got off her "throne" and started walking away. The other girl (name revealed as Hitomi) followed suit, and an annoyed Shizuka followed suit, but stopped short at the door. She then turned towards all of you.

"When the Master Plan is complete, revenge will be sweet ... FOR ME! I'll see you guys at Marunouchi ... if you have the guts, that is!"

She then walked away, while you guys went towards Shuhei to examine the carbine Shizuka threatened to use against you. After all of you had your turns to admire the carbine, there was only one thing to do left: stop the girls from completing their "Master Plan" before it's too late.

"Why did Shizuka say 'see you guys at Marunouchi'? Isn't that place the financial district of all of Japan?" Hiroshi asked.

"It's probably where their funding came from. I'll bet the firm responsible for this also has another base in the financial district." You answered.

"We don't have much time. Hop on to our bikes, we will take you there!"

All 4 of you then headed towards the main exit, where the Yamamoto brothers' bikes were. You rode with Shuhei, while Yuriko rode with Hiroshi. After all safety procedures were completed, the two brothers then sped off towards what might be the final showdown at Marunouchi.
112311212211111211112122212212211122.title: The Place

1123112122111112111121222122122111221.content:
The ride towards the financial district of Tokyo was uneventful, but while riding along the highway, you could see a tall tower that stood out above the rest of the skyscrapers. Interestingly, there was something strange on the main spire. It looked like four gigantic cups attached onto a rotating cylindrical base. Although you have no idea what it was, it cannot be good.

"There's our target! That tower in the centre."

"Hang on! We're almost there!"

It would be another ten minutes before you arrived at the base of the tower. Appearance-wise, it looked like a normal building, but strangely, there were no guards or business going on. Most businesses don't work on Saturdays, but even so, there would be guards patrolling the building. Hiroshi then dismounted his bike and tried to open the door, but found it locked.

"No good! It's locked!"

"Oh, that's just great! If we don't find a way in, we'll be the size of ants in a matter of hours." Shuhei ranted.

The Yamamoto brothers then started one of their squabbles, which you find quite irritating. Despite the attention being drawn towards them, the brothers still continued. It was not until Yuriko noticed a sign pointing to a basement car park, and the brothers finally stopped their quarrelling. The four of you then headed towards where Yuriko pointed.

It was dark inside the basement car park, even with the headlights switched on. As it was too dark to ride on, you all agreed to dismount the bikes and go on foot. Without any light source, the four of you had to "feel" your way around the car park. Shuhei then felt a switch of sorts, and flicked it on. When the lights are restored, imagine your surprises when you see loads of robots the height of a small building surrounding you guys.

"KYAAA!!!!"

The four of you hugged each other in surprise in fear that the robots would attack you guys. After a while, it appears that the robots are immobile, and looking at your awkward positions, quickly got back to normal.

"Whoa! That gave us quite a scare."

You went up to have a look at one of the robots. It had the appearance of an armor-clad samurai, with a big kanji for "oni" (A Japanese demon in folklore) on its torso. Feeling curious, you went to the back of the robot, and you found a ramp lowered at the back. You wanted to discover more about this robot, but there really was little time left.

"Hey, Hiroki! We have to go now!"

"Oh, OK! I'm coming on!"

The four of you then proceeded to the main exit of the car park, and up the staircase to put a stop to this "Master Plan".
1123112122111112111121222122122111221.title: The Tower

11231121221111121111212221221221112211.content:
The four of you went up the staircase towards the main lobby. As you headed towards the lift lobby, you tried calling the lifts, but to your surprise, none of them were working. You knew Shizuka had planned this, and there was only one way up left: the stairs. Begrudgingly, you returned back to the main staircase, and went up the second floor.

Imagine your surprise when you found Shizuka waiting for you along the main corridor. She was holding another one of those carbines she threatened to use on you. However, this time, she fired the cold laser at you guys, and you find yourself shrinking down to 0.5 cm again,

"Darn it! Not again!"

"You're telling me."

You turned around, and you saw Shuhei and Hiroshi at the same size as well. You were wondering about Yuriko until you notice the moving "veil" above you that is Yuriko's skirt. The three of you were close to peeping at her panties before Yuriko covered her skirt down with her hands.

"ACK! DON'T LOOK!"

Yuriko was blushing a little, but all Shizuka did was just simply point a few fingers, and then suddenly ran off out of sight. You wondered what she meant with those gestures, but then you find yourselves surrounded ... by a pack of high school boys ... all shrunken to a smiliar size as yourself. They all had that look in your eyes, a look you really don't want to see even at normal size.

"Hi ... Hiroki ... What should we do now?"

Yuriko was muttering at a voice so low that even at your size, her voice sounded nothing more than a whisper. As the "zombiefied" school students encroached closer, you had to make a decision. Now!
11231121221111121111212221221221112211.title: More Shrinking Woes

112311212211111211112122212212211122112.content:
Using whatever gestures you could show Yuriko at your size, you "told" her to start running. Yuriko nodded, and in one swoop, she picked up the 3 shrunken guys with her right hand, and started running away from the zombified horde of shrunken high school students, who immediately gave chase. It was a ridiculous sight, a normal-sized high school teenage girl running away from a horde of shrunken high school boys.

"WHAT HAPPENED TO THEM? WHY ARE THEY ACTING THIS WAY?"

You wanted to answer, but being bobbed about on Yuriko's hands made it difficult for you to give an answer. In addition, as she was holding you guys close to her chest, her breasts add to the "hindrance" with Yuriko's constant running motion.

Yuriko kept running upwards the staircase, kicking aside minor annoyances occassionally. It was not too bad at first, but as she kept running upwards, the annoyances kept piling up.

"Uh, guys. I think a few of them are on my leg. They're ticklin ... OW!"

Yuriko let off an ear-piercing scream that almost deafened the three of you. Looking down at her leg, you could see a shrunken student hanging onto Yuriko's left leg, with a taser in his hand. He then jabbed the taser into Yuriko's leg again, causing Yuriko to let off another scream in pain.

"OW!"

You realized that if they continue hurting Yuriko, she would be unable to run any further. Yuriko was already slowing down due to pain and exhaustion, and there was still a long way to go. Shuhei then leaped off Yuriko's hands, and slid down her body and chased off the annoyance on her leg. Another climbed up, but Shuhei knocked him off again.

"You keep doing that, Shuhei! I'll continue upwards!"

You envied Shuhei's role by now, but you can tell that Yuriko was getting very tired. Eventually, she got down on her knees, too tired to move, and letting Hiroshi and yourself off her hand. You wonder if there is really no other way to stop the "Master Plan" left, until you notice the elevator door next to you. Upon closer observation, you noticed a electric box of sorts close to the lifts. By chance, you might be able to fix the lifts and head to the rooftop without having to run anymore. There are risks of being electocuted or sabotaging the lifts even more, but the decision is up to you.

As the Yamamoto brothers hold off the zombified student horde to allow Yuriko to rest, what will you do?
112311212211111211112122212212211122112.title: Race To The Top

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
It was the only chance you have now, so you rushed towards the electric box while the Yamamoto brothers guard a now tired Yuriko. The electric box itself was not sealed, so you could easily crawl in with ease.

Outside, you could hear Yuriko's loud panting combined with the loud shouts of the Yamamoto brothers, but your main task is to try and get the lifts working again. You flipped through the wires (without being electrocuted) to check for problems. You had some knowledge with these from your previous science project, but you had not done anything like this. After 5 minutes of looking around, you were still unable to locate the source of the problem until you saw one unplugged wire. You wanted to kick yourself for missing that, but you hurriedly picked up the wire (it felt like lifting a sofa) and plugged it into the lone empty socket. Within seconds, you could hear power surges all around, and you could hear rumbling sounds from the elevator shafts. It's fixed, you thought to yourself.

You rushed back out, and went back to your friends. You tugged at Yuriko's finger, and when she saw you, you pointed at the lifts, indicating that it had been fixed. Yuriko nodded, and picked you up and placed you back on her palm. There was no time to pick up the Yamamoto brothers, so they had to cling onto Yuriko's socks while she headed to the open lift, and quickly pushed the button to the top floor, and luckily for you guys, the doors closed before any of the zombified students could enter.

"PHEW! That was close!"

Yuriko heaved a sigh of relief, and picked up the Yamamoto brothers hanging onto her socks and placing them with you on her palm. All 4 of you know that it was still not over yet.

DING!

You arrived at the top floor, which looked like a laboratory of sorts. You could see the Chairwoman working on a supercomputer of sorts, and making things worse, Hitomi and Shizuka are guarding her.

"IF YOU WANT TO GET TO THE MACHINE, YOU HAVE TO GET THROUGH US FIRST!"

"GLADLY!"

The three "normal-sized" girls then got into a catfight of their own, while the Yamamoto brothers joined in. Shizuka was about to slap Yuriko but stopped when she noticed Hiroshi on Yuriko's shoulder. Yuriko took the chance, and pushed Shizuka down on the floor. Hitomi went to help Shizuka up, while Yuriko placed you down onto the floor.

"Hiroki! Go! Only you can stop her!"

You nodded, and you ran towards the Chairwoman and her supercomputer. You looked back, and you could see Yuriko trying to hold off Shizuka and Hitomi from giving chase. As you ran towards the machine, you had two options to stop her. You can slip in through the opening located at the bottom of the machine, or you can stop the Chairwoman herself by crawling into her clothes. Your call.
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: The Showdown

choices: You Pulled The Critical Wire First
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
Your best bet is to stop the machine from fully functioning, so you made a dash towards the Chairwoman and the supercomputer. You had not realized this yet, but you were surprisingly getting fitter than before. Normally, you would be out of breath by now, but now you could still go on without panting.

The Chairwoman noticed you coming close to her machine, and turned around to face you. She was not going to let you foil her "Master Plan".

"YOU'RE NOT GOING ANYWHERE, BUG!"

She lifted her foot, and prepares a stomp on you, but you were already used to being stomped by now, so her threats really meant nothing now. You were no longer afraid of giant shoes stepping on you, and like a pro, you managed to avoid the Chairwoman's multiple stomps and entered the small opening inside the supercomputer.

The Chairwoman was obviously frustrated that you managed to avoid her, but she still technically had the upper hand, as the program to activate the most powerful shrink ray ever devised was already complete, and was waiting for the command. She ignored you, and returned to the supercomputer and resumed typing. Meanwhile, you found yourself buried inside bundles of electric wires again, but this time, you had to pull out the critical wire that will stop the machine from functioning altogether. Hastily, you pulled out wire after wire, hoping to find the right one that will shut down the supercomputer altogether.

It was a race against time, your strength and luck against her typing speed. Who wins in this "battle"? You decide.
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: Time Is Running Out

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
You could hear the Chairwoman's fingers typing above you, and you could tell she was almost done. You were getting tired after pulling so many wires, yet none was the right one. You were panting, but you know that if you stop now, she gets one step closer to shrinking down the entire population of Earth. You found yourself with this green wire in front of you. It was all or nothing for you now.

"Well, here goes!"

You pulled the green wire with all your might, and after a while, it came off its place. For a while, you thought that your luck was out, but to your surprise, you could hear the machine powering down. Even as the Chairwoman desperately keys in the final codes into the program, it was too late. The supercomputer shuts down, and the program was effectively erased.

You had won ... for now.

You wanted to celebrate your triumph, but you could feel a major overload of power inside the supercomputer. If you stay too long, you would definitely get zapped. Hastily, you made your way out of the machine just in time. The massive overload from the supercomputer let off a major surge of power, which spreads across all over the building. Bolts of energy went darting in every direction. You were struck by a dart, but strangely, you found yourself feeling enlarged, and you did not stop until you were normal sized again. You don't know the logic behind it, but after seeing you enlarged, Hiroshi and Shuhei were also hit by the energy bolts, and likewise, returned back to normal size. As the massive power surge affected the entire building, you were very sure that everyone below had also returned bck to normal size.

Above your heads, the massive cup-like structure began tocrumble under the massive power surge, and subsequently, blew itself up. The sound from the explosion was loud enough for you guys to hear it, and judging from the looks of Hitomi, Shizuka and the Chairwoman, it must have been critical to them.

"NO! MY SHRINKING DEVICE! MY PSIONIC BEACON!"

The Chairwoman looked helplessly as her precious machines destroyed themselves. After all that happened, she turned around, with a very angered look on her face.

"You ... YOU! You blew my chance to save the world! Now, you must pay!"

Reaching into her coat, she pulled out an odd pistol of sorts, and aimed it at you. It must be another one of their portable shrinking weapons, and you wondered how many of those they have made.

"Wait! You're going to shrink me again!" You exclaimed.

The Chairwoman simply smirked, and adjusted the dial the same way Shizuka did during your first encounter.

"Shizuka's carbine can only shrink people, but mine here is advanced. It is capable of reducing the size of objects and people, and also enlarging them in the process."

She ran towards the closest open window, and prepares to jump.

"What're you doing! Don't jump!"

"TOO LATE!"

She turned her pistol around, and jumped off the window, firing the pistol in the process. As she disappeared down onto the pavements of the main street, you wondered if it was only a hoax. However, you heard a loud booming sound coming from the street level.

BOOM!

You looked outside the window, and to your horror, you saw the Chairwoman herself, now at almost 200 ft tall, heading towards the tower!
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: Victory ... Or Not

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
The people at the streets started to panic and run away as a 200ft tall school girl stomps her way towards the tall building where you guys are.

"You've done it now, Hiroki Iketani! Prepare for your punishment!"

Inside the tower, everyone could only watch in horror as the now giant Chairwoman approaches the tower.

"Now you've done it, Iketani! I'm not staying around and get myself in this mess! Let's go, Hitomi!"

"OK!"

The two women then ran away and you could hear them running down the stairs.

"Come back here, you cowards!" Yuriko yelled at them, but you held her back.

"Yuriko, ignore them! We'll get them another time, but now, let's get out of here."

Yuriko nodded, and the four of you then followed Shizuka and Hitomi out of the main lab and down the stairs. As you ran down, you could hear the Chairwoman destroying the tower, starting from the top floors. Avoiding the loud sounds and the occassional rubble falling down, the four of you frantically raced down the tower.

"You won't escape me!" The loud voice of the Chairwoman echoed above your heads.

A huge hand then came crashing down in front of you, accompanied by falling bits of rubble, and her palm almost flattened you had you been caught. However, the damage to the tower had been done, and the walls around started to crumble. Cracks appeared on the staircase, and even your footing is becoming very unstable. As the Chairwoman retracts her huge hand away from the tower, your footing started to crumble, and you had to "hop" your way down like video game characters hopping about obstacles.

"We're almost there! Yuriko, once you reach the ground floor, you get out there and help in evacuating the people out of this area."

"What are you going to do, then?"

"We cannot allow her to rampage around Tokyo. The three of us will stop her. After all, her target is me, and if I don't run away, the population will be safe."

"How are you going to stand up against a 200ft tall giantess, anyway?"

"Oh, we have our solutions!"

The four of you then reached the ground floor, and Yuriko then leaves the building while the three of you headed downstairs to the carpark.

"What's the idea, Hiroki?" Shuhei asked.

"There!" You pointed at the giant mechs straight ahead. "It's our only chance!"

There was little time left, as you could feel that even the basement is feeling the effects of the collapsing tower. The three of you picked the three closest "Oni" mechs and climbed inside. There was no traditional cockpit inside, but there was a platform similar to the dancing machines at the arcade, with a helmet dangling above the platform. Hurriedly, you placed the helmet on, and prayed that it will work. Did it?
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: Escape The Tower

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
As soon as you placed the helmet on your head, you feel yourself being "submerged" in a virtual liquid of sorts, and from the vision inside the helmet, you find yourself inside the basement carpark. In other words, you are now the mech itself! You can move the mech around like it was your own body. While it felt cool and all, you still had to get out of here.

"I've never seen anything like this!" Hiroshi spoke through a communicator. "Did the Technology Club actually came up with this?"

"Cool! Check me out!" Shuhei's voice followed.

"No time to admire ourselves! We have to get out of here!" You said. You could hear some groaning from Shuhei, but the brothers followed behind you. You walked towards the main exit, but as you got close, rubble began falling at the main ramp, trapping you inside.

"Oh, hell no! Not this!" you exclaimed. "Oh, I'm so mad, I'll ... I'll ... "

ZZAP!!!

Your anger caused the mech to fire a beam of sort from its eyes, melting part of the rubble pile.

"WHOA! Hiroki! What did you do!" Hiroshi exclaimed.

"I don't know, I just focused my anger on my eyes, and then ... "

ZZAP!!!

"I think I just found this thing's main weapon. Hiroshi! Shuhei! Focus your eyes onto the rubble pile! Just do it!"

They had their doubts, but in no time, the three mechs were firing beam lasers that melted the rubble pile completely.

"OK! Let's go!"

The three mechs then exited the basement carpark (partially destroying part of the ramp in the process), and strided their way to face the giantess in the city. Even though your mechs were the size of a small house, the Chairwoman was still much bigger than you guys.

"So, you managed to actually pilot those mechs in the basement! No matter, I'll stomp you guys flat!"

A battle broke out in the now ruined streets, a single giantess facing three toy-sized "to her perspective" mechs. The giantess has the size advantage, but the mechs were able to avoid most of her "slapping" attacks and the occassional stomps. The mechs fired their eye lasers at the giantess, but at her size, her skin was now thick as ever. The fight was effectively a stalemate, until the giantess started lifting her right foot, and prepares for a mega stomp. As her foot falls down, did you manage to avoid it?
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: The Showdown Part 2

choices: Grow Into A Giantess As Well
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
The Chairwoman drops her massive right foot down, causing massive tremors on the now cracked road surface. The three of you managed to avoid being stepped on, but some of the rubble from the stomp went airborne and struck your mechs. Being one with the mech also meant that whatever happens to it, you are affected as well. A piece of rubble struck the head of your mech, and you felt a painful bump on a similar spot.

"OW!"

You could barely see the giantess' face, but you could tell that she was smirking. Without warning, she removed her foot from the floor, and imagine your surprise when she kicked all three of you down like pins. The three of you crashed down heavily on the floor, and naturally, you could feel the pain on your backs.

"Ha ha ha! Poor, pathetic fools!"

Your back reels from the pain, and the fact that she's rubbing it in only made it worse. Even if you guys got up and fought her again, it will not make a difference.

= = =

Meanwhile, Yuriko was busy helping evacuate the fleeing populace away, and she too saw the soccer ball like kick she delivered to you guys, and started to worry. She was feeling a little guilty for leaving you guys, and also helpless as there was nothing she could do.

BUMP!

As she stared at the "fighting scene", she was accidentally tackled down by a fleeing student, who simply ran away without apologizing. Yuriko brushed it aside, but also noticed the pistol that the Chairwoman had ditched after transforming her into a giantess. Yuriko picked it up, and saw that it was still working. She could use the pistol on the Chairwoman and shrink her again, but she might be stepped on if she tried. Then again, she could use the pistol on herself and join the fight.

There was not much time left as much of the city was being destroyed. Yuriko thought for a while, and it was decision time. What will it be?
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: Damage Report!

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
Yuriko cannot believe the choice she was about to make, but she had to do it. She closed her eyes, aimed the resizing pistol at herself, and fired.

= = =

The three of you had just barely got up from the kick that the giantess Chairwoman had "delivered". You had barely got back on your feet in your mech, while Hiroshi was still helping Shuhei up. Even with your combined strength and technology stolen from her, she still had the upper hand.

"Why don't you give up, Hiroki Iketani? You're better off accepting your punishment than continuing this pathetic struggle."

Even though you had been taunted quite often at school, mainly by Shizuka and Hitomi, you were already reaching a boiling point. Angered, you fired another heat ray from the mech's eyes upwards, to her face.

"Pathetic!"

The Chairwoman simply raised her palm and easily stopped the attack, and judging from the look on her face, she barely even felt anything.

"Are you done? Now it's my turn!"

All three of you could only wait in fear as the 200ft tall giantess delivered her statement.

BOOM!

A giant shoe slammed down a few meters away from you, taking the three of you by surprise. You looked up, hoping that it was not another enemy, and you could see a pair of towering legs that disappear inside a plait skirt. You noticed the pinkish-white panties inside the skirt, and you knew who it was.

Yuriko.

"Y ... Yuriko! How on ..."

"D ... don't look at me like that, Hiroki! I'm embarrassed too at this size. I'm not going to be the one delivering your corpses to your parents later, you know."

"It doesn't matter now, Yuriko! Honestly, I'm glad you showed up. Now, let's take this other giantess down!"

The Chairwoman did not seem fazed at the arrival of this "newcomer", though she did feel irritated at being interrupted.

"So, you used my resizing pistol ... so what? It only means that I have to punish one more person anyway!"

The Chairwoman and Yuriko attempted to attack each other, and failed. After a few missed punches and avoiding being tripped multiple times over, the two eventually ended up in a slapfight of sorts, with each girl slapping the other on the cheek, and vice versa. The three of you could only stare at this rather embarrassing catfight going on in the city, but as the fight goes on, you noticed that Yuriko had actually hurt the Chairwoman, as evidenced by the multiple bruises on her body, but mostly on her face. Seeing a chance, you fired a heat laser at one of the wounds.

"OUCH!!! Who did that!"

The Chairwoman yelled out in pain, and noticed you. Immediately identifying you as the one who shot her, she raised her left foot, and tried to step on you, but you managed to avoid it before the shoe slams down on the floor. On the other hand, the Chairwoman's skin was not as tough anymore now that she had sustained bruises, and even one of those is an opening for your heat lasers. You wasted no time to deliver this news.

"Yuriko! I know you don't like it, but keep attacking her with whatever you got. Hiroshi-san, Shuhei, target your lasers at her bruises and wounds! Hurry!"

All four of you went forward into your strategy to bring down the Chairwoman and stop her rampage. After almost an hour of combat, it had to end in one way or another. Victory or defeat?
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: Giantesses and Robots

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
The catfight in the middle of Tokyo had to end eventually, with Yuriko and Chairwoman Mizuki constantly delivering blows while the Yamamoto brothers and yourself try and "score" hits on the Chairwoman's wounds. It was a hard-fought battle, but eventually, Yuriko delivered one final slap on her face, causing her to fall straight down onto the ground with a massive thud. The four of you had done it!

Before you could celebrate your victories, you could see the Chairwoman's fallen body getting smaller and smaller, as if the growth ray effect had worn off. You were still worried, so you exited your mech and rushed forward to have a look. The Chairwoman herself was still alive, though severely hurt from the fall. You rushed to her side, and held her close. Shizuka and Hitomi then appeared, seemingly from their hiding spot. Shizuka was visibly mad at the sight.

"Hiroki Iketani! What have you done! You flattened much of the city, and injured the Chairwoman! Why I outta ... "

Before she could slap you, the Chairwoman grabbed her arm, and gently lowered it, despite being hurt so badly.

"Calm down, Shizuka-chan." She said with a weak voice. "I caused the destruction, not him. Blame it on me if you have to. Besides, you are showing disrespect to me by slapping Iketani-san here."

"What do you mean?" Hiroshi asked. He and Shuhei had too left their mechs to have a look.

"I guess an explanation is in order."

"Say what you have to, Chairwoman Mizuki." You answered.

"You can stop calling me that now. That name was just an alias. My real name is Hanako Iketani, and I came from 50 years in the future. Hiroki Iketani-san is my grandfather."

Everyone gasped in shock about this revealation, including yourself.

"You ... you're my granddaughter from the future?" You asked with skeptism and shock.

"Indeed I am. The world 50 years later is a horrible place. The human population had exploded to over 1 trillion people, and there was very little space left on the planet to support the boom. Stronger nations resorted to invading and destroying entire populations to solve their own space problems. Japan was not spared either, and almost 90% of our population were simply destroyed. My grandfather and I were the only survivors of the genocide."

"Oh my! I'm sorry to hear about that." You replied.

"You were sorry about the loss of our population, so you came up with a radical plan: shrinking the entire human population so we can solve the space problem later. However, since it was already too late in my era, Oji-san (grandfather) decided to put the plan in action 50 years ago, with similar technological expertise. Due to his advancing age, I had to put his Master Plan into action."

"What? I came up with the Master Plan? I wanted to shrink the population?"

"Yes, you did. I was lucky to inherit your intelligence, so I was able to plan the mergers of schools to conceal the secret labs and plans, and the tower there serves as a red herring (to fool the different bureaus) and the main beacon to trigger the shrink beam. The plan was already in place, and before you intervened, the only thing left was to trigger the beacon."

"That still did not explain why you tried to 'punish' me when I thrawted your plan."

"I kinda lost it then. The thought that I was unable to save our future and the fact that you were trying to stop the plan YOU came up with pushed me over the edge. Oji-san told me to contact his earlier self, but I guess I kinda got carried away with planning and completing his plan to realize you were my grandfather all this time. I only knew when Shizuka said your name, but if I told you then, you would probably say I'm absurd."

She giggled a little, but then stopped due to her injuries.

"The Master Plan had failed, and it appears that the tragedy of the future is unavoidable. I don't know how to face Oji-san when I get back ... "

Tears started rolling down her cheek. Seeing Hanako so sad strangely breaks your heart, since she IS your granddaughter of the future. You gently wiped the tears off her face.

"It will be fine, Hanako-chan. Despite the dark and terrible future which you described, I'm sure we can handle it. After all, we have 50 years to think about it."

"Typical Oji-san."

As she started to smile, you notice her body starting to fade away. You were still holding her in your arms, but it looks like she is literally vanishing into thin air.

"Hanako-chan!"

"It's OK. My time here is done, and I must return to my era 50 years later. Shizuka, Hitomi, it has been nice knowing you."

Hitomi was sobbing at the sight, while Shizuka was clearly trying to hold back tears.

"Oji-san. I know it would be rude to say this, but take care of yourself."

You could no longer feel her weight on your hands. Although she had answered most of your questions, there was still 1 more nagging question in your head.

"Wait! One more question: if I'm your grandfather, who is your grandmother then?"

"I think you know her very well ... "

With that, she vanished completely. She was no longer in your arms. You stared blankly at where she last laid down, but said nothing. Everyone stared blankly at what just happened, but said nothing. There was no explanation at what just happened.
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: The Truth

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
A week had passed since the confrontation with Chairwoman Mizuki. It was reported in the news that Marunouchi (the district where the fight took place) suffered a massive earthquake, but surprisingly, no casualties. The district itself is undergoing reparations, with much of the finances being contributed from an unknown source.

In school, it went on as per normal, though Shizuka had notably changed, her not being mean was a change. The shrink ray that was fired on the first day appeared to be temporary as opposed to the permanant shrink ray intended for the Master Plan, and most of the "victims" appear to be cured, though side effects remained.

Meanwhile, you were at the Department of Investigations to give your statement. The Japanese Self-Defense Forces were alerted of the mayhem caused a week ago, and you were at the center of it all, but you were lucky to be interrogated by this particular officer.

"So, that's my story, sir. All of it."

"If it was anybody else, they would have dismissed you as crazy and probably did something else to you. You lucky I'm part of the 'crazies'."

"So, what is going to happen to all that technology left behind in the school building, then?"

"This crazy university professor named Fukujima has taken a keen interest in it, and is willing to pay a fortune to acquire them. Normally, we would have denied him, but we decided to make an exception this time, given the footage of the mechs you guys used in the fight."

After a short pause, his tone became more formal as he gives his verdict.

"Hiroki Iketani! You are hereby cleared of this entire matter. The Marunouchi Incident and the Shrinking Incidents in your school are now classified as "Non-Existant", and no mention of it must be made. Including yourself and your friends."

"Yes, sir."

"OK, you are free to go."

You left the interrogation office, and pulled out your cellphone. There was still one more "problem" to deal with.

"Hello? Yuriko?"

"Hiroki-kun! So, how did it go? The interrogation?"

"The incidents are now non-existant, and we are not allowed to talk about it. Including you too, Yuriko."

"Oh, I see. Are you still in the building?"

"Yes, I'm on my way out."

"Hold on! Wait for me! I'm coming to pick you up."

CLICK!

You waited at the corridor of the JSDF Investigations Building for Yuriko, when you felt tremors and heard loud stomping sounds. Before long, a pair of huge fingers opened the window, and you knew your "ride" had arrived. You climbed onto the fingers, and made your way to Yuriko's giant palm.

"Yuriko! Came to pick me up?"

"Yes, now let's go home."

Yuriko was still a giantess after a week, as it seems that the growth ray she used on herself was a permanent one. You adamently refused the military's offer to hurt her, which explains why she was still 200ft tall after all this time.

"Your parents don't mind your size?"

"They'll never know. It will be at least another month before they return from their business trips. Besides, I kind of like it being this tall."

"I heard from Shizuka and Hitomi that there may BE a way to revert you back to normal. They were working on something called "VX gas", which can nullify the effects of both the growth and shrink ray, but then again, I am still finding it hard to trust them."

"I can wait, Hiroki-kun."

"Shall we go home, then?"

"We shall!"
