Yuriko then walked towards western Tokyo, careful to avoid stepping on anything, especially vehicles. On her palm, you comfortably watched the view as the two of you made your way home, awaiting your next adventure ... if there is one waiting for you, of course.
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: Happy Ending?

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
Unfortunately, the fight began to shift in the Chairwoman's favor. You were not sure why she was not taking damage despite throwing everything you guys have at her. Each time Yuriko threw a punch or slap, the spot always seem to disappear after a while. The same is true wherever Yuriko struck (minus the groin, as Yuriko finds it dishonorable), the Chairwoman simply shrugged it aside like nothing happened. For Yuriko's case, this was not true, and as Yuriko continued to get abused by the Chairwoman, standing alone became a struggle.

Eventually, Yuriko finally could not take it anymore, and collapsed onto the ruined district, full of bruises and cuts. You wanted to aid Yuriko, but the worst was not over yet.

"Now for you pesky boys!" The Chairwoman said, and with a quick swipe, she grabbed Shuhei's mech, and lifted it to her chest level. In the next instant, she hurled the mech (with Shuhei) at the nearby electric pylon, and the mech landed in a mess of electrical wires. The impact caused the power levels in the mech to surge to dangerous levels, and from your interface, you watched in horror as Shuhei got electrocuted in the most terrible of ways. After that, you and Hiroshi watched in horror as Shuhei's lifeless mech plummeted onto the ground below, and crashed into multiple parts.

Hiroshi snapped after seeing his younger brother get killed, and in a frenzy, he rushed towards the Chairwoman's giant feet. The normally calm and composed Hiroshi made the biggest mistake of his life by charging forward, unaware that the Chairwoman's other foot was already hovering above him. Her foot then crashed down on Hiroshi's mech like how a person would crush an ant under his foot. Hiroshi was pinned down under the heavy weight of the Chairwoman, but it did not end there. The Chairwoman then proceeded to twist her foot ... with Hiroshi's mech underneath as well. Hiroshi was grinded to death as his mech began to tear apart under the weight.

You knew you were next, but how the Chairwoman decided to deal with you is up to speculation. You stood there, awaiting whatever terrible fate she has planned for you. She reached down and grabbed your mech, you being too scared to even move. She then proceeded to fiddle her finger around your mech, releasing you out of the console, and in the next moment, her fingers found you and picked you out of the mech. You were trapped between her fingers, while she hurled the mech away. She calmly picked up the abandoned beam gun, and started shrinking herself ... with you still in her fingers.

She was back to normal size, while you were now the size of an insect. It seems that she had the most cruel and unusual punishment reserved for you. She calmly walked toward Yuriko's fallen body, and entered Yuriko's skirt. She calmly climbed up Yuriko's left leg, and went towards her pinkish-white panties. Without hesitation, she lifted up the soft fabric, revealing Yuriko's pubic hair and parts of her pussy. She then proceeded to throw you right in.

"Enjoy!"

That was the last word you ever heard from the Chairwoman, as she simply walked away from Yuriko's fallen body and out of your life. You were now permanently trapped in Yuriko's pussy hair, whether you like it or not. It was not long before the Self-Defense Forces arrived, and had Yuriko's body restrained and transported back. You wanted to scream and shout to the soldiers "handling" Yuriko, but you were simply too small. Even if you could get their attention, you would still be like an insect to them anyway.

The bodies of the Yamamoto brothers (Hiroshi and Shuhei) were never recovered, while Yuriko was pinned as "The giantess that rampaged through Marunouchi", and held in permanent custody in a secret location in Japan, still as a giantess. Your parents and Reiko tried in vain to look for you, unaware at where you are: trapped inside Yuriko's pussy hairs the size of an microscopic being to Yuriko.
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: A Terrible Ending

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
There was no way Tokyo would be able to handle 2 giantesses, so Yuriko thought that the best way was to try and shrink the Chairwoman down before things really gets out of hand. Yuriko took aim with the pistol, and fired at the Chairwoman, who "stood out" among the Tokyo skyline.

The ice blue laser hits the Chairwoman, but to the horror of everyone, the laser failed to do anything at all! All the Chairwoman felt was a minor cold "hit" on her body, which she barely registered. She rubbed the point of contact, and got back with fighting the three mechs. Meanwhile, Yuriko ponders over the pistol, and why it failed to work.

"Strange. It should be working. Why didn't it?"

She accidentally pulled the trigger, shooting a wrecked car in the process. Imagine Yuriko's surprise when the car started shrinking down to the size of a child's toy! She reached down, and picked up the wrecked car, and examined it, before tossing it aside.

"This pistol actually works! But why not on the Chairwoman?"

===

The Yamamoto brothers and yourself were still engaged in combat with the giantess Chairwoman. Despite the heat lasers you fired at her, it seems nothing was working against this 200ft tall giantess. As you wondered about your next move, you got a call on your mobile phone.

"Hello?"

"It's Yuriko. You are not going to believe this, but the pistol actually works. I just don't know why it failed to work on the Chairwoman."

"What? Seriously?"

"It's the truth, Hiroki-kun. I'm going to meet up with you guys now. Later."

You wanted to dissuade her, but she had already hung up. You got back to "action", as the Chairwoman picked up Shuhei's mech, and slammed him right back down onto the floor. Hiroshi went to check on his brother, leaving you alone to deal with the giantess.

"Oh man! This is bad! I just wish I had something for a reference."

As soon as you said that, you feel a gadget of sorts being placed over your right eye, like the onesfound in sci-fi manga. Immediately after that, data started displaying on the crystal panel, before showing you the contents of what it found. You did not know what it was, but at this time, any help is welcome, so you read the data. Meanwhile, Yuriko had just caught up with you guys, with the beam pistol still in her hands.

"Hiroki-kun!"

"Yuriko!"

You wanted to hug her, but at this time, it would not be a wise decision.

"Yuriko. I know why it did not work! The laser is simply not powerful enough to penetrate her thick skin."

"Do you know how to stop her, then?"

"Actually, yes. This strange device beside my right eye and ear had given me two solutions. While her skin might be thick, it is still vulnerable, and if we can cause enough damage to cause a wound, you can try and shrink her down by firing at the open wound."

"Let's go, then!"

"Wait! There is another solution. There is this strange chemical called "VX", and it is said to be able to nullify the effects of the shrink and growth ray. There is a missile inside this mech that contains the VX warhead. The only problem is that if I use the missile, I might destroy much of the city, since it IS contained in a warhead."

"What do you want to do, then? I'll support you."

Choose.
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: You Have Other Plans?

choices: Yes (The beam hit the wound in time)
No (She covered her wound in time)
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
There was not much time to think, but you decided against using the VX warhead. As easy as it might get, it will be hard to explain yourself if you blow up half of Tokyo with the warhead.

"Yuriko. I'm counting on you again. You must take the shot once the three of us wound her."

Yuriko nodded, and quickly rushed to a nearby pile of rubble, waiting for a chance. Meanwhile, Hiroshi had helped his brother up back to his feet. The mech was damaged, but was still capable of fighting.

"Hiroshi-san! Shuhei! Fire at the Chairwoman's right leg. We have to do this together. This is the only chance we are ever going to get!"

The sight of the Chairwoman's left foot crashing down mere meters away quickly convinced the Yamamoto brothers of your plan. Quickly, you used the inbuilt console to relay the co-ordinates for the three of you to fire your melting lasers. By a stroke of luck, there was a scratch on the Chairwoman's left leg, which might have been received when rubble started falling.

"Target that scratch, guys! Together!"

Within moments, the three mechs then started firing the melting laser at the Chairwoman's scratch. It worked, and the wound is opening. Unfortunately, the Chairwoman is also feeling the pain from the scratch getting bigger. Realizing the danger, she moved her hand towards her left leg, in an effort to cover up the wound.

Yuriko! Now! Do it!

These words screamed inside your head, and Yuriko, wither through instinct or mind reading powers, saw her chance, and came out of hiding. Running towards the giantess, Yuriko fired the cold laser towards the wound, as the Chairwoman's massive hand within position to close the scratch wound. Did the beam succeed?
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: One Chance

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
As you watched as Hiroshi's mech was sent flying by a flick of the giant Chairwoman's hand, you had made up your decision. As the tall 200ft giantess gloats at how your struggle is pathetic, you figured that there was really no other way out.

"Yuriko! I have to use the VX warhead! It may be our only chance against her."

Yuriko stayed slient for a while, but then returned with her answer.

" ... OK, if that is what you want. The VX warhead is contained inside your mech."

"Thank you, Yuriko."

You then proceeded to access the mech's computer system, and you found the location of the VX warhead. With your fast typing skills, you worked through the program to arm and prepare the co-ordinates to fire the missile. The prime location will be the Chairwoman's face, as according to the data you received, the VX gas must enter the bloodstream if it wants to start nullifying the effects. As Shuhei and Hiroshi continued to struggle, you were going for your only shot against the giantess to bring her down.

BEEP! BEEP!

It was ready to fire.

"HIROSHI-SAN! SHUHEI! YURIKO! STAND BACK!"

The two mechs immediately pulled off, while the world watched as you fire the VX missile right into the face of the Chairwoman. The few seconds of the missile in flight was the quietest and most critical moment that could end the giantess' rampage or just a last desperate gasp for survival.

BOOM!

The missile blew up right in the Chairwoman's face, taking her aback, and causing her to cough endlessly upon impact. After that, she saw the smoke coming from your mech, and immediately went for another foot stomp. She barely managed to step on you, but it still caused your mech to lose balance and crash down. You bellowed out in pain, as your mech landed like an upturned turtle.

Suddenly, you could see the Chairwoman getting smaller and smaller. The VX gas is starting to take effect. The look on the Chairwoman's face was that of irony, as it was one of her inventions that had brought her down. You managed to get the mech back up on its feet, just in time as the Chairwoman shrinks back down to her normal height. Did she stop there?
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: Missile Massacre

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
The now normal-sized Chairwoman was standing right in the middle of the wreckage she caused, and stood there before collapsing to the ground, either through shock or exhaustion, with her face facing the sky. Everyone who did not escape during the fighting began to gather around the girl who had caused all this destruction.

With Yuriko by your side, you slowly made your way towards the Chairwoman, and you could see her, battered and bruised. You would expect her to curse out another insult at you, but to your surprise, you could see tears flowing down her bruised face. She was mumbling, but you could not make out what she was saying until you managed to get closer.

" ... Grandpa ... I have ... failed ... "

As if something came over you, you got down on your knees, and gently lifted her head, and stroked her hair. Everyone looking was stunned; the Yamamoto brothers, Shizuka, Hitomi and even Yuriko, despite her being your closest friend, had no idea why you were doing this.

"Uh, Hiroki ... you know that she had tried to squash you earlier ... " Shuhei remarked.

"I don't know, Shuhei." You replied. "It just feels that I ... know her somehow ... I cannot explain how or why, I just do."

You then feel a hand touching your face, and you could see that the Chairwoman was touching your face. Strangely, it feels like the Chairwoman was fading away, as if disappearing into thin air. Her entire body started de-materializing, notably as you could no longer feel her weight on your hands. As she faded away, you could see her smile at you, tears still rolling down her face. She did not say anything, except for one last whisper before she finally faded away.

"... Grandpa ... "

She had completely faded away, and only a small piece of paper was left. As you finally regained some of your consciousness, you picked up the piece of paper, and it turns out to be a letter of sorts, and strangely, it was written to you.

"If you are reading this, then my mission has failed. Please forgive me, but I do not want to shock everyone about my true intentions. I am actually a time-traveller from 50 years in the future, and "Mizuki"is only an alias, named after my favorite idol. My true name is Hanako Iketani, and I was supposed to contact my grandfather of the past to carry out his "Master Plan", a plan to shrink the world's population down to avoid the consequences of a world with nearly 3 trillion people. I had set up hidden facilities underneath the old girls' school, and recruited honor roll students, but over time, the group got intoxicated with the advanced technologies I had brought with me. I thought that by using a front to merge schools through an M&A scheme, I can get more help, but it seems that even I had strayed. I am sorry to all those whose lives I had wrecked. I am sorry to those that I had led astray. Most importantly, I am sorry to my grandfather, both the past and the present. Please, use the technologies I had left behind for good use. My grandfather and I will have it no other way.

- Hanako"

Everyone was still in slight shock over the revelation (you narrated the letter), and for a while, nobody uttered a word. It was Shizuka that eventually broke the silence.

"So the Chair ... Hanako was sent here to prevent an overpopulation disaster. Why didn't she tell us before? It also shocks me that Hanako is related to ... of all people, Iketani."

"I know. It shocks me too." You replied. "All these years of being mean, and you were working with my plan with my granddaughter. What has this world come to?"

Shizuka stayed silent for a while, and said nothing.

"I do recall her telling me we were going to save the world when I joined her secret technology club, but it seems that I too got intoxicated with revenge and humiliation. Hiroki, I am ... sorry ... for the times I have mistreated you and nearly ... stepped on you ..."

"It is all right, Kinugawa-san. I forgive you."

From a distance, you could hear the sound of heavy vehicles approaching. You know that the Self-Defense Forces have been alerted, and now they are here.

"Come on guys. Let's get out of here before they catch us."

Everyone nodded, and each one of you went your separate ways.
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: Her Revelation

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
The whole "Giantess rampaging through Marunouchi" was simply too great for the press to ignore, and people had already snapped pictures of "the encounter", so there was really no escape for all of you.

Eventually, all of you decided to turn yourselves in to the Self-Defense Forces in exchange for keeping your identities secret. After days of interrogation, the Self-Defense Forces decided to confiscate every high-tech item from your school, with a promise to reverse-engineer it. Shizuka and Hitomi, being prime suspects behind the incident, were sentenced to 240 hours of community service, and fined for their role in "causing widespread panic and damage to property". The Yamamoto brothers, Yuriko and yourself were all let off with a warning, and allowed to continue with your lives in exchange for your silence in the matter.

Back at school, it functioned like nothing even happened, even though the Self-Defense Forces had blown up every last trace of the underground facilities. Most of the shrunken students were returned back to normal, each one with no memory of being shrunk. The rest of your school life continued on, with no mention of the giantess incident ever again.

10 years later, the incident had become an "icon" in pop culture, with Korean film companies making their own parody movies in an attempt to 1-UP us. Parodies like "Giantess in Seoul", "Giantess in Shanghai" and even "Giantess in New York" became bestsellers at the box office. Shuhei and Mikako's relationship was going strong, and Shuhei intends to propose to her soon. Hiroshi entered the Superbike Grand Prix, and won the "Best Rookie Award" in his debut season, with intent to win the championship.

"So, Yuriko ..." You said, taking a stroll at a park with your fiance. "Our wedding is in a month, and all the preparations are already done. Reiko is intent on baking the best wedding cake, while Shizuka and Hitomi have agreed to attend the wedding despite their busy schedule in the US."

"I'm impressed, Hiroki." Yuriko said. "The clumsy guy I knew is now on the cover of "Innovation" magazine, the premier magazine for the brightest minds. I have no regrets with settling down with you. I know that I had made the right choice."

You smiled, unable to hold back blushing. Yuriko had grown into a stunning beauty, and even though you were decent looking, you still feel that your appearance may not fit with Yuriko's beauty.

"I have no regrets either, Yuriko. I am about to have Tokyo's most beautiful journalist as my bride, but something's still missing."

"What do you mean?"

"I mean, ten years ago, the incident ..."

Yuriko pointed her finger at you, but remained smiling.

"I know what you are thinking, Hiroki." Her tone then turned serious. "You want a giantess bride, right? I don't mind, but how are you going to do it without arousing suspicion?"

You smiled back, but answered.

"I have my methods."

The two of you then shared a passionate kiss as the sun sets. While you two kissed, your mind was filled with your recent breakthrough. You have managed to replicate the shrink ray once again despite the destruction of all blueprints 10 years ago. The possibilities, you thought to yourself, is boundless.

How did the wedding go? Well, that is another story, for another time.
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: Aftermath

choices: Go Ahead With The Master Plan (Ending 1)
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
As the Chairwoman starts shrinking back down to normal height, you wanted to heave a sigh of relief. However, before you could do so, you could see her get smaller again. At first, you were taken aback, but when the Chairwoman reached the height of a child, you started to panic a little. It seems the VX gas you exposed her to still was not fully tested yet. Regardless, you climbed out of your mech, and rushed towards the Chairwoman, still shrinking as you made your way towards her.

The Chairwoman was now at the exact same height you were in after the past few hours. You, Hiroshi, Shuhei and Yuriko all stood around her, like massive skyscrapers blocking out her view of the sky. You could barely make out what the now tiny Chairwoman was saying, but she seems very scared, too frightened to even move.

"Not so tough now, Chairwoman?"

Yuriko crouched down to have a look, before she picked up the tiny Chairwoman with her fingers. She lifted her up towards her face. The Chairwoman went from frightened to outright frustration, kicking and screaming, even as she was powerless against a much taller Yuriko.

"What do you suggest, boys? Put her in a cage or something?"

No one said a word. Not even you. Despite what all the Chairwoman had done to you, you still knew how it felt to be tiny and at the mercy of giantesses all this time.

"Could you let me see my granddaughter?"

An oddly familiar voice came from behind you guys, and all four of you turned around to have a look. There stood two people: one old man in a lab coat, with white hair and glasses. The other was a woman, best described as a fully grown up and mature image of Yuriko. The two of them then headed towards Yuriko. As they came towards you, you decided to just let them pass. The woman the stretched her hand out, as if telling Yuriko to hand the tiny Chairwoman to her. Yuriko was hesitant, but the woman nodded, and Yuriko did likewise. Surprisingly, the tiny Chairwoman did not resist as she was laid on the woman's palm, even as the old man went to have a look.

"It seems I have miscalculated with my Master Plan." The old man said gingerly.

"Wait ... your Master Plan? Who are you, old man?" You finally asked.

The old man turned to you, but simply paused for a while before he finally spoke.

"It is good to see you, Hiroki Iketani."

You got shocked. This is an old man whom you have never met, yet he knows your name.

"OK ... this is getting weird ..."

The old man then continued.

"My name is Hiroki Iketani. I am you ... 50 years later."

You could not believe this relevation that the old man standing in front of you is indeed your future self, but the older Hiroki simply reached in his lab coat, and pulled out a portable flatscreen (or something), and pressed a few times on it. After that, some holographic images appeared from the screen. The images were not pleasant, displaying what appears to be a scene from an apocalyptic movie. Ruined buildings, bodies all over the floor, occasional sounds of shouting, chopping and gunfire.

"A world with three trillion people ... and not enough space to keep them all. People started fighting among themselves to secure a living. This is the world, 50 years from now. It pains me to see people fighting and dying to etch out a living, especially since ... I lost the love of my life to these riots ..."

The old man turned to have a look at Yuriko, as if remembering some good memories of the past. You raised an eyebrow, but said nothing.

"This is why I sent my granddaughter back, and to put my Master Plan into action, namely shrinking down the world's population so we have more time to prepare for the inevitable space problem. Before she left, I did ask her to contact my earlier self, but ... it seems I have miscalculated. She got sent 60 years back. I would have been a pre-schooler then."

The old man chuckled. After a brief laugh, he turned towards you again.

"I have said many things, but it's all the truth. As for my granddaughter, I'll let my Yuka handle her." The older Hiroki pointed to the other woman, who does resemble Yuriko a lot., only much older.

"OK, now I have seen everything ..."

Yuriko said, looking at Yuka, with the tiny Chairwoman still resting in her palm.

"You will grow up to be like that, Yuriko-chan. Trust me on that."

The old man winked. Then, he turned right back to you.

"I will be taking my granddaughter back with me now, and restore her size proper. However, to my younger self, I have spoken the truth, and I have provided you with all the resources necessary for the Master Plan to proceed. Now, the decision ... is yours. Let's go, Yuka."

Yuka nodded, and went to the old man Hiroki's side. The old man Hiroki then pulled out another gadget from his lab coat, a silver stopwatch, or what appears to be. The older Hiroki simply turned a few knobs, and in a flash, they simply vanished, leaving the four of you behind.

The four of you stand within a ruined Marunouchi, and it will not be long before the Self Defense Forces arrive.

"Hiroki. Before we go, I need to ask you this question."

Shuhei said.

"What do you intend to do now, after hearing ... well, your older self's ... words ... Do you want to go ahead with this Master Plan thing or not?"

"What do you guys suggest?" You asked.

"Well, the outlook 50 years later seems grim, and although it sounds radical, maybe shrinking the world's population down could buy us some time before the inevitable, hopefully we would have a solution by then."

"Yuriko?" You turned to her direction.

"OK ... I'm still a little freaked out with seeing an older Hiroki, especially after giving me that look, but ... although this is something I believe Hiroki will think of, present or future, but I think shrinking the world's population down is not the right thing to do. I mean, the girls who knew of this plan got intoxicated with power and advanced technology. I refuse to live in a world where people are dominated by their sizes. That ... includes not having me as your personal giantess to play with, Hiroki.:

The decision that could change the world, both present and 50 years later, is up to you now. What will it be?
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: When Hiroki Met ... Hiroki?

1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
"I guess you are right, Yuriko." You said. "As grim as the future may hold for us 50 years later, I don't believe that my, or what will be my Master Plan is the solution. All the technology that had been provided for us have been nothing but trouble."

"But what about the reality that your future self described?" Hiroshi asked, worriedly. "You really want that to happen?"

"The future is not cast in stone, Hiroshi." You said. "I think I learned that after the entire adventure we had and everything we had went through." You started swinging your right arm. "I have not felt this athletic since I got smaller. Ironically, I have the shrinking incident for that."

You could hear the sound of heavy vehicles coming, and it is most likely the Japanese Self Defense Forces.

"We should get out of here before we plan." You said. "Besides, we have 50 years to think about that."

Everyone nodded, and the four of you decided to make yourselves scarce, before the JSDF starts suspecting you.

===

Ruined buildings dotted the landscape. Bodies were strewn all over the place, either bloodied or mutilated. In the distance, the sound of gunfire and explosions rocked the place. The people that still survive were running for their lives, while those that tripped or cannot catch up ended up as prey for bullets and shells. The survivors never turned back, even as their kin or loved ones get shot or bayoneted by pursuing soldiers.

Suddenly, everything went black. It was the work of a remote control, switching off the television screen in front.

"Aw, Grandpa! I wanted to see that!" A young female voice called out.

"Look, I know you are nearly 18, but this is not the appropriate show for young ladies to watch. That's it! No more war correspondence videos from now on." A older male voice called out.

The young lady just got up and went into her room, not even turning around to look.

"Dad, I think you are being a little too harsh on Hanako." Another female voice came into the picture. "You know, I think she may have Mom's genes after all."

"Sigh, I sure miss the days when I was younger." The old voice said.

"I know, I know." The female voice answered. "Here, Dad." A young woman in her late 30s hands you the newspaper. Taking the newspaper, you opened the pages, and started reading it. After a while, you sighed.

"Why do people always have to fight and kill each other over space? For crying out loud, the planet's only asset is its boundaries." You lamented. "Even if we shrink ourselves down, people are still going to fight and kill each other anyway."

You then started coughing. Old age had taken a toll on your health.

"Dad, you should take care of yourself." The young woman said, rushing towards your side.

"How about listening to your daughter for once, Hiroki?" Another female voice said, this one much older than before. It was an old woman, who slowly stumbled into the room, with a cane in her left hand.

"Yuriko, you should be inside resting!" You suddenly got up, and rushed to your wife's side.

"You keep telling me to rest, Hiroki. How about you do the same as well?" Old woman Yuriko retorted. "Ever since we got married, you had dedicated your entire life into the space colonization program. Now that Earth is finally free of its overcrowding problem, you deserve a break. Yuka is already doing so well in your footsteps. You can trust our daughter to carry on your work."

"Sigh ... you win, Yuriko." You said. "Even after you retired from your journalist life, you can still provide a strong and solid argument."

"How about you both just sit down and enjoy some peace and quiet instead?" Yuka said, her hands resting on two single seat couches, one on each hand. "Mom on this side. Dad, the other."

You slowly helped his wife towards one of the couches, and together with his daughter, gently placed her down on it. After that, you also took his place on the other couch.

"There, perfect." Yuka said, satisfied with the sight in front of her. "Now, I will leave you two while I attend to Hanako. I'll try and calm her down."

Yuka left the living room, and went after her daughter.

"You know, Yuriko, I never thought that after all these years, I will still be with you." You said, turning to face your wife. "Perhaps Yuka was right, maybe I should be slowing down and catching up on the time we had lost. Me on the space program, and you on your journalist career."

"We both need to slow down." Yuriko answered. "I may not have the looks that I used to have any more, but my love for you is still strong after all these years. I knew I had chosen the right man to be with for the rest of my life."

"As do I, Yuriko." You said. "Besides the decision to now shrink everyone, I have never regretted the decision to marry you and start our family. In fact, I may even call them the two best decisions I have ever made in my life."

"Oh you." Yuriko said, as she placed her hand just slightly beside yours. Without hesitation, you placed your hand over hers, the love between you two having not wavered even after five decades.

"Best decision of my life." You said to yourself as you enjoyed the peace and quiet that you have worked hard to achieve without relying on the shrinking technology.

(Peaceful Ending)
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: No Shrinking, 50 Years Later ...

choices: Stay Here And Carry Out Your Threat
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.content:
You decided to stop the mastermind: the Chairwoman herself, and ran straight towards her. Although it seems crazy to face a giantess head on, there really might be no other way. The Chairwoman turns her head around, and sees you approach her.

"YOU WON'T STOP ME!"

She turns her full body away from the supersomputer and faces you head on. She lifts her foot, and goes for a stomp, which you managed to dodge after all the "practise" you had. She tried again, but the result was the same. After a few failed stomp attempts, she's had enough, and reached her hand and tried to grab you.

You waited for her hand to get dangerously close to you before you dodged. Normally, this would have been a foolish move, but you needed her to bring her hand down for whatever you had planned. Her hand slammed down on the floor, which you took the chance to climb up, and into her sleeve. Before she could react, you hurriedly climbed up her forearm.

"HEY! QUIT IT! I'M TICKLISH!"

She gave away her weakness, you thought to yourself. Originally, you had planned to use her body as leverage to get to the supercomputer, but now you have a better (and somewhat perverted) idea. From her forearm, you climbed your way up towards her shoulder, and then towards her neck. Wherever you climb, it felt very ticklish to the Chairwoman, who could not stop laughing.

"AHAHAHAHAHA! NOT FAIR! AHAHAHAHAHA!"

Ignoring her loud voice, you went straight down onto her chest, and landed between her breasts, which were not that big in comparison to Yuriko or Shizuka. Using her bra as leverage, you held onto the lacey material, and slowly edged your way towards her back. The design of your school's uniform made it hard for a person to simply rip open their clothes, so you were quite safe from the Chairwoman attempting to grab you. You bypassed her other arm, and by crawling past her armpit, your hair inadvertedly touched another sensitive spot, causing her to laugh out again.

"AHH! NOT THERE!"

You knew it was a matter of time before she could not take more of this, so you decided to capitalize. You slid down her back (very carefully) and caught the rim of her panties before you fell straight out. From there, you made your way around again, back to the "front".

For a while, your weight almost caused you to pull her panties down, although just slightly, but she certainly felt it, and closed her legs together, unable to move of sorts. If you want to stop her, maybe crawling inside her panties may be justified, but then again, pulling her panties down where you are might just be threat you need. Your call.
1123112122111112111121222122122111221121.title: A Ticklish Giantess

11231121221111121111212221221222.content:
Before you can reach the bubble capsule, Shizuka placed her massive foot in your way, effectively blocking your way towards it. The impact of her shoe slamming down also caused you to lose balance and fall on the floor, with the Yamamoto brothers landing right on you. All three of you were easy prey for Shizuka if she wanted to finish you guys off.

Surprisingly, she removed her shoe away from your path, and landed it just a short distance away. You thought she was going to let you in, but you were sorely mistaken when you saw Shizuka's huge hand slamming down on above all three of you, and then promptly picking you up, bringing you guys up towards the massive features of her face.

ZZZZZAP!!!

"Oh dear! Looks like the resizing device went off without you guys inside it. Now you guys are going to stay at half a centimeter ... permanently!"

Though she was whispering just so you guys can understand her, you never liked Shizuka because of her fondness to gloat, even over the smallest of matters. She certainly is enjoying this, gloating about her size in comparison and he fact that your ticket back to normal size just fizzled off. As the machine finally ran out of power, Shizuka then turned her attention to you.

"Looks like I hit the jackpot: the geekiest guy in school that always outdo me; the suave kid everybody's talking about; and a potential Superbike World Champion in the making. The best part is: I own them now!"

"WHAT!" You exclaimed.

"You heard me, Hiroki! All 3 of you are my pets now! Forget about returning back to normal size, because that will NEVER happen! Besides, Hiroshi is kinda cute, and now I own him."

You gulped down some saliva down your throat after hearing this shocking news. What will happen to you at the hands of this "mistress"?

A/N: I'm not very good with the upcoming parts, so additions are greatly welcomed.
11231121221111121111212221221222.title: Shizuka's New Pets

112311212211111211112122212212221.content:
After a short pause, Shizuka started removing her shoes. Looking down from her hand, you can see that it will be a LONG drop down, whether you end up inside the shoe or not. You had already been in Yuriko's shoe last night, but you know Shizuka is not like Yuriko: she will torture you inside the shoe.

"This little one goes in here ... "

Shizuka whispered, and dropped Shuhei into her right loafer. You could only watch in horror as Shuhei fell down and dropped inside the hole and inside Shizuka's loafer before she put it on again, trapping him inside.

"Your turn, geek boy!"

She then dropped you inside her left shoe, and you fell inside the giant loafer. The smell inside the shoe was less than pleasant, but you had to go deeper as you can see Shizuka's socked foot hovering above you, ready to slip in. You ran until you reached the toe of the shoe, and with that, trapping you inside her shoe until heaven knows when.

Shizuka then started walking again, causing you to get bumped about inside the shoe. Your face also got into contact with Shizuka's sock, which smelled terrible. Trapped in a stinky enviroment with your "mistress" in total control, this was going to be the rest of your life, it seems.

Eventually, she went home, and inside her room, she finally removed her shoes. When you saw the light again, you went out, and saw Shizuka's face looking down at you.

"I'm going to have some fun with Hiroshi here, so I expect you pets to behave! If you even think about getting out of my shoes, you are going to get it! Do you understand?"

Under her threat, you gently nodded your head, and Shizuka then left you alone. Gasping for fresh air, you could only imagine what would happen if you defied her back there. Slouching back into the giant loafer, you patiently waited until a perfect time to move. From a far distance, you could hear Shizuka's loud giggling. Obviously she was "playing" with Hiroshi one way or another.

Do you want to get out of the shoe (and risk punishment) or stay where you are (and pray for Hiroshi's safety)?
112311212211111211112122212212221.title: The Shoe Slaves

choices: She Puts You Back In The Shoe
1123112122111112111121222122122211.content:
The more you hear Shizuka's giggling, the more you started to worry. From the distance, you could hear another voice, and feeling curious, you climbed up the back of the shoe, which felt like a wall to you. Still very worried, you managed to escape your prison, as if you were given a boost of sorts.

The voice was Shuhei, who too made his escape to rescue his brother. However, the successful escape made you realize how small you were, and even if you reached Shizuka, what were you going to do then? You wanted to turn back, and crawl back into the shoe, but from the distance, Shizuka's half-naked body sat up from her bed, and making things worse, she sees the both of you!

"YOU CREEPS! YOU'RE TRYING TO ESCAPE!"

It was too late. Even if you were to scramble back into her shoe, it would be all for nothing. You tried to run away, but you could hear the loud thumps of Shizuka's feet, louder with every step. Eventually, she managed to pin you both under her socked feet. Not only was she heavy, since much of the weight was pinned on her feet, but the socks also stank. Being pinned underneath a stinky sock was never a feasible thing, regardless of size.

"HAD ENOUGH?"

She removed her foot away and dropped it down beside you with a loud thump. You do not want to think about what she was going to do next.

"I CAN KEEP SHUHEI, SINCE I WILL NEED HIM TO GET HIROSHI-SAN'S OBEDIENCE. BUT YOU, HIROKI, ARE EXPENDABLE!"

She picked up Shuhei and placed him back into his "prison". As for you, she definitely has "punishment" in mind. She reached for a pistol of sorts on her desk, and aimed it right at you. Before long, she shot you with the powerful beam, and you find yourself getting smaller and smaller. Shizuka's foot now felt like the size of an amphitheater.

Not long after, you saw Shizuka's massive finger picking you up, and you braced yourself for her "punishment". What did she do?

A/N: Either way, you're screwed.
1123112122111112111121222122122211.title: Busted!

11231121221111121111212221221222111.content:
It was not long before you knew what Shizuka was going to do. She opened her mouth, exposing her white teeth and disgustingly slimey tongue. You then feel yourself descending, and Shizuka only merely tipped her finger slightly, indicating how small and insignificant you are to her. You tried your best to avoid falling into her gaping mouth, but nothing was going to work, and you find yourself falling right into Shizuka's enormous mouth.

"AHHH ... "

Your loud screams were for nothing, since your voice is now beyond audible. The long fall down into Shizuka's mouth was over as soon as it begun. The fall down Shizuka's esophagus felt like falling down a bottomless pit, except you are surrounded by a fleshy red wall rather than pitch darkness. If only you knew what was waiting for you when this "ordeal" is over.

SPLASH!

You landed in a vast lake of stomach acid, and you immediately felt its effects. Your clothes started dissolving, followed by your flesh. You pulled out your hand from the acid, but you saw your skeletal hand. Shocked at seeing your own hand dissolved, you whited out, resigning whatever was left of your body to Shizuka's body to dissolve.

Shizuka barely felt you going down her esophagus, and you hardly register as a blip inside her stomach. All that matters now is to play with her favorite pet, oblivious to what your sister and Yuriko might feel.

(Non-canon ending)
11231121221111121111212221221222111.title: Fall Of Death

choices: She Is Ordering Something Over The Phone
1123112122111112111121222122122212.content:
Considering your current size and situation, it would be suicide (if not impossible) to stand up to Shizuka. In addition, the shoe had completel "walled" you off from the outside world, minus the ceiling. The only thing that you can do is just stay inside her loafer and behave. Outside, you could still hear Shizuka's giggling, still with Hiroshi as her favorite pet. You decided against thinking about it, and just do nothing.

Hours passed, and you had dozed off after just hanging around inside the shoe. You got tired of waiting, and you fell asleep after a while. You wished that you could just stay that way, but Shizuka had a rude awakening planned for you.

WHAM!

The loud sound shook you up, and when you finally came to your senses, you could see three large grains of rice in front of you. You looked up, and you could see the tall figure of Shizuka towering above you outside the shoe. Surprisingly, she did not have that sourpuss look she reserves for you at school.

"DINNER IS SERVED! NOW EAT!"

With that, she walked away. You did not know what was going on, but you were quite hungry. Slowly, you reached and grabbed one of the grains, slightly bigger than you at your current size, and started eating. It felt funny eating a single rice grain like this, but you were too hungry to care. While having your meal, you could hear Shizuka talking to someone of sorts, but you could barely understand what she was saying. What do you think?
1123112122111112111121222122122212.title: Dinner Is Served

11231121221111121111212221222.content:
You could hear a Teenage Girl from outside the small passage. In fact, the 3 of you heard 2 voices. You knew by heart one belonged to Yuriko, but the other didn't seem to familiar to you, but it sure struck the Yamamoto Boys. "What's wrong?" You asked Hiroshi, who had been trembling, but Shuhei had been energetic to hear the voice.

"C'mon! Let's go see her!" Shuhei said, running ahead. Hiroshi never replied to your question, but walked slowly. You helped guide him through the tunnel. Outside, were 2 teenagers talking, namely, Yuriko, and Motoko Kijima. "So, have you seen 2 5 inch tall boys?" Motoko asked Yuriko, but she was telling her only about you.

You, Shuhei, and Hiroshi, had come up to the gate, and had been noticed by Motoko and Yuriko. "Ah!" They said, both relived. Upon being picked up by the respective protectors, Yuriko and Motoko had asked the same question: "Did you find anything?"

All 3 of you replied "No.". They both looked depressed, and decided to head to...
11231121221111121111212221222.title: Motoko Kijima

1123112122111112112.content:
Yuriko's house had not changed since you last came here, though you were normal-sized then. Yuriko was an only child, and both her parents often went overseas for work, so she stays alone. Reiko and yourself would drop by her house to accompany her, but this is the first time you had ever came here alone.

Inside her house, she took you out of her breast pocket, and gently placed you on her study desk in her room. Her room had not changed either, looking around. Everything was exactly the same, only much bigger from your perspective.

"OK, Hiroki. I need to take a shower. Be a good boy and stay here, OK? I'll be right back."

Yuriko then left her room, leaving you alone inside. Though you didn't like being treated like a little boy, being the eldest in your family, Yuriko was still kind enough to allow you to stay inside her room, though you are confined to the study desk. You decide to have a look around the desk and see what Yuriko had. There was the picture where you, Reiko and herself took when the three of you went to the amustment park at Yokohama Harbor. Nearby were her writing pencils and pens in a container, though all of them were too big for you to use. The real attraction was the Yuki-chan mug you gave on her 10th birthday. Yuriko was a huge fan of the anime series, and you dumped all your savings just to get that Yuki-chan (her favorite snowman character) mug for her. After all this time, she still kept it intact and never even used it, as it still looked in mint condition.

Good memories, you thought to yourself. I must take Yuriko out to enjoy herself when this whole fiasco is over. While you were looking around, is Yuriko done with her shower?
1123112122111112112.title: Yuriko's House

choices: Leave The Desk And Find Yuriko
Stay On The Desk And Fantasize About Yuriko Even More
11231121221111121122.content:
Although only five minutes have passed, it must have felt like 30 minutes to you. You were getting tired of looking at the Yuki-chan mug, and there was only how much Yuriko's desk could offer you. You could never understand why the ladies take long showers, even Reiko could hog the bathtub at home for twenty minutes back home. If Reiko took twenty minutes, then you can assume Yuriko was going to take as long, probably longer.

You lay back on the desk, staring at the ceiling, awaiting Yuriko's return. The blank ceiling resembled the screen of those projector screens at school, and you started to imagine images on the ceiling. Of course, the only thought you had was Yuriko. Although she had grown considerably, she had always kept her hair short, decorated with a similar pink hairband. The pink hairband, as you remembered, was a gift from her father when he got promoted, shortly before her parents started traveling a lot. If not for your father agreeing to be her legal guardian while her folks were away, you might not be here right now. Even though you were not her boyfriend, it seems like fate had a strange way of keeping you two together.

Yuriko's growth. The moment that thought entered your mind, you remembered just a few days ago, you accidentally stumbled into Reiko's room, where your sister and Yuriko were changing. Yuriko always seemed to like the color pink, as even her bra and panties were pink. Although it was only a glimpse before Reiko threw a pillow at you to get you out, your mind started imagining Yuriko wearing that same bra and panties. You flustered at the thought of that, and you placed your hands on your nose. Luckily, there was no nosebleed, but the image of Yuriko wearing only her undies was just not easy to just shake off. The perverted side of you started to focus on Yuriko's bosom, and how they bounded about while you were in her pocket.

In that instant, you got up, trying to snap out of the perverted trance you almost fell into. You looked at the clock on Yuriko's desk, and to your disappointment, only ten minutes have passed. The boredom of staying on your childhood friend's desk with only a cartoon character on a mug for company was starting to bother you. After imagining Yuriko in only her undies, you started to get tempted to leave the desk to find Yuriko in the shower. At the same time, the longer you stayed here, you have no idea how many more perverted thoughts of Yuriko might flood your minds. I'm not that kind of person, you thought to yourself, but the image of Yuriko in her undies remained imprinted in your mind.

What will you do now?
11231121221111121122.title: Memories of Yuriko

11231121221111122.content:
As Yuriko's footsteps get dangerously close to your position, you break out in sweat, and prayed that she sees you. Nothing seemed to work.

"YURIKO! DOWN HERE! NOOO!"

BOOM!

Yuriko's giant loafer crashed down on the floor, flattening her bracelet piece, yourself, everything down. The pressure and Yuriko's weight was just too much for your body to take, and you were squashed like an egg being dropped from a high building, your blood spilling out all over the place. You had pinned for Yuriko to help you, but she ended up killing you.

Meanwhile, after looking for a while to no avail, Yuriko decided to call off the search. What's lost is lost, she thought. I'll get Hiroki to come with me to make a new piece in the weekend. She had no idea that she had just flattened and killed her own childhood friend who had found her missing piece. Somehow, Reiko is going to be really unhappy about this ...

(Non-canon Ending)
11231121221111122.title: Stepped On!

11231122.content:
BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

You tried to move but you are still too tired. As you saw the feet approaching you like a fast bullet train, all you saw was a huge trainer hovering above you, and next, you were crushed underneath it. It one single step, you were crushed: bones, organs, the lot.

As the trainer kicked back from the jogging motion, your body was flung aside, and landed on the floor, the bloodstain from that same body stuck on the trainer. Nobody really knew what happened to you after that, only said that Hiroki Iketani, high school student, disappeared on the first day of school without a trace, and never seen since. No one, it appears, will ever know about the shrink device and how it was responsible for your death.

(Non-canon Ending)
11231122.title: Crushed!

11233.content:
You entered the room labelled "Mystery Room", and as you entered the dark and drafty room, what you are about to see will never escape from the memories of your mind.

The room was dark, and you didn't have a flashlight. Morever, the switch to this room was faulty for some reason, so the only way to have a look around is to leave the door open. Looking around this drafty room felt like walking around a morgue, as all you see hanging on the various shelves in the room are insects in jars, some of them already dead. On another shelf, various robot prototypes that the Technology Club had yet to test or failed products after testing. You knew that the Club Chairman, Tetsuya Takahashi, was a robot freak, but you never really thought he would do this.

Walking through this whole room once was enough to send shivers down one's spine, and you are no exception. You wanted to get out of this room, away from the dead insects and machinery debris. Strangely, you found something that should not even be in this school building at all: a lever at the end of the room. You pressed it down, and to your surprise, a hatch at the bottom opened up, and it was lit. Do you want to go in, or do you want to get out of this madhouse?
11233.title: The Weird Files

112331.content:
It was surprisingly bright under the secret hatch as you continued your way inside. Everything you have seen at school right now is just unbelieveable. Whatever it was, it probably cost a lot of money. Putting your doubts and conspiracy theories aside, you decide to just keep going further in.

At the end of the passage is a very large room, with a very weird pattern in the center. Curious, you walked forward, into the middle of the pattern, which looked more like a symbol than just a simple pattern. However, before you could examine it, something weird happened. Four giant pillars with some weird orbs on top suddenly glowed up, and the next moment, you felt your body zapped with electricity. Though it felt like electricity, it didn't really hurt, but you felt your brain going numb, and like a man possessed, you left the center of the symbol, walking forward like a typical zombie, except you weren't out for brains.

As you walked down the small staircase at the other end of the passage, your body suddenly felt smaller and smaller, but your brain was too numb to feel anything for a while. After a while, your body regained consciousness, but your body was too tired to go on, so you collapsed on the floor.

Unknown to you, Shizuka Kinugawa, your nemesis and also a member of the Technology Club, had spotted someone entering the "Mystery Room" and went in to investigate. She saw that the secret hatch had opened, and entering the weird room where you had shrunk, she saw that the shrinking device that she had a hand in developing was still a little hot. She came to the conclusion: someone had came in contact with the shrink machine, and had been shrunk down. She then left the room, swearing to track down and slience whoever saw the machine before the "Great Plan" can be put into effect.

Meanwhile, ...
112331.title: Shrinking Down

1123311.content:
You regained consciousness, your brain feeling like it was barely thawing out of a massive brain freeze. Your body didn't hurt, but you still placed your hand on your head, still reeling from the "brain freeze" you got earlier. You don't remember much, except entering a small hatch and finding some mysterious device which fired electricity. That was all you could remember.

You looked at yourself, and to your relief, you still had your clothes on. You looked around at where you are, and to your surprise, you don't really know this place. You do know you are underground, with the lack of windows in this mysterious room. The ceiling, for some reason, seemed higher than usual. The floorboards too felt too wide for any normal plank you had seen. The bookshelf at the edge felt like a skyscraper to you as you approached, and it was after having a look did you finally realize what had happened: you had shrunk! How small you are still remains a mystery.

The underground room felt creepy at your shrunken state, something you never thought of as a normal-sized person. You look around the room to find a possible escape route, and you find two holes, one on each end of the room. You can only choose one path, so which would it be?
1123311.title: This Is Me?

choices: You Got Out Of The Way
You Failed To Move In Time
11233111.content:
You decided to head north, and at the end of the hole was the corridor at school. It was too risky to venture out, considering the number of people out there, all the size of giants to you. You decide to stay at the hole until it was finally safe to come out.

Your chance came when the school bell rang, and the students started flocking towards their respective classrooms. The sound of the floor being pounded by countless footsteps was deafening, but if you don't want to be squashed unnecessarily, you have to endure this "ordeal".

It was soon silent, and you had a glance outside your hole, and to your relief, the huge corridor is empty. Everyone had gone for their respective classes. You got out of your hole, and started dusting yourself clean. However, it looks like the corridor is not completely empty, as you can feel the ground starting to shake, and the rocking motion seems to be getting more intense. You looked around, and to your horror, you could see a school girl running straight TOWARDS YOU!

If you were normal sized, it would be just a normal bump, but now, her shoes are the size of elephants. You feel like a helpless victim facing a fast moving bullet train! You have to get away, NOW!
11233111.title: Danger At The Corridor

112331111.content:
With lightning quick reflexes, you quickly jumped out of the way, as the giant girl's shoes crashed inches away from you. The next moment, they were gone. After you were safe, all you could see in the far distance was the giant girl who almost crushed you being reprimanded by her teacher. It was a close shave back then, and a second later would have you ending up the wrong way.

You were not sure how or why you dived out of the way, but it clearly saved your life back then. However, you had no time for idle chat as you needed to find a way to get yourself back to normal. There was no use just standing around, so you decided to follow along the now vacant corridor.

What felt like a few steps to you at normal size felt like walking around your neighborhood multiple times. You eventually stopped, somewhat tired. As you looked at yourself, you could feel yourself breathing better, and you were not as tired as you were at normal size. Normally, you would be out of breath by now, but you could still go on.

As you looked up at your surroundings, it seemed like you had stopped directly beside a door. It was as tall as a skyscraper, but you could easily fit right through the gap below. You had to squint your eyes to have a look at the label. The label reads ...
112331111.title: A Walk Along The Corridor

1123311111.content:
"Health Room"

That was what was written on the label. You remembered that a new teacher had been assigned there, but you did not really care. You could feel the ground shaking, indicating that something is coming. Wasting no time, you crouched down and made your way through the gap.

You were inside the health room, which seemed like a place of torture at your size. Upon first glance around the room, you wondered if you had made a mistake coming in here. Before you could get out, the door opened, revealing a woman with long black hair and very pretty features on her face and body. It was then did you recognize the woman who just entered. She was Motoko Kijima, a top scholar. You remembered her as an expert in health sciences and robotics, but no explanation why she would become a teacher here.

It was when Ms. Kijima started walking did you realize how small you really were. Standing literally beside her feet, she felt even taller than the Tokyo Tower at your size. If there was a person who could help you, Ms. Kijima might be your best bet, since she is an expert at health sciences and mechanics. You could try and climb up her body to get her attention, or try another way.
1123311111.title: Inside The Health Room

11233111112.content:
You thought that if you climbed Ms. Kijima's body, she would either squash you flat with her hand if spotted, and even if she sees you as you are, you will probably be seen as a pervert. Another idea is needed. You spot the swiveling chair nearby, which could be a platform for you to get her attention. You saw her foot shifting again, and hurried to the chair before you get squashed under her black pumps.

It was only when you got close to the chair did you realize the daunting task ahead for you. You were not physically fit, and climbing the tower like chair would be impossible at your height. All is not lost, however, as you noticed Ms. Kijima's lab coat hanging all the way down to the floor. You could use the coat to climb the chair, so you went towards the lab coat the size of football fields.

You managed to climb the lab coat by clinging onto the fabric, which was surprisingly strong. Eventually, you managed to reach the main seat of the chair. At this height, it might be easier for you to get spotted, but there is the risk of being sat on literally. Otherwise, you can try and crawl into the lab coat pocket just a few "meters"above you. Choose carefully.
11233111112.title: Climbing The Chair

112331111121.content:
You decided to try and get her attention despite the risks. Gently sliding the fabric of the lab coat, you reached the base of the chair seat, which felt like the size of a football field to you. Of course, this also decreases the chances of you being seen by Ms. Kijima, who was still flipping through some files.

At a close examination, you suddenly realized that your uniform color was no different from the color of the seat! This makes the chances of being seen even slimmer. You wanted to kick yourself for not noticing this small detail, but you had to find something as an alternative. Looking at yourself, you noticed the white shirt underneath your gakuran (uniform). Hurriedly, you removed your coat, and unbuttoned your shirt. Slipping your coat back on, you held your shirt in your hands, ready for Ms. Kijima to notice you.

As if by chance, Ms. Kijima started walking towards her desk, still flipping through her files. Your chance came, so you started waving your shirt frantically, hoping she would see you, or at least your shirt. As she gets closer, you waved your shirt like mad, praying that she would see you. Did it work?
112331111121.title: Grabbing Attention

1123311111211.content:
It worked! You got the attention of Ms. Kijima before she sat on you and turning you into a red stain on her rear. However, what happens next was not what you had expected. She crouched down to have a look at you, at almost 0.5 cm in height, waving your shirt at her.

"Uh ... Hi ... "

All you saw was Ms. Kijima's eye staring right at you, as if she had seen a ghost of sorts.

"KYA!!!"

It was simply too much for the relief teacher, as after letting out an almost ear-piercing scream, she fainted right down on the floor. She had seen you, but it was simply too much for her to take, and she fainted. So much for trying to get her attention.

You got down from the chair, and went towards Ms. Kijima's body just lying there on the floor. Ms. Kijima's body felt like a miniature mountain range from your perspective. You saw her skirt, and her legs wide open for "exploration". You blushed slightly after visualizing what might be in there, but then again, Ms. Kijima's scream might have attracted attention. Do you want to stay here and wait, or do you want to take the chance to scale Ms. Kijima's body?
1123311111211.title: Down And Out

11233111112111.content:
You got the perverted look in your face as you thought about what you are about to do next. Hurriedly, you headed for your "starting point": the base of Ms. Kijima's skirt.

"Sorry! I'm coming in!"

You then crawled inside her skirt, and climbed up one of her legs. Your body formed a "bulge" on Ms. Kijima's skirt, but your main priority is to try and get her awake. You went forward, bypassing her silky white panties. Normally, you would want to go in there, but now is not the time.

You then made your way past her hips and onto her stomach, bypassing her navel in the process. You could hear Ms. Kijima moaning a little, perhaps a sign that she might be awake soon. From her stomach, you arrived at her chest, with her breasts covered by a silky white bra. Ms. Kijima was quite a well-endowed person, but this time, it might be a challenge for you. Scaling her breasts was not a simple task at your size, but you had no choice.

Using her bra as leverage, you made your way up. Even so, it felt like climbing up a small hill, and physically, you weren't the best. You reached the peak, but by then, you were getting tired, and following that, you tumbled straight down, landing somewhere above Ms. Kijima's blouse collar.

"Man! That was tiring!"

As you said that, did your "host" awaken?
11233111112111.title: Just Playing Around

112331111121111.content:
"Uh ... uh ..."

You could hear Ms. Kijima's voice from where you are, directly above her collar. Her eyes opened, a bit groggy at first, but she eventually regained consciousness. As she slowly got up, you could feel yourself sliding down again. As much as you do not want to be found at your current spot, falling down and getting stepped on is even worse. With whatever strength you have left, you squeezed tightly on her flesh, making sure you do not fall off her body. Luckily, she did not stand up completely, and peering down at whatever was grabbing her chest, she saw your tiny frame. She did not seem hostile from the look in her eyes, but simply reached for you with her fingers, and gently placed you down on her right breast (fully clothed, of course).

"Hey, I know you. You are that boy. The son of Iketani-sensei."

You saw Ms. Kijima's eyes, and an old memory suddenly returned. You remember the time when your father took you and Reiko for an autograph session, when you were only 5 years old and Reiko was still an infant. Sure enough, you remember a very perky high-school student anxiously waiting for your mangaka father to sign the copy of your father's manga series, "Galactic Agent No 7."

"How on earth did you get so small?"

You shook your head and raised your palm towards your "host", indicating that it was a long story, and you did not want to tell it ... at least not now.

With that, Ms. Kijima picked you up from her breast, and gently placed you on her left palm. She walked towards her desk, and then gently moved you from her palm onto the desk.

"Much better?"

You nodded your head, and then Ms. Kijima turned away and headed to her cupboard. After rummaging through it for a while, she took out a speaker and a miniature microphone, and then placed the microphone near your body. Now you can properly communicate with her.

"Thanks, Kijima-sensei." You spoke through the microphone, with a voice audible enough for normal human ears.

After nearly an hour, you managed to spill the beans about the incident, not to mention a few peeps at Ms. Kijima's body. She did not seem to mind, and even smiled and giggled at certain parts of your story. When you have finished, she gently placed her index finger over your head, and gently stroked your hair.

"You remind me of my own little brother." Ms. Kijima said. "Very smart, very mischievous, and a little on the perverted side too. I can help you, Iketani-kun."

"R ... really, sensei?" You exclaimed, eager about the prospect.

"My brother was also victim of a shrink ray, though that was a few years ago. It slipped my mind when I saw you back then, which is why I ... blacked out. I think I can create an antidote, but I am not sure if I remember it correctly. Then again, chemistry is my best subject, so there should be no harm trying it."

What do you say?
112331111121111.title: A Talk With Kijima-sensei

choices: You Start To Shrink Even Further!
1123311111211111.content:
"It's worth a try." You said. Although you have reservations about this teacher and her offer, you decided to take a risk and try out.

Kijima-sensei smiled at you, but said nothing. After that, she turned around and walked towards her medicine cabinet. She opened it, and started rummaging through the plastic bottles and other apparatus inside. She took out about three bottles, each containing a liquid of a different color. She then took out an empty test tube, headed towards the nearest sink, and started pouring the liquids, carefully, into the test tube one after the other. Her back was turned towards you, but you could tell she was being very careful, lest something happen.

After a while, she turned around to face you, with the test tube filled with some brownish liquid inside. She signaled you to stand up, which you did, and she slowly poured the liquid over you. There was no taste or smell, but the color of the liquid made you feel a little ill, not to mention that it stirred up some horrid memories when Shizuka and her clique pranked you by dumping a bucket of sludge over you as payback for beating her in a science quiz.

"It might take a while for the liquid to be absorbed in your skin, so be patient." Kijima-sensei softly whispered. In your amazement, the liquid was no longer present, not even on your clothing. The liquid must be already been absorbed into your skin and clothing, you thought to yourself. You took a deep breath, and breathed out, hoping for something to happen.

After a minute of waiting ...
1123311111211111.title: Chemical Test Subject

choices: Make Your Way Towards The Gurney
11233111112111111.content:
Five minutes passed. Then ten. By the time of the fifteen minute mark, it was obvious: the potion was not working.

"Sensei! Your potion is not working!" You cried out.

Kijima-sensei had the confused look on her face.

"Strange! It should have worked. This was the exact formula that restored my brother."

There was some liquid left in the test tube, so Kijima-sensei reached down her desk, and pulled out one of her spare high heel shoes., and placed it next to you. At your current size, it looked like it could be the ideal house for you, if nobody wore it. Kijima-sensei poured whatever remains of the liquid onto the shoe. Just like you before, the liquid got absorbed really fast by the shoe.

Imagine your shock when you saw the shoe get bigger before you. At Kijima-sensei's perspective, the shoe grew about 25% bigger, due to how little potion was used, but to you, it felt like a bungalow house just got upgraded into a two-floor house.

"So it does work ..." You and Kijima-sensei said in unison.

Kijima-sensei looked at her enlarged shoe (knowing that she can never wear it again), and then at the now empty test tube. Then she turned her attention towards you.

"Hiroki-kun. Do you remember how you got so small?" Kijima-sensei whispered.

"Let's see ... "You placed your hand underneath your chin, thinking about what had happened. "There was this square that I stood, surrounded by four pillars on each side, all had some weird coils on it, capped by an orb that emitted electrical energy. For some reason, all four pillars shot out this strange lightning like energy bolts that struck me. It was pretty painful, and I did not remember much after being zapped. Next thing I knew, I was already this small."

Kijima-sensei took down the pointers you mentioned, but said nothing. As you finished explaining, she continued to look at the notes.

"Shrinking through using electrical power ... " She muttered. "So that's why the growth potion failed to work."

Kijima-sensei turned back towards you.

"Hiroki-kun. If you want to get back to normal, you have to use the same machine that zapped you to get back to normal." She said. "The reason the potion failed was probably something that blocked the potion from taking effect."

"What?" Suddenly, you felt despair. There was no way you know how the machine worked, and even if there was, you might be too small to operate it.

"I'm sorry, Hiroki-kun. This is all I can help you." Kijima-sensei said.

As you sat down in both exhaustion and disappointment, there were sounds of footsteps pounding along the corridor. Before long, two female student appeared at the door. One of them looked like she was not in good shape.

"Sensei! We have an emergency!" The healthier female student exclaimed.

Kijima-sensei quickly placed her notebook over you, being careful not to crush you underneath. It was pitch dark underneath the notebook, but you could still catch a glimpse of what was going on.

"What happened?" Kijima-sensei asked the student.

"I don't know. Haruna just suddenly collapsed on her desk! I was told to bring her to you." The student replied.

"Place her down on the gurney over there. Careful now."

The student, named Haruna, was slowly placed onto the gurney reserved for sick students. Through your small peephole, you could see that she looked really flustered, and she was sweating profusely.

"I can take it from here. You can return to class." Kijima-sensei said.

"But ..." The student protested.

"Just go. Everything will be fine." Kijima-sensei insisted, gently but firmly. The student simply nodded, and left the sick room. Kijima-sensei then returned to the desk, and removed the notebook off your head.

"Sorry about that, Hiroki-kun." Kijima-sensei said before returning to treat Haruna. You watched from your desk as Kijima-sensei slowly got to work examining Haruna. Then, as she started to remove Haruna's overcoat, you noticed something stuck onto Haruna's neck. Its size meant that it escaped Kijima-sensei's eyesight, but not yours. It looked like a needle of sorts, but you still needed to get closer to confirm.

You can try and call out to Kijima-sensei for attention, but she might not hear you or you might startle Haruna, even in her sickened state. The other option is to just make your way towards the gurney and either get her attention or get to the needle yourself.

It's your call.
11233111112111111.title: An Explanation (And An Emergency)

112331111121111111.content:
"Sensei! There's something on her neck!" You shouted at the top of your lungs, but it was of no use. Kijima-sensei was too engrossed to notice. You knew that time was running short, but there was no way you could run towards the gurney in time. Just then, you noticed a ray of sunlight emanating from the nearby window. You also notice the now enlarged high heel shoe. Suddenly, you had an idea.

Climbing the high heel shoe was not easy, and you nearly fell inside the shoe, but you successfully reach the top of the shoe. You took off your glasses, and using it, you slowly turned the glasses so they can reflect a bit of light towards Kijima-sensei's direction. The small ray of light caught Kijima-sensei by surprise, but she definitely noticed you, moments before you slipped and fell inside her shoe. Luckily, that was enough for her to head towards the desk and whisk you out of the shoe.

"Hiroki-kun. What are you doing?" Kijima-sensei asked as she brought your tiny frame in front of her face, carried by her two log-sized fingers.

You said nothing, and pointed back towards the gurney, where Haruna was. Kijima-sensei returned to the gurney, with you still being carried by her fingers, and slowly placed you down it. As soon as you were firmly on the gurney, you rushed towards Haruna's neck, where you had initially spotted the needle. Sure enough, your instincts were right: there was a needle punctured into her neck! The size of the needle was the more curious aspect, as it was normal-sized to YOU than to the giantesses. Carefully, you extracted the needle out of Haruna's neck, and then returned back to Kijima-sensei, who saw the whole thing.

Kijima-sensei nodded, and opened her palm for you to hop on, which you did. She walked back to her desk, placed you back on it, and then went to her cabinet. You looked at the needle that you had extracted. It was no sewing needle, and judging by its shape, you guess was that it was a projectile, possibly from a blowgun, a blowgun suited towards your current size.

"Hiroki-kun. The needle!"

Kijima-sensei's words snapped you out of deep thought, and you saw that she had brought out a microscope. You nodded, and placed the needle on the lens. Kijima-sensei reached for a chair, sat down and then got to work, looking for some clues on the needle you had extracted.

"What the ...?"

Kijima-sensei exclaimed as she continued to observe the needle from her microscope. Suddenly, she got up from her seating position, and rushed back to the medicine cabinet. She pulled out a small bottle, and hurried towards the gurney.

"Here, drink this. It's an antidote."

You heard Kijima-sensei's words as she slowly fed the antidote down Haruna's mouth. You looked at the microscope, which was still active, and you approached it, looking at the needle that had caused it all. Kijima-sensei mentioned 'antidote', so your instincts were fairly accurate. It was a needle projectile, and likely lathered with a poison of sorts. Now, the question remains is who did it, and why.

"I owe you one, Hiroki-kun." Kijima-sensei said as she returned to the desk. "If you had not noticed the needle in her neck, it might have been too late."

"It's OK, sensei. Saving a life is more important." You said. Being small does have its qualities, you thought to yourself. "What was it, anyway?"

"Some kind of paralyzing poison had been applied to the needle." Kijima-sensei explained. "I have heard of such stories from history and from my chemistry lessons, but nothing like this. All I know that this potion is slow-reacting, it will only affect the nervous system after a while."

Kijima-sensei looked at Haruna.

"A moment later, and this young lady will be either dead or permanently paralyzed." Kijima-sensei continued. "The antidote will do its work, but it will take some time before all the poison in her body is neutralized."

"Who will do such a thing like this?" You said, worriedly. At the same time, after seeing the needle firsthand, you are starting to wonder if you were not the only victim of shrinking around here.

"Uhh ... ohh ..."

The two of you turned around to see Haruna on the gurney, moving slowly. Is she waking up?
112331111121111111.title: How To Save A Life

1123311111211111111.content:
"Oh ... what happened ..." Haruna said as she slowly got up. It looks like the poison's effects have worn off.

Kijima-sensei hurried towards Haruna, and gently placed one hand behind her back, and the other on her stomach.

"Take it easy," Kijima said. "Your friend said you suddenly collapsed on your desk."

"Oh, right, that," Haruna's tone was still slurry, perhaps from the effects of the poison. "I don't remember much, but I felt something on my neck, but I ignored it."

"You'll be surprised to know that it was a really tiny needle," Kijima-sensei explained. "And that was why you collapsed. It's been laced with some paralyzing poison."

"Poison!" Haruna exclaimed. "How could they ..."

Suddenly, she stopped, and covered her mouth, as if she was going to blurt some secret out. After a while, she slowly removed her hands away.

"I'm sorry, sensei," Haruna said, getting off the gurney. "I ... I should get back to class, then."

"Wait, before you go," Kijima-sensei interrupted, and Haruna turned around. "Do you remember where and when you felt that something on your neck?"

"I ... think it was at one of the corridors at the lower floors, probably the first." Haruna said. "I should go. Thank you, sensei."

Haruna then hurriedly left the room, without even looking back. After a while, Kijima-sensei turned around, and headed back to the desk, where you had heard everything. Gently, Kijima-sensei reached her hand out, letting you hop onto it before raising it so you can see her face.

"You think she's hiding something, Hiroki-kun?" Kijima-sensei whispered, and you nodded. You noticed that she seemed more concerned that there was poison involved than actually collapsing on the desk. Obviously, this meant she knew the attacker, or whoever sent the attacker.

"You know, Hiroki-kun, I'd be taking the rest of the day off," Kijima-sensei whispered. "If you like, you can join me, until we can find the device to restore you back to normal." You nodded your head again, signalling to her that you accept her offer.

"Now then, Hiroki-kun," Kijima-sensei continued. "If you like, we can try and find this device to restore you back to normal, if you are that desperate to get enlarged again. Of course, if you like being small, I don't mind taking you with me and spend this day off together."

You placed your hand over your chin, pondering the options that Kijima-sensei presented.
