"We'll do it like this, Hiroki-kun," Kijima-sensei said. "Raise your left hand if you want to find this device, and raise your right hand if you want to wait."

The decision is yours, either have Kijima-sensei on your side to find that device to restore you back to normal, or spend "quality" time with her as a tiny and return back to find it another time. Eventually, you made your decision, and raised your hand. Which was it?
1123311111211111111.title: Haruna's Awake

11233111112111111111.content:
You raised your left hand, hoping to take advantage of a powerful ally to restore you back to normal.

"Oh, OK," Kijima-sensei whispered. "You want to get back to normal size as soon as possible, I see. Can't blame you there."

You nodded your head again in agreement. There was no way you are leaving Reiko alone, especially not at a time like this. The sooner you get back to normal size, the better, and maybe then you can take the fight to whoever built the device.

Kijima-sensei then lowered her hand, over towards her left shoulder. Using her other hand, she pointed to the shoulder, as if telling you to either sit or just lie down on her shoulder. You did as you are gestured to. It was good that Kijima-sensei had short hair, so that lessens the chance of her hair bumping you off.

Kijima-sensei (with you in tow) then locked the sick bay door shut, and then went on your way. It was a pretty bumpy ride on Kijima-sensei's shoulder, but it was certainly much better than having to walk by yourself, avoiding giant feet and other hazards in the process. The sight of Kijima's shoes stamping on the pavement made you a little ill, knowing very well that could be your fate: flattened underneath a pair of shoes like an insignificant insect.

The two of you arrived at the corridor where Haruna had claimed that the attack happened. Raising her head, Kijima-sensei looked around, being very careful not to bump you off her shoulder. She turned around, and continued to observe around.

"Strange ..." Kijima-sensei whispered. "Everything seems normal. I can't find any good spot for anyone to attack." On her shoulder, you too was puzzled. By all means, the windows and even the top of the ceiling would have been a perfect ambush spot for a person your size, but there were no holes or even openings at the windows. If there were, the attack had probably covered his or tracks by now.

You looked back down at the floor, still feeling a little ill looking at Kijima-sensei's shoes and thinking about how they were this close to squashing you. Then, quite by chance, you noticed a shine on the floor. At your size, only you can see it. Without hesitation, you reached for a strand of Kijima-sensei's hair, and started pulling it.

"HEY!" Kijima-sensei's voice boomed at the sudden tug at her hair, and you found yourself losing balance at the sudden movement of her head. Then, you found yourself falling forward, down Kijima-sensei's body. Luckily, she had seen (and possibly felt) you fall off her shoulder, and quickly reached her left palm out to grab you. The human palm had never felt any softer, as she managed to open her palm in time to catch you before you fell any further down.

Kijima-sensei simply gave you a stern look, before her face changed back to her gentle self.

"What is it, Hiroki-kun?" She whispered, with a slight tone of annoyance with you tugging at her hair earlier.

You can either point downwards to try and discover whatever that shine was, or you think it's too risky, and you want to go back up on her shoulder. You pointed ...
11233111112111111111.title: Investigation Time (With Kijima-sensei)

11233111112111111112.content:
You raised your right hand, and immediately, Kijima-sensei let off a soft giggle.

"Oh course," She whispered. "Couldn't resist the opportunity to spend time with me, I see."

You blushed a little at her little comment, even though you knew she was poking fun at you. Almost every male student at school have always expressed interest at getting close to Kijima-sensei, and who could blame them? She was very attractive for someone her age, and she is certainly over-qualified to work at a middle school. It is also implied that she may be pretty well off, but no one has ever proven that. And yet here, you are going to be the first one to actually spend time with the school's "blooming flower", Motoko Kijima-sensei.

"That's OK, Hiroki-kun," She whispered. "I know."

Without saying a word, she went over to pick up her bag before returning to you. You stared at her bag, which felt like the size of a fishing ship to you.

"Oh, this?" Kijima-sensei whispered. "No, silly. I'm not putting you in there. You're riding with me."

She reached out her free hand, and opened it in a palm to let you climb onto it. Once you were on it, she gently raised it to her left shoulder, and lowered you onto it. For the first time since you were shrunk, this might actually be a more favorable mode of transportation.

After locking the sick bay door shut, the two of you left the school compound, and headed to the car park. You whistled in amazement as Kijima-sensei stopped before a black open-top two seater sedan. You covered your ears as Kijima-sensei reached for her pocket and pulled out her car keys. The sound of the alarm being de-triggered was painful to your ears, but thankfully, it didn't last long. Kijima-sensei got into the car, and once she was seated, she grabbed you off her shoulder, and placed you in front of the area between the steering wheel and the windshield.

"Sorry, Hiroki-kun, but you have to stay there for a while." Kijima-sensei whispered as she strapped her seat-belt on, and you knew why. You sat there on the little space, clasping your ears as she started her car engine. You then felt something placed behind your back. You turned around, and you noticed she had placed a tissue pack behind you. Kijima-sensei thought about everything, you thought to yourself. Then again, she did say her brother went through the same thing, so she might already be familiar the first time.

The car started up, and soon after, Kijima-sensei drove out of the school. The ride felt like you were being bumped about back and forth, with the tissue pack preventing you from falling down to the pedals. The sight before you was not comfortable either, and you try not to look at the windshield while Kijima-sensei drove on.

A twenty-minute long drive felt like two hours to you, and throughout the journey, you felt like a slab of meat being tendered by either Reiko or your dad, when he has the time to cook. However, after countless minutes of being bumped about, it looks like the journey is over. You had a look at the windscreen, and you found yourself at ...
11233111112111111112.title: Quality Time!

11233111112112.content:
"Hey! I think I heard something from here!"

You gasped. Ms. Kijima's scream had attracted attention, and judging from the footsteps approaching, it sounds like 2 pairs of feet. Your guess was correct when you saw the door swing open, revealing two schoolgirls. You gasped again, as it was the two people you least want to see at this size: your nemesis Shizuka and her best friend, Hitomi.

"Whoa! Ms. Kijima's down and out!" Hitomi said, looking at her fallen body.

"Start searching! I think I saw him coming in here."

You think it might already be too late to hide behind Ms. Kijima's body, but you still took a chance anyway. Scurrying away from the giant girls like a rat, you approached Ms. Kijima's fallen body, hoping that she can shield you from these giant girls. Unfortunately, it was not the case. Hitomi saw you running towards Ms. Kijima's body, and with her right hand, she reached and picked you up with her fingers. You struggled as you were caught by Hitomi's fingers, but your tiny muscles were nothing to her fingers at this size. All you could do was wait and accept whatever fate might have planned for you.

"Hey, Shizuka-chan! I found him!"

Shizuka had to get very close to you to have a glimpse. You struggled occassionally, but your efforts were futile.

"Well, well! So it was the geek boy who stumbled his way into the resizing device, and got himself shrunk down."

As she pondered over what to do with you next, you could hear a faint sound calling out for help. You swore the voice came from Shizuka's pocket, but it looks like your fate had been decided.

"Hitomi! Swallow him!"

"What! You want me to swallow another one of these? That's the 3rd one today!"

"Get on with it!" Shizuka threatened.

"OK, OK! I'll do it!"

You wanted to yell and scream at Shizuka, but your voice was barely audible to the giantesses, and there was nothing you could do as you stared down Hitomi's wide gaping mouth, bearing pearly white teeth. Her tongue stuck out like a large slimy worm out of its cave, and before you could do anything, she released her grip on you, and you fell straight down into her mouth. She didn't bother to chew you, and you fell straight down her esophagus.

GULP!

Outside, the two giantesses had helped Ms. Kijima up onto the main bed, and left the Medical Room. Their business with you, whatever it was, was finished ... for now.
11233111112112.title: Hard Luck!

112331111121121.content:
You yelled out at the top of your lungs as you fell down Hitomi's esophagus, but nothing changed, as you continued falling down Hitomi's throat and into her digestive system, starting with her stomach.

After falling for a while, you landed inside a blood red and fleshy cavern. Looking around, you know you where you were: Hitomi's stomach. You looked near where you landed, and you saw a skeleton nearby, which freaked you out. You jumped aside, still staring at the skeleton. You presumed that was one of Hitomi's three victims, and probably was the first one.

As you continued looking around, the "cavern" suddenly began to shudder, like an earthquake. The sudden movement almost knocked you off your feet, but you were still in one piece ... for now. As you continued looking around, you found someone's body just lying down in the distance. You quickly rushed to the body, hoping to save it before digestion takes place. You were relieved when you realized the person was still alive, but just barely. Imagine your surprise when you discovered who it was. It was Shuhei Yamamoto, your classmate and neighbor.

"Hey, Shuhei! Wake up!"

You tried to shake him awake, but he was still too weak to move. It was as if he had not eaten for quite some time, so you had to do something. You remembered the bento Yuriko gave you earlier today, and to your relief, you were still carrying it. Reluctantly, you gave it to Shuhei. The smell of the food worked, and he quickly reached out and ate the contents inside the bento. While you were a little sad to give away food Yuriko made, at least your friend was awake.

"Thanks, Hiroki! I thought I was a goner after Hitomi swallowed me."

"You don't say. Still, how did you end up shrunken down anyway? I know you will ask me the same question, so I'll go first. I stumbled onto a secret lair of sorts, and somehow I got shrunk after being zapped by a mysterious ray."

"That's strange, because I could say the same, except we were shrunk outside the school yard. My brother and I were just riding to school until for reasons unknown, we got shrunk down. It was not long before Shizuka and Hitomi found us. Hitomi was told to swallow me, and that was how I ended up here. Hitomi must not have eaten for a while, as I could not find any food around here."

"Where is your brother, then?"

"Shizuka has him ... as a pet of sorts. We have to save him, and find a way to get back to normal."

Shortly after your conversation, the "cavern" started shuddering again. This time, you were caught off-balance, and fell down onto the fleshy floor.

"We have to try and get out as soon as possible! Hitomi's digestive juices are starting up again!"

You did not have much time to think, so a decision has to be made. There are two possible ways out. One, through her mouth and two, through her digestive system below. Both have their risks, but you have to make a decision now. Choose.
112331111121121.title: Hitomi's Stomach

choices: The Bubbles Burst (And You Fall Right Back Down)
1123311111211211.content:
"I'm not going through those nasty intestines and face whatever bacteria that resides there. I think our best way is to give Hitomi an indigestion, and force her to either vomit or burp us out!"

Shuhei nodded, and immediately rushed towards the stomach walls and started banging on the fleshy wall, and avoiding the stomach acid being secreated. You went to join in, but after ten minutes of constant banging and kicking, nothing happened. Your current sizes make it too insignificant to cause anything.

You and Shuhei slouched back down on the floor, exhausted from your futile efforts.

"Forget about ... (pant) ... saving Hiroshi-san ... (pant) ... Shuhei ... bad idea ... (pant) ... "

===

Meanwhile, Hitomi felt something tickling inside her stomach, and simply rubbed it. She did not like the idea of swallowing tiny people alive, and she only did because of Shizuka's dominating personality. While Shizuka looked at some research papers, Hitomi snuck out of her sight, and gently crept towards the vending machine nearby. She bought a can of fizzy cola, and promptly drank it all down before Shizuka finds out.

"Sigh ... Shizuka-chan is so dominating, I wish she would listen to me once in a while ... "

She continued to finish the cola, and threw the can away.

===

Inside her stomach, the two of you overheard what she said, and for once, you could feel some symphaty for Hitomi. Even though she was always heckling and making fun of you and your geek friends, she was only doing it out of peer pressure from Shizuka. As you contempt your next move, you could see a large "waterfall" of fizzy cola falling into the pool of stomach acid. While normally you would admire the sight of it, you could not help but feel disgusted as the brownish liquid falling into the pool of stomach acid. Shuhei tried to get a sip of it, but you stopped him, reminding him where it "came from".

As the two liquids started reacting to each other, you could see bubbles forming from the surface of the acidic pool. The bubbles were quite large, like the size of giant beach balls. You finally had an idea, and you promptly dragged Shuhei towards the edge of the acid pool.

"Wh ... what are you planning?"

"I think Hitomi just threw us a ticket out of here! Come on, before all the gas is used up!"

The two of you entered the acid pool, and in a stroke of luck, a huge bubble formed up around you and Shuhei, and lifted the two of you up before the acid starts to melt your clothes off. As the bubbles started to rise up, carrying the two of you with them, but concerns still remain. The bubbles can still burst before they reach Hitomi's mouth, and even then, you might still be thrown back down her throat and back into your stomach. It all boils down to luck.
1123311111211211.title: Bubble Escape

11233111112112111.content:
The carbon dioxide inside Hitomi's mouth was simply too much for Hitomi to hold back, and she could not hold it any longer. Then, there she goes!

"Oh no! I can't ... I mustn't ... "

BURP!

She burped, causing the gas to escape out of her mouth in 1 loud burp. By doing so, she had also inadvertedly set the prisoners in her stomach free. The two of you were forced out of Hitomi's mouth like a jet engine. You were free from Hitomi's digestive system, but now youface another problem.

As soon as the two of you were burped out, gravity begins to kick in, causing you to plummet down. There are two possibilities now: either the gas had pushed you too far from Hitomi's body, and you are going to fall straight down onto the floor. Then again, by a stroke of luck, you could end up inside Hitomi's uniform, and with that, you could Hitomi's body as a "platform" to go down safely.

You fell down ...
11233111112112111.title: Burped Out

112331111121121112.content:
You could see that you were falling down Hitomi's uniform, and falling through the gap, landed on Hitomi's breasts. The two of you landed with a soft thud, but luckily, Hitomi did not pay attention. The two of you managed to catch a breather, as well as ponder over what might happen if you guys stayed in her stomach for too long.

However, poor Hitomi was not as lucky. Shizuka heard her burp, and immediately went forward and confronted her. Hearing Shizuka's harsh words on her supposedly best friend, your sympathy for Hitomi also grew. How or why Hitomi stayed with her despite putting up with Shizuka's domineering personality and, to an extent, humiliation, remains a mystery. Getting scolded simply for drinking a can of soda felt a little too harsh for you.

"Shoot, Shizuka sure is mean to Hitomi." Shuhei started speaking. "I have to make up for Mikako if I manage to survive this."

"Uh, why are you bringing this up now?" You asked.

Shuhei turned towards you, with a slightly guilty look on his face.

"I think I owe you guys ... an apology. I ... had a fight with Mikako a few days ago."

"How has that got to do with all this?"

"I like Mikako, Hiroki. I really do. But I think I went a little too far. Mikako's a nice girl, but when she gets mad, her anger can cloud her actions. I'm guessing she asked Shizuka and Hitomi to to do this as payback ... sort of ..."

You had mixed feelings after hearing this. On one hand, you wanted to slap Shuhei right there for causing this mess and getting you involved as "collateral damage" for his relationship problem. However, on the other hand, you know that Shuhei may be blunt and crude at times, but he genuinely cares for those that he loves.

"All right, I get it ... I'll help ... in whatever way I can. However, our concern now is ... our host right here. What is your choice, then? Even though Hitomi DID try and digest us earlier on, I think she MIGHT be able to help us. I leave the decision to you, Shuhei."

What is Shuhei's decision?
112331111121121112.title: Hitomi's Breasts

1123311111211211121.content:
"I don't trust Hitomi. As much as I enjoy being here and all ... I think we should find my brother first."

"OK ... so, how do we get down?" You asked.

"Follow me, Hiroki."

With that, Shuhei leaped from the fleshy mound that is Hitomi's breast and clung tightly on her uniform. Then, slowly, but steadily, he climbed downwards. You were a little hesitant in doing so, but you realized that you did not have a choice. Slowly, but steadily, you followed Shuhei down Hitomi's uniform. It helped a little that Hitomi was still standing there. Apparently, Shizuka has a knack for long-winded speeches.

As you climbed down, you could not help but have a peek at Hitomi's body. Compared to Shizuka, Hitomi would have been much easier to climb, if her figure is any indication. You remember that one time when Shizuka literally forced Hitomi to fast for two days straight, because Hitomi was putting "too much weight". You had no idea how or why Hitomi sticks with Shizuka all this time, but now, you didn't feel any anger at Hitomi swallowing and nearly digesting you earlierl

The two of you then climbed downwards towards the edge of her skirt. Shuhei was planning that they land right down on Hitomi's loafer, and then escape from there. He reckons that at their current size, the two of you can survive such a fall. However, you can hear that Shizuka was almost done with her "speech". You guys had to move now. Praying for your life, you released your grip on Hitomi's skirt, and fall straight down.

Where do you land (and what fate awaits you?)
1123311111211211121.title: Climbing Down

11233111112112111211.content:
The two of you land with a plop on Hitomi's loafer. The two of you stay still for a moment to catch your breath. Unfortunately, Shizuka uses that same moment to look down. The school uniforms, though partially digested, were still recognizable. Shizuka's eyes widened as your hearts fell. "Hitomi! It's them! They did escape!" Before the two of you could run Shizuka swipes the two of you into a tight fist. You can't break free!

"You got lucky, Hitomi. Now, swallow them!" Shizuka demanded. You both shut your eyes and prepared for the worst. But nothing happened. "Didn't you hear me? Swallow them!"

Hitomi shook her head. "No, Shizuka-chan."

Shizuka was taken aback. "No? Why not?"

Hitomi shifted uneasily. "Well, if they got out once, they can find a way out again. Besides, you can't just use me as a garbage disposal for your mess!" All three of you were genuinely surprised that Hitomi had finally taken a stand!

"This is your mess, too, Hitomi. If I go down, you're going down, with me!" Shizuka shouted, getting angry. "Now, for the last time, swallow them!" Hitomi just stood there and shook her head. "Fine. Then if you won't swallow them..."
11233111112112111211.title: Discovered!

112331111121121112111.content:
"I'll just swallow them myself!"

Shizuka's spiteful answer was followed with her tilting her head back, with her left hand still clenched in a fist, containing both you and Shuhei. As she unclenches her fist, the two of you could see the fate that awaits you as Shizuka opens her mouth. What was supposed to be a few seconds felt like an eternity as Shizuka slowly tilted her hand downwards towards her mouth, and the two of you could only watch in horror as gravity does Shizuka's work.

Just then, the two of you felt a jerk, and thanks to that, the two of you were violently thrown out of Shizuka's hand, and the two of you found yourselves landing onto the hand of another person. As you fell, you could see who was responsible: Hitomi. Somehow, she had managed to grab Shizuka's arm and also grabbed you and Shuhei in the process. Shizuka was not amused at Hitomi's actions.

"Hitomi! Give me the tinies!"

Hitomi refused, but said nothing. Instead, she turned around, and started running away from Shizuka, holding the two of you close to her chest. However, like Shizuka before, Hitomi was clenching her hands into fists so tightly that you could barely see anything. As Hitomi ran, all you could hear was Shizuka's gradually softening voice, yelling insults and profanities at her so-called best friend for her actions. Shizuka's actions caused you to shake your head, and at the same time, somewhat relieved that Hitomi was finally able to see Shizuka's true nature.

It was a while before Hitomi finally stopped, and when she finally opened her hand, you find yourself inside what appears to be a small room. Hitomi gently placed the two of you down on a white table, and the two of you could see Hitomi's huge face in front of you. She did not seem angry or happy at her actions, but all she did was gesture the two of you to be quiet and stay where you are. After a while, Hitomi left the room, leaving the two of you on the white table.

"Shoot, that was close!" Shuhei remarked. "For a while, I thought I was going to relive the vile fumes of the human stomach again."

"I feel you." You replied. "At least we can score points if they ever make us write a report on the human digestive system."

The two of you had a laugh at your remark, but laughter soon turned to silence as you could hear sounds coming from the door. Someone is coming in, and you know it is someone normal-sized. The two of you froze stil, awaiting the person about to enter the room. The door opened, and you saw ...
112331111121121112111.title: Swallowing Denied!

choices: Get some help and follow Shizuka.
1123311111211211121112.content:
Suddenly, you saw someone bursting into the room. You were momentarily fearing the worst, but you were relieved when it was just Hitomi. She seemed to be just as relieved to see you. "Oh, good... you're still here." She sighed in relief as she knelt down to face you two.

"Thank you for saving us back there..." Shuhei replied. "I can't believe you had the guts to stand up to her..."

"Even though we've seen your guts first hand..." You continued.

Hitomi blushed and looked embarrassed. "W-Well... I'm sorry for eating you..."

"It's no problem, at least you ditched Shizuka when you could, or else we'd be finished for sure..."

Hitomi looked embarrassed again. "I'm sorry, but I never thought I'd ask that for all that time spent teasing you, but... I need your help."

The two of you looked oddly at her. "You need... our help?"

Hitomi frantically nodded. "It's Shizuka-chan... she's not herself!"

"I'm pretty sure she's always been a manipulative, dominating..."

"You don't understand!" Hitomi banged her fist against the table, making you two jump. "I was a nobody until Shizuka-chan took me into the Technology Club! We've been close friends! She would give me things to do, and I would do them, and I'd be happy, but now... she's insane! She's been obsessed with finding tiny people ever since we went into the abandoned bunker under the school! She's made me swallow some whole, and who knows what she's made the others do with them! I've even heard she has one as her personal plaything!"

"My brother!" Shuhei shouted. "What has she done with him!"

"Nothing good, I'm sure..." Hitomi looked ashamed of herself. "Please... I'm sorry for what I've done! I've had enough about this tiny people nonsense! I just want things to go back to normal!"

Your hardened hearts melted at the sight of your former co-tormentor nearly break out in tears. "It's alright, Hitomi..." You reply. "We forgive you. You're the first one to want to make things right, so how could we say no?"

Hitomi's face brightened and she smothered the two of you into her breasts. "Oh, thank you! Thank you!" You couldn't help but feel aroused at being smashed up against her fleshy orbs, since you were there earlier.

After a while, you both try to get away, and Hitomi looked embarrassed again. "Sorry... Um... we need a plan. I'm no good at coming up with anything... that's why I listened to Shizuka-chan for so long..."
1123311111211211121112.title: An Unlikely Ally

choices: She dashes after Shizuka. She wants redemption.
She tucks you away. She wants revenge.
11233111112112111212.content: The two of you land safely on the loafer. The two of you stop to catch your breath. Luckily, Shizuka whirled around on her heels and walked away. Hitomi looked down and her eyes widened. "So, you two did escape!" Before the two of you could get up and run, Hitomi scooped you both into one hand. She carried you up to her face. You look to the sides. Her body wasn't close to her hand, and any other falls would definitely be fatal. Hitomi seems conflicted on what to do with the two of you.
11233111112112111212.title: Discovered! (Again)

11233111112112112.content:
The bubbles containing the carbon dioxide from the fizzy cola Hitomi just drank continues to float upwards, carrying the 2 of you inside it. Breathing was a problem inside the bubbles, but it was a small price to pay to avoid being digested inside Hitomi's stomach. However, your luck seemed to have ran out by the time the bubbles reached Hitomi's throat.

Hitomi could feel a concentration of gases inside her mouth and throat, and she quickly covered her mouth with her hands, refusing to burp in any way. The carbon dioxide inside her mouth "fought" on to try and escape. In this "tug-of-war" scenario, you hoped that Hitomi had no choice but to burp you guys out, as you were already struggling to get fresh air to breathe in a bubble filled with carbon dioxide.

Eventually, the pressure from the carbon dioxide gas was too much for her to handle, but she still refused to burp the gas out, so the gas had to find another way out ... through her nose. The carbon dioxide charged out of her nose with such speed that it felt like her nose had an engine running at full blast. As the gas escaped, your luck ran out as the bubbles popped and turned straight into gas escaping through her nose, without carrying you guys with it. The 2 of you fell right back down her stomach, and plunged right into the pool of stomach acid.

Shuhei and yourself struggled to swim your way out of the acid pool, but there was no "dry land" in sight, and by the time you see your clothes dissolve, you knew it was the end for you. As your clothes fully dissolved, you could feel your flesh burn as the nasty liquid tried to dissolve you. You tried to scream, but nobody could hear you. Close by, Shuhei had already blacked out and much of his body was already being dissolved. That was the last thing you saw before you whited out, the pain from your body being dissolved too hard to take.

===

A few days later, Hitomi could feel a small bulge on her tummy, and groaned about Shizuka forcing her to swallow tiny men. In addition, her last trip to relieve her bowels was less than enjoyable, as there was a sharp pain of sorts when she "did" her business. If she had looked at whatever that was left, she might have seen two skeletal hands sticking out, namely yours and Shuhei's. While your skeletons remained indigestable, the rest of your body became a layer of fat on Hitomi's body.

Your sister and Yuriko tried in vain to look for you and the Yamamoto brothers, with neither of them knowing the awful truth.
11233111112112112.title: Bad Luck!

choices: The intestines open up, and you flow inside.
The "raft" dissolves, and you fall into the acid.
1123311111211212.content:
"Going up is too risky, and it'd be hard to do, anyways... We'll just have the long way, through her digestive system."

"I guess that's a good idea, except for one thing."

"What?"

"How do we avoid getting digested?"

You look around, and see a bit of undigested food, chewed up beyond recognition, on the far side of the slimy prison. "There! We can use as a raft to stay out of the acid!"

"Alright, let's go!" The two of you run over to the chunk of food, and hop on, soon, acid fills the chamber, and you and Shuhei sit atop the food as it slowly dissolves.

Eventually...
1123311111211212.title: Go Through Her Intestines

11233111112112121.content:

Her body's constant motion got more vigorous, and sweat starts to accumulate inside her uniform. That, combined with your lack of physical prowess soon began to turn against you. You tried to keep climbing and holding onto Mikako's skin, but it was getting too hard to do so.

Eventually, your hand slipped, and began your fall down Mikako's body. The sight of Mikako's pink bra above you was like looking at something high above the skys, but you will never reach it. As the bra gets smaller and smaller to your eyes, you fell ...
1123311211122.title: Falling Off

11233112111222.content:
"AHH! MIKAKO, HELP ME!!!"

Your cry for help was in vain as your voice was barely audible to Mikako's ears. At your height, it feels like you are trying to shout at someone all the way up at the Tokyo Tower: they can't see or hear you. You kept plummeting, past Mikako's pink panties and all the way down her legs, before landing on the floor with a loud thud. You were still alive, but now hurt from the impact of the fall. As you reel from the pain in your body, you could only watch in vain as Mikako walks away from you and entering the school building. Even if you were to run as fast as you can, there is no way you could catch up with her.

Your legs now felt like jelly, and now you could barely stand up. You were now in the middle of the school yard, out in the open. The large tree you came upon was now too far away from you, and trying to get help from the other students was sheer suicide at your size. You wanted to ponder over your options, but a gigantic shadow soon loomed over your tiny body. You heard sounds of footsteps getting louder and louder. You turned and had a look, and you could see a pair of huge loafers crashing on the floor. It was someone walking towards you.

You had to squint your eyes to have a look at the gigantic figure that was approaching you, but when you saw who it was, you feel very afraid. It was Shizuka Kinugawa herself, your nemesis since you could remember, and she was walking towards you! All is not lost, however, if she had not noticed you at all. After all, you are quite small now, but is luck on your side?
11233112111222.title: Danger Is No Stranger

112331121112221.content:
Your worst concerns are indeed true: she HAS seen you! Even with your squinted eyes, you can see a huge brown eye looking directly at you. Shizuka, your nemesis, was directly looking at you from her skyscraper-like height to you. You froze at your position, petrified by the giantess in front of you.

"WELL WELL! LOOKS LIKE I FOUND SOME PREY TO SQUASH! AND IT COULD NOT BE BETTER TO SEE GEEKY IKETANI RIGHT BY MY FEET!"

You could see her huge shoes the size of a football field to you, and you sure don't want to be caught underneath it.

"OH WELL, TIME TO DIE! BUG!"

She lifted her right foot, and hovered the football field sized shoe above you, hoping to squash you in one giant step, but you managed to snap out of your petrification, and avoided her shoe crashing down before it's too late. You were already tired from running around in the yard and trying to get Mikako's attention (in vain), but now you have to run for your survival from someone who wants to squash you flat literally.

You made a dash away from Shizuka, but despite your efforts, Shizuka could easily catch up with you in just a few steps. Eventually, her giant shoe slammed right in front of you, cutting you off literally. You tried running to the side, but the result was the same. Shizuka literally have you at her feet, and she is getting ready for the final step. As you prepare to avoid being stepped on, you thought of a risky escape plan. When she puts her foot down, there is a small window for you to escape as she can't move her other foot until both her feet are on the ground first. The risk is that if timed wrongly or you made one mistake, you will surely end up as a bloody stain on her shoe. You could feel her right foot literally hovering above you now.

It is now or never! GO!
112331121112221.title: Stomp The Yard

1123311211122211.content:
BOOM!

Shizuka's gigantic shoe slammed on the ground just mere inches away from you. You had correctly predicted that Shizuka can't stomp you with both feet, but now you must make a run for it before her other foot crushes you, now that both her feet are on the ground. You made a mad dash away from Shizuka's, trying to get as far as possible from this dangerous giantess.

Already exhausted, you know that no matter how many times you managed to dodge Shizuka's relentless stomping, it would only be a matter of time before she finishes you off. What seems like a long run to you is only a few small steps for her, and Shizuka has the upper hand quite literally. You could see Shizuka's shoe hovering above you again, and dodged it again, though that step came within inches of squashing you flat. If she takes another step, you are finished!

Suddenly, you could hear the sound of engines from a distance, and the sound is getting louder by the second. You looked at where the sound is coming from, and you could see two motorcyclists coming towards you. To your relief, the bikers are the same size as yourself, and before you could react, one of them beckoned you to move closer to them. You nodded, and using whatever's left of your physical strength, you rushed towards the mysterious tiny bikers before Shizuka lifts her foot again.

The three of you eventually met up, but there was no time for any idle chat as one of the bikers signalled you to climb on and hold on tight. You followed suit, and the two bikers then hit a spectacular 180 degree turn and by the time Shizuka noticed you, it was too late for her, as the smaller bikes outran her. Furious at losing to a bunch of insects, she gave one final stomp on the ground in frustration, before turning around and heading back to her class.

Meanwhile, you were finally safe from Shizuka, though you wonder how or why these bikers even came in the first place. You wanted to talk, but without a helmet, the wind is blowing at you at such speeds, it was impossible to even open your mouth. You had to wait until they stopped, which they eventually did.

As the three of you dismount the bikes, you were breathing heavily both from running from Shizuka and being exposed to high speeds without a helmet. You panted heavily, but you still needed to know how or why they saved you.

"Why did you (pant) ... save me back there (pant) ...? Do I even (pant) ... know you? (pant)

"You mean you still don't know who we are after all that?" A biker spoke in a very familiar voice. "We were best buddies since elementary school, and you always helped us with homework and tuning our bikes."

It was only after the bikers removed their helmets before you finally recognized who they were. It was your neighbors, Hiroshi and Shuhei Yamamoto. You were best buddies with Shuhei, and Hiroshi was like a bigger brother to you, despite the lone year gap.

"Hiroshi? Shuhei? How on earth ... no ...what on earth is going on here?"

"I was going to ask you the same question. We were riding our bikes past your school, and suddenly we were shrunk down to the size of insects. It was quite fortunate our bikes were shrunk as well, or we probably won't be meeting with each other again."

"Something big is going on at my school. I need your help, and in return, I can help you."

"OK. You got a deal! We can go back to your house, or we can head back to school!"

You choose to ...

A/N: In Japan, the legal riding age is 16. By right, only Hiroshi is legally old enough to ride a bike.
1123311211122211.title: Quick Getaway

11233112111222111.content:
You looked at your watch (which shrunk with you, by the way), and then made an answer.

"I think we should go back to my house. My sister should be home soon, maybe she can help us."

"All right, if you say so!" Hiroshi answered, tossing you a spare crash helmet. You put the helmet on, and then climbed onto Hiroshi's bike. The two brothers revved up their motorcycles, and rode off before Shizuka or anybody else located you. Comparing to running about at your size, travelling about at such speed at your current size actually seemed fun. Yes, the distance was longer, and the risk of being stepped on was still high, but with a motorcycle to ride around, you can easily outrun footsteps,and occassionally, ride through the legs of passers-by. The Yamamoto brothers are enjoying this, it seems, as they seem to frequently steer their motorcycles through the legs of the ladies, with the occassional "wind" exposing their panties slightly.

It took a 20 minute ride before the three of you arrive at the foot of your doorstep. The three of you dismount, and removed your respective helmets. While the brothers went to work and check their bikes, you headed towards the shoe rack. Even at your size, you could still clearly see what was on the racks. The shoe rack gave you your answer: Reiko's not home yet.

However, it seems like you need not wait long as you could hear footsteps from nearby, and the sound gets louder as time passes. Eventually, you see Reiko's figure in the distance, but as she gets closer to the door, you wonder if she is able to see you guys. Especially when the stamping of her feet on the floor gets louder and closer.

You rushed towards the Yamamoto brothers and attempted to warn them of the impending danger, but they are too engrossed in their bikes to actually care. You watched in horror as Reiko's Mary Jane shoe hover above you guys, preparing for the drop. You quickly headed forward, and waved your arms around like mad, hoping she will notice. Did she?
11233112111222111.title: Help From Home?

choices: Stay Behind To Look After Reiko
112331121112221111.content:
It appears that she has seen the three of you and your motorcycles, but when you saw her face, you noticed that something was not right. Even though the size difference was considerable, you could notice that Reiko's face felt flustered.

"Oh ... hi, Hiroki ..."

Reiko's voice was slurry, and before you could respond or anything, Reiko just promptly went inside the house, slamming the door shut. You were not angry with your younger sister, but worried.

"Aw, nuts! I thought she was going to help!"

Shuhei muttered.

"Hiroki, can't you do ... something ... hey, Hiroki. Are you alright?"

Shuhei tapped you on your shoulder.

"I don't know, Shuhei. I don't think that's her normal response ..."

Before you could finish, you heard a loud thud coming from inside the house. Immediately, you knew something was definitely wrong. Concerned, you quickly crawled through the door gap, and you could see Reiko's fallen body on the floor. It felt like a large hill to you, but for once, you had no time to panic. It's my sister, you thought to yourself, so it's my responsibility.

Luckily for you, the way Reiko fell eased your "navigation" towards her face. You reached out your hand to feel Reiko's forehead. Sure enough, it felt hot. You immediately knew what had happened: Reiko was running a fever.

From the distance, you could see the Yamamoto brothers from a distance, following you when you darted inside the house.

"What's the matter, Hiroki? You scared us when you dashed inside the house like that."

Hiroshi asked as you slowly approached them.

"Reiko's fallen sick. A high fever, in fact."

Looking back at Reiko's prone body, you could not help but feel a sense of uselessness. If you were normal-sized,you would have helped Reiko towards her bed, but at your current size, you could not even lift up her pinkie finger without struggling, let alone help her up.

"What kind of a brother am I at a time like this ..."

Tears start streaming down your face, as you continued your approach. By each passing second, your legs felt weaker and weaker. Eventually, as if your legs had given way, you fell straight down to your knees.

"Hiroki!"

Shuhei immediately rushed towards you as you kneeled down, silent and tears still streaming down.

"Hiroki. Get a hold of yourself, man!"

"Shuhei ... this must be a form of punishment ... I have never been the best brother to Reiko ... she's the one looking after this house when our parents are away. She's the one who did all the cooking and cleaning. Now that she has fallen sick, I should be the one to look after her. But ... LOOK AT ME! LOOK AT US! My parents are not here. I have a sick sister who needs my attention, and I can't even GIVE THAT to her! I'M USELESS!"

Shuhei looked at you for a moment as you continued to wallow about in self-pity and helplessness. There was silence, then you could feel a big tight slap on your left cheek. The impact came from Shuhei's right hand, and he was looking at you in contempt.

"You disgust me, Hiroki ..." Shuhei said.

"Shuhei!"

Hiroshi saw the commotion.

"STAND BACK, BROTHER!"

Shuhei's loud voice took his brother by surprise, stunning him into silence and stillness.

"You know, as a younger sibling myself, I understand Reiko's plight. I remember when I was young, when I came down with a fever, I was home alone. Hiroshi was not around to take care of me. Heck, he was out playing football with his friends while I am at home running a high fever. By the time he got home, I had to be rushed to the hospital for medical attention. Hiroshi was behaving like you right now back then, blaming himself over and over for his uselessness. That ate me up inside. I did not blame my brother for abandoning me, but I blamed MYSELF for being such a burden. As a younger sibling, as annoying or bratty we may be, one thing we DO look out for is to avoid being a burden to our older siblings. My father always said older brothers or sisters are born first to protect their younger siblings. But I also believe that as younger siblings, we too have a duty to not be such a burden."

You went speechless as Shuhei continued.

"Sure, Reiko may be sick, and yes, we ARE too tiny to help, but are we going to give up just like that? NO! I don't know about Reiko, but I'm sure she does not like being sick and being a burden. As her older brother, your duty is to reassure her that, and take care of her, no matter how or what you are right now."

"Y ... you are right, Shuhei ..."

You stammered slowly, trying to recall Shuhei's words.

"So, Hiroki? What are you going to do? Or do I have to slap you awake again before you will take ANY action?"

Shuhei raised his hand again, ready to strike, but you raised out your own, signalling Shuhei to stop.

"No ... I understand, Shuhei ..."

Slowly, you got back up to your feet.

"I know what I have to do now. I'm ... sorry for my actions ..."

"You can say sorry AFTER Reiko gets better. We'll help, alright?"

Shuhei looked at Hiroshi, who had gone completely still during the exchange of words. Finally, realizing what had transpired, he nodded his head in agreement.

"There's no way any of us can carry any of her fingers, much less her body. I'm going back to school to get help, as much as I don't want to. Hiroki, I will leave you to decide. Do you want to stay here, or do you want to follow me back?"

The decision is yours.
112331121112221111.title: A Sick Sister

1123311211122211112.content:
"Hiroshi. Can I ask you to stay here and look after Reiko? I want to go back to school to find a friend. I'm sure she will help."

Hiroshi nodded, and as the two of you crossed paths, you could feel Hiroshi's hand on your right shoulder.

"Don't make the mistake I did."

Hiroshi then went towards Reiko's fallen body.

"Don't keep me waiting, OK?"

You nodded, and you promptly followed Shuhei back to his bike. Taking Hiroshi's helmet, you quickly put it on as you scrambled onto Shuhei's bike, followed by the roaring of an engine. Within seconds, you were off back to school.

"Who is this person who can help, Hiroki?"

Shuhei asked.

"I believe you have met her before, Shuhei."

"Uh, I was thinking of asking my girlfriend for help ... she knows of our ... reduced stature."

"Your girlfriend? Gee, you have not told us anything about that."

"I was going to surprise you, but ... fine, I'll say it. Mikako and I have been dating for the past 3 months."

"Mikako?"

Then, you remembered the girl that you had climbed before this whole incident happened.

"Shuhei, I ... I might be asking to get whacked if I say this, but ..."

"What, Hiroki?"

"I ... I was crawling about your girlfriend's body when she was having lunch."

Shuhei said nothing.For a while, you would have expected him to get angry and yell, or push you off the bike, but Shuhei remained surprisingly calm.

"How was she? Climbing her, I mean ..."

Shuhei's tone was half-serious and half-cheeky.

"Her body was soft, but she didn't notice me all this time."

"Hah! Mikako-chan can be so absent-minded sometimes. Well, I guess it just means I need to find other ways to get her attention."

"You ... you're not mad at me?"

"Well, you can consider the slap I gave you as punishment if you really want to apologize. We're even now."

=

After a while, the two of you returned to the school yard. Shuhei then parked the bike below the shade of the nearest tree to the school gate. Luckily, the yard was empty, but when you looked at your watch, you started to panic. There was only 30 minutes left before school was over! You two have to move quickly.

"Bad news, Shuhei! We only have 30 minutes before all hell breaks loose!"

"Shoot! I'm going to look for Mikako-chan anyway. Do you still want to look for Yuriko, then?"

With time running out, you need to make a choice.
1123311211122211112.title: Back To School

11233112111222111122.content:
"Yes, I insist. Besides, help from two giant girls is always better than one."

"All right, then. Follow me."

The two of you dashed across the school yard, and after reaching the school building, the two of you then rushed in through the cracked gap. Once again, you could feel your body tiring out again, but when you remembered Reiko's prone body and her high fever, you did your best to banish that thought away. Inside the main school building, the corridor was mostly empty. The two of you then headed towards the shoe lockers.

"Shuhei. Are you planning to hide inside Mikako's shoe or something?"

Shuhei stopped to turn around.

"Dude, do you even play 'Ninja's Code' or anything? I'm here to "borrow" something, not hide in a shoe.

Shuhei came to a particular shoe locker, and then signaled you to stay put, while he crept in through an opening. For a while, you had no idea what he meant when he mentioned 'Ninja's Code'. Sure, the ninjas in the game pulled off a couple of fancy tricks here and there, but it was only a game, you thought to yourself. Even if ninjas DO exist, you doubt any of them could pull off the tricks that you had seen while playing the game.

Shuhei eventually came out with a few pieces of string, coiled around his shoulder.

"String? Seriously?"

"Mikako told me the owner of this particular locker keeps her sewing kit inside her locker. We'll need these."

Shuhei returned back to the corridor, carrying the makeshift rope, with you in tow. Shuhei did not stop until he reached the main staircase.

"There's no way we can climb that."

You pointed out.

"I wasn't planning to."

Shuhei replied.

Then, you could hear loud footsteps coming from behind you guys. It came from a female teacher, who appeared in her 30s. Although you could not see her face, but you could tell that she wore something typical of an office lady. As she got closer, you could see Shuhei tying the rope onto something. It was a sewing hook, but the sewing was right for YOUR standards.

"This is the only path to the teacher's lounge. I figured there might be one or two teachers could ... assist us."

Shuhei's tone suddenly became serious.

"Hiroki, we only have one shot. I'm going to latch this to the teacher's stockings. Once so, start climbing the string. Do not stop until you are positively clinging to the teacher's stocking."

You nodded, and looking at how dangerously close the teacher's feet are approaching, you started to feel a little uneasy. Next moment, the teacher's black high heel shoe slammed right down a few inches in front of you. Once again, you had the feel of the massive size difference between normal people and your shrunken statures. Then, you remembered what Shuhei said, and you could see that he had already latched the rope onto the teacher's stocking. It was not long before the teacher lifted her foot up again, so Shuhei started climbing the string. You followed suit, even though from years of physical education classes, you had always been the worst climber. However, this time, you had to do it for Reiko's sake, and for your life if you are not careful.

Sure enough, the force of the teacher's leg movements made you feel like you had been yanked by a galloping horse or train. Even so, you did not stop climbing, only pausing when you realized you were getting too close to Shuhei. Shuhei eventually managed to grab hold of the stocking, and then gave you a free hand, helping you climb onto the nylon. After that, Shuhei promptly took the hook out, and rolled the string around his left arm.

"I might need this again later."

As the teacher continued walking, you had a look around your surroundings. The teacher had already climbed up the stairs to level 2. This is where your class is, and most likely, Yuriko and Mikako as well.

"Shuhei. We are here. Let's get off."

You said.

"Wait. I think this teacher might take us right where we want to. I have to take a risk here."

Do you want to follow Shuhei and take the risk?
11233112111222111122.title: Riders Of The...Teacher?

112331121112221111222.content:
You thought for a while, and then you promptly let go of the stocking, dropping off the teacher's leg. Shuhei saw you dropping, and reluctantly, followed suit. After a while, the teacher had walked off, too far for you guys to pursue.

"I thought that the teacher might help us. I sure hope your instinct is right, Hiroki."

"Our classrooms are on this level. Mikako or Yuriko could be around here. Time to start searching the classrooms."

"All right."

The two of you stood close to the corridor wall, lest you two get squashed unknowingly. You stopped to have a look at your watch. Only fifteen minutes remain. The whole ordeal of running, raiding for rope and climbing the teacher's stocking had already taken away nearly half of your time. At least, the two of you now have the easy part to do: locate the classrooms and find your targets. Looking up at the classroom labels was tough, especially since you two had to squint your eyes to have a look. After passing the "Class 2-F", "Class 2-E" and "Class 2-D" classrooms, the two of you came to "Class 2-C".

"This is it. Let's go in, then."

The two of you then sneaked inside through the gap of the classroom door. Inside the teacher was concluding today's lesson, while some of the students were already preparing to leave. Without any time left to waste, the two of you agreed to split up to look for one of the two girls mentioned. Interestingly, Shuhei's clue to finding Mikako was the same for finding Yuriko: both ladies have a distinctive "Chibi-Geko" strap sticking out of their bags. Now, there is a problem: finding them among the 29 students seated in class.

Looking from row to row, you were beginning to lament your luck. Even for finding a "Chibi-Geko" strap, the task remains daunting. You had searched nearly half the class, and no sign of the distinctive strap with a chibified green frog sticking out of a bag.

As if by chance, you could see something green in front of you. You went ahead to have a look, and sure enough, it was a green "Chibi-Geko" strap. Now for the interesting part. You looked up to see who the bag belonged to.

Was it Mikako or Yuriko seated in front of you?
112331121112221111222.title: Classroom Infiltration

1123311211122211112221.content:
Your luck appears to be looking up. Sure enough, it was Yuriko's bag that was before you. Now comes another difficult part: getting Yuriko's attention. From your experience, you knew it was going to be useless to try and call out for Yuriko, and attempting to climb Mikako ended in failure. One plan remains, but you worried when you thought about it. You reached inside your pocket, and pulled out your mobile phone. It was here when you remembered the silly commercials about "phones and phone bills shrinking", because for once, you are using a mobile phone that had indeed shrunk.

Quickly, you input the message onto the mobile phone, and then sent it to Yuriko's number. There was no sound, but when you looked up, you felt some relief. Yuriko had definitely got the message, and as she started to peer down, you quickly and frantically waved your arms about. Yuriko said nothing, but as she reached to grab for her bag, you could see her opening up her left palm, as if signalling for you to hop on before gently placing you on the table, hidden from sight by her pencil case.

After a whole day of running about, it was some relief that you had a friendly giantess on your side. However, even though there was only five minutes left, class was not yet over. Even though you could have used your mobile phone all this time, it was certainly dangerous. Calling Yuriko to meet you would have her accidentally stepping on you by mistake, and it was forbidden to use mobile phones in class, even in silent mode. Lady Luck was smiling at you back then.

The school bell rang for the final time for the day, and almost everybody started scrambling for the exit. Seizing the opportunity, you sent a message to Shuhei to report things are fine. Yuriko then crouched her face closer to you, staring at your tiny form.

"Hiroki-kun, how did you get so small?"

Yuriko whispered.

Knowing that you could not communicate with Yuriko like this, you showed Yuriko your mobile phone. Yuriko nodded, as if she understands how you will communicate. You then started to input as much text as you can into the phone to explain the story, but primarily to get home and help Reiko.

"Uh ... Takamoto-san ..."

A female voice came out, which caused Yuriko to turn to face the direction where the voice came from. It was Mikako Nagama, so that means that Shuhei was also successful in finding his girlfriend.

"No need formalities, just call me Yuriko. What is it, Mikako-kun?"

Mikako hesitated, blushing a little, before she whispered into Yuriko's ear. Yuriko's face went from shock to confusion as Mikako spoke. Finally, Mikako reached into her breast pocket, and pulled a tiny Shuhei out of it. Yuriko stared at Shuhei's tiny form, but said nothing.

"Uh, Mikako-kun ..."

Yuriko pointed at her pencil case, and then removed it from her desk, revealing your tiny form to Mikako. As she saw you, Mikako became hesitant and started fidgeting. From your position, you could see Shuhei's smirk on his face. Obviously, he must have told her of your "climbing adventure" of her body.

"OK, this is getting weird ..."

Yuriko mumbled, very puzzled at the scene in front of her.

=

Back at home, Reiko was already lying in her bed, with Yuriko and Mikako tending to her. Reiko had a thermometer in her mouth, which Yuriko later took from her.

"38.3 degrees. You really have fallen sick, Reiko-chan."

Yuriko looked at Reiko, who did not show any signs of recovery.

"But ... I have dinner to prepare ... and it's my duty for laundry today."

Yuriko then received a message on her mobile phone, and after seeing it, showed it to Reiko. Reiko then turned to look at you on the counter by her bed. As at your size, you were incapable of speaking verbally with her, so you had to rely on Yuriko to be your mouthpiece.

The message read, "Don't worry, Reiko. We'll handle the chores. You just stay here and have a good rest. - Hiroki"

Reiko nodded in agreement, and Yuriko then proceeded to tuck Reiko into her bed. Following that, Yuriko picked you off from the cupboard, and placed you gently on her left palm, leaving Reiko's room.
1123311211122211112221.title: Party of Two

11233112111222111122211.content:
Mikako emerged from Reiko's room, and closed the door shut. Looking at the living room, Yuriko was seated on a cushion facing a round table, and the three shrunken boys on the table. Mikako grabbed a cushion from the sofa nearby, and took her place at the table, facing Yuriko.

"Iketani's imouto (younger sister in Japanese) is fast asleep."

Mikako whispered, making sure her voice does not pierce the three tiny men on the table. You looked at her, and then bowed down. At your size, it was impossible to let hear you, so bowing to her was the only way to convey your thanks ... properly.

"Mikako-kun. Hiroki-kun has explained everything to me: about your affiliation with the Technology Club and that you are familiar with tinies. Now, we are expecting an explanation from you."

Yuriko said briefly, in her normal voice. In order to make sure her voice does not hurt your ears, she had placed her left hand on top of you guys as a cover of sorts. It managed to block out most of the noise, but it still felt awfully loud.

"All right. Even though I swore an oath of silence, I have to break it now. Especially after what the Technology Club had done to Shuhei."

Yuriko nodded, and Mikako continued.

"It began last year, at the former Midoriyama Girls' School, where I was last enrolled. After the first semester tests, I was approached by this senpai, and she asked me if I wanted to be 'a positive force on this Earth', as she puts it. I did not know what she meant by that, but after she started talking about a noble goal to save the world, I naively agreed. From there, this senpai gradually revealed the secrets of the Technology Club located at the basement of the former Midoriyama Girls' School coumpound. Even though the M & A scheme meant the loss of Midoriyama Girls' School as an entity, the Technology Club operated in secret, even when the entire school compound was rebuilt, and I am fairly certain they had a hand with the construction. My job was a lab assistant in helping the Technology Club with various formulas and experiments, primarily in the robotics field."

"That still does not explain how you know about tinies, Mikako-kun."

"The Technology Club has quite a following, and everybody has a rank, from the lowly E-rank to the chosen few of the A-rank. Each rank has a degree of knowledge of the workings within the Club. I only got my C-rank a few weeks ago, and it was here did my senpai showed me the so-called "Inner Sanctum". It was there did I noticed that they had succeeded in their "shrinking project", and I was a firsthand witness of the results: a few hypnotized and shrunken salarymen. With this secret, I was forced into an oath of silence, lest the 'Master Plan' gets jeopardized."

"Master Plan?"

Yuriko asked.

"I'm not really sure what it is. Only the A-ranked members and the Committee know the full details of the so-called 'Master Plan'. All I know is that it involved the shrinking project. I had no idea they will use it on students in the school, especially on the first day as well."

Mikako hung her head low in remorse. Now that the cat was out of the bag, there was no more hiding that Mikako had been a part of the Technology Club's 'Master Plan', albeit an unwitting part.

"I'm sorry, Shuhei ... I didn't know what they had planned ..."

Tears started streaking down Mikako's face, as the sense of guilt in her started to grow. Shuhei could barely make out Mikako's face underneath Yuriko's hand, but he could sense the sadness in her voice. Slowly, he crept out of Yuriko's hand, and he could see Mikako's immense form, still sobbing. Hiroshi and you peered from the safety of Yuriko's palm, and even though you could not fully see what was going on, you could notice Shuhei leaping from the table, and onto Mikako's lap. Shuhei then gently placed his hand on Mikako's larger hand, and then gently stroked it. Despite their size differences, Shuhei was not afraid to risk everything for his girlfriend, even his safety. A few tear drops handed very close to Shuhei as Mikako continued sobbing, but Shuhei stood firm, refusing to back off or run back to safety.

"Looks like Shuhei has given you an answer. What are you going to do about it?"

Yuriko had seen the entire scene unfold, and although Yuriko and Mikako had just barely knew each other, she could see that Mikako has someone who does care for her regardless of the mistakes she had done.

Mikako then wiped her face dry. After that, she gently picked up Shuhei from her lap, placing him on her open palm, and brought his tiny form to her face. In any situation, Shuhei would have wanted to give her a hug, but at his size, it was impossible.

"You ... you forgive me, Shuhei?"

Mikako looked on as Shuhei slowly approached her face, and gently planted a kiss on her cheek. Obviously, that was Shuhei's answer to Mikako. Looking from a distance, you could not help but feel a little envious of Shuhei. Even though both of you are of the same age, Shuhei was apparently more mature and brave than you were your entire life.

"OK, we'll leave them be for some time."

Hiroshi said, feeling proud of his brother.

"Hiroki-kun. Although I'm not familiar with the details, but from the looks of it, the 'Master Plan' must NOT happen. While the thought of giant girls is ... stimulating, to say the least, I don't want a world where people are dominated by their sizes. Whatever you decide, I will stick by you, Hiroki."

This was followed by a gentle tap on your shoulder. You looked behind for the source, and you could see Yuriko's finger that did it. Looking up, you saw Yuriko's smiling face, and although she did not speak, you could tell that Yuriko will support you all the way.

Now that part of the truth is out, it was almost time to strike back at the Technology Club, and prevent their 'Master Plan' from being carried out. But at your current size, there might be a problem. Do you want to prepare first, or do you intend to strike while the Technology Club is making preparations? The decision is yours.
11233112111222111122211.title: Party of Two (Part Two)

112331121112221111222111.content:
"Whatever the Technology Club is planning, I can safely say it is not beneficial to the human race. I say we hit them while they are making preparations."

Yuriko nodded, understanding your choice. If what Mikako said was true, the Technology Club might still be in the midst of preparations, and a 'surgical strike' at them could cripple their efforts.

"We will head out tonight. In the meantime, go ahead and make your preparations. We will definitely need Mikako's help with this one, since she is the most familiar with the insides of the Technology Club. In the meantime ... I need sleep."

Following that, you let off a yawn, and Yuriko could not help but giggle. It seems you looked really cute when you yawn. She gently placed you back on the table, and reached for her handkerchief, and laid it out for you as a makeshift bed.

"You just rest for now, Hiroki. I'll take care of Reiko for now."

Yuriko whispered, and after placing Hiroshi on the table as well, she took her leave and went to Reiko's room. Meanwhile, you decided to go and take a nap in preparation for tonight's investigation action.

===

Nighttime had fallen, and the school compound was empty ... or it seemed to be. Yuriko and Mikako were standing outside the school gate, which was obviously locked for security reasons.

"Follow me."

Mikako reached for her pouch which she carried, and pulled out what appears to be a card key (with a huge letter 'C' printed on it). She gently tapped the card at the door control, and it reacted with a loud beep, causing the gate to open.

"The Technology Club hacked into our school security system?"

Yuriko was taken aback.

"Actually, the Technology Club was the one who provided the security controls."

The two girls then hurriedly headed to the school building before the guards notice the breach. Inside, both Yuriko and Mikako used the in-built flashlights in their cellphones to help illuminate the way. Mikako led the way, and promptly stopped at the janitor's closet.

"The secret entrance is through here. Follow me."

Mikako opened the closet door, which was supposed to be locked at this time, surprising Yuriko again. The janitor's closet was the cover for a secret underground entrance towards the Technology Club's main compound. Once the two ladies have made it down a hidden passabe of steps, they were inside the compound. Compared to the rest of the school, the Technology Club's facilities are well-lit, which temporarily blinded Yuriko and Mikako as they approached.

There were uneasy sounds of motors running in the background, not to mention footsteps of other Technology Club members in the distance.

"How on earth could the school security guards miss something like this?"

Yuriko asked, looking around and recalling what she had just seen.

"The Technology Club also runs a legitimate business front. A security company, to be exact. I'm not too sure about the details. Only the A-ranked members get information on that."

Yuriko then reached into her pocket, and picked you out and gently placing you on her palm. Mikako did likewise with the Yamamoto brothers inside her breast pocket.

"This is as far as I could bring you, Hiroki." Mikako whispered. "What's the plan now?"

"You know, I have been thinking ..."

You turned around to face Shuhei as he spoke.

"What is it, Shuhei?" You asked.

"Mikako mentioned to me there are shrunken people working about in this compound, doing menial tasks. If that is true, then there must be some sort of ... tunnel network inside this whole compound. The three of us could use the subtle approach to accomplish this. I'm sure no one will notice us eavesdropping or snooping around their databases if they cannot see us."

"You have a valid point, Shuhei. However, I am more concerned if we get caught, either by the tiny 'drone-men' or by the giant girls inside this building." You then turned to Hiroshi. "Hiroshi. You are the eldest here. Why don't you make a suggestion?"

"Shuhei's plan may be workable, but I am more concerned that time is not really on our side. Since Mikako mentioned that only A-ranked members know the true workings of this place, I'm sure at least one might be present right now. I say we either interrogate that person or swipe the pass card. It may not be a nice thing to to, but time is really not on our side."

"You are the one who called this investigation, Hiroki. You decide." Yuriko said.

Your choice?
112331121112221111222111.title: Investigation Time

1123311211122211112221111.content:
"We can interrogate the A-ranked members after we search this area. I say we go explore the tunnels first and then plot our next move."

Everyone nodded after making your decision. After that, the two girls sneakily made their way around the compound, looking for what might be a tunnel entrance. Their search paid off, and sure enough, there was a door that was more suited for tiny people than for either Yuriko or Mikako.

"I guess this is it, guys. Good hunting inside."

Mikako and Yuriko gently placed their palms closer onto the ground, allowing the three of you to disembark. The plan is that the three of you are going to look around inside the tunnels, while Yuriko and Mikako will circle around the area to avoid any patrols that might be present. Shuhei led the way, and pushed the door open. The tunnels were dark, and were barely any light from within. Quickly, all three of you reached out for your cellphones, and switched on the flashlight in-built into the phone.

"How anyone is able to move and walk around here is beyond me." Hiroshi remarked. Just then, as the three of you approached a junction, you could feel a source of light coming. The three of you quickly backed towards the side of a wall. The source of light came from another patrol incoming: two tiny guys. One was carrying an electric torch, the other with what appears to be an assault rifle.

"Wait for them to pass. Then we sneak up on them."

You suggested. The Yamamoto brothers nodded in agreement with your decision. As the patrol passed by, the Yamamoto brothers swiftly knocked out the two guys with swift chops to their necks. Quickly, they picked up the electric torch and assault rifle. Hiroshi also noticed a pistol tucked away in one of the guys' uniforms, which he also took and handed it to you.

"Firearms? This is a dangerous place indeed. Even though we are facing foes of our current size." Shuhei remarked.

"At least now we have something for protection." You added. "Hiroshi-san. You have the electric torch. You lead the way. We will cover you."

The expedition inside the tunnels of the continued until the three of you reached another T-junction. Both appear to have light sources at the end, but the choice is yours. Head left, or head right?
1123311211122211112221111.title: Tunnel Rats

11233112111222111122211111.content:
Your instincts are saying left, so you told Horoshi to shine the torch towards the left. Luckily for the three of you, there were barely any patrols around, so the path was clear. The light source was faint, but you could see the same kind of door when you guys first entered, only that one of the two doors was left ajar, explaining the source of light.

The three of you exited the tunnels, taking a while to let your eyes get used to the light after being inside the dark for so long. The three of you appear to be in another room, but it appears to be empty.From your position, the left side has another door, only it was the size suitable for normal humans, On your right is what appears to be a stairwell as well as another tunnel entrance. As you looked upwards, there was a large sign that said "Top Secret: Keep Out". It seems you know where you guys should go next.

As you approached the tunnel entrance door, you could feel your ground shake, followed by loud sounds. It came from the stairwell, and you could see a normal-sized girl wearing the same school uniform coming up the stairs, and the ground shaking and loud sounds were caused by her footsteps. Strangely, she stopped walking right in front of the three of you. Her loafers felt like a size of a heavy tank to you guys.

Looking up, you could barely see her face, so you tried to go around the side. However, before you could proceed, the girl simply shifted her left foot and dropped it down in front of you guys, blocking the way in the process. Taken aback, you looked up, and the girl was staring directly at the three of you. With her left hand, she started waving her finger about, signalling that the three of you are not going anywhere.

Shuhei and you then aimed your respective weapons at her, taking her aback if her facial appearance is any indication. Now comes the tricky part. One, neither of the weapons have been tested yet, and perhaps getting away from this giantess might save your behinds for a while. Then agaiin, the giantess is clearly not friendly, if her feet are any indication, and the only way to get by her is through the use of force.

Both are tough decisions, but you have to make the call.
11233112111222111122211111.title: One Big Obstacle

112331121112221111222111111.content:
Whether it was either fear or a lack of control, you pulled the trigger, firing a shot at the giantess. The bullet grazed the skirt of the giantess, but other than that, all it did was to anger the giantess. She starts to raise her right foot, and hover it above the three of you. Shuhei started firing shots at the shoe, but it apparently did nothing.

As it came down, all three of you scrambled away from the impact, but poor Hiroshi was not so lucky, being pinned underneath the heel of the shoe. The two of you could only watch in horror as Hiroshi gets grinded to a paste in front of you. Shuhei, clearly outraged at his brother's death, started charging at the shoe, firing his rifle until the magazine was empty. The giantess simply swung her foot towards Shuhei, and like someone being hit by an oncoming train, Shuhei was sent flying, his body making contact with the wall upon impact, before falling back down on the ground, motionless.

"Shuhei!" You exclaimed as you rushed to your friend's side. Alas, the impact of hitting his head at such speed meant that Shuhei had already joined his brother into the embrace of death. The giantess slowly approached you, the dreaded sound of her footsteps had never felt so chillingly scary. In one final step, she pinned you and Shuhei's lifeless body underneath the sole of her loafer, and pressing her entire weight on that position, your body could no longer handle the immense pressure, and you whited out, your body grinded into a pool of blood along with Shuhei's lifeless body.

Outside, the two ladies were not as lucky either, as hearing the sound of the gunshots and following it to the source, they accidentally stumbled upon a patrol, who promptly subdued them.

Yuriko and Mikako were never heard from again. Some say they became the next victims of the shrink ray. Others present a darker tale that the two became "playthings" for the brainwashed tinies. Whatever the truth was, nobody knew.
112331121112221111222111111.title: Brash, Feeble, Foolish!

11233112111222111122211112.content:
The three of you turned towards the right, towards the source of light at the right end of the tunnel. One of the doors at the end of the tunnel was left ajar, revealing the source of the light. However, as you could see what was behind the door, you guys sneaked towards the back of the still-closed door.

After waiting for a while, you then peered at whatever was behind the door, and then went inside. It turns out that what you had seen earlier had the silhouette was something unusual: a suit of armor, only slightly larger than your current size. Looking around, you found yourselves inside what appears to be an armory, but the size of the room was suitable for your current sizes. There were whole racks of weapons, from pistols to assault rifles and heavy weapons. The suit of armor you saw was placed at the center, probably as a showpiece to demonstrate the technological expertise of the Club. Near the end corner is a computer terminal, placed on a desk. All of the items were fitted for your current sizes.

"This must be where the Technology Club stores their weapons, and probably where this weapon came from." You said, looking at your pistol.

"Doesn't look like anybody is around. Come on, let's take a look around." Hiroshi said, and the three of you looked around the Technology Club's armory. Shuhei went to a rack of assault rifles similar to the one he had, and started looking around for more ammunition magazines. Hiroshi rummaged around the weapons cache, looking for a weapon for himself, while you headed to the computer terminal. However, despite your skills with using computers, most of the data inside the computer was highly encrypted, and the only thing you could work out was the weapons data of this particular armory. One thing that stood out was the blueprints for the suit of armor at the middle. There was a lot of technological jargon that you might ask Mikako about later, but the crucial thing you discovered was that the suit of armor was designed specifically to withstand being crushed by heavy objects. As you examine the statistics, you found a astounding discovery: a person wearing that suit could withstand being crushed by the feet of giantesses.

"Wow ... that suit would certainly help things out for us." You exclaimed as you read the data. As you shut down the terminal, you saw a row of ammunition catridges on the desk. You looked up, and you saw Hiroshi placing down the last cartridge.

"Here. You will need these." Hiroshi said, pointing to your pistol. Hiroshi was carrying what appears to bea miniaturized minigun, with what appears to be a metallic oil drum-like backpack. "Man, I thought this thing would be heavy when I first saw this. Imagine that."

"I have something better: that suit of armor. It might increase our survivalbility." You pointed at the suit of armor, and telling the Yamamoto brothers of its properties, particularly its ability to withstand being crushed.

"Sounds nice, Hiroki, but this thing is protected with some electronic field. You have to break it if you want to wear this."

You headed towards the suit, and towards the console. Your coding skills were good, but the programming codes for the shield was also very well-written. You had to take a chance to decode and bring down the shield. After a while, you were done, and everything had to be left to the machine. Was it successful?
11233112111222111122211112.title: The Armory

112331121112221111222111121.content:
The programming worked, and the electric shield came down without any problems. The power suit was now ready for one of you guys to use, which the Yamamoto brothers agreed that you should be the one wearing it, citing your ... physical limits. While flattered, you also felt somewhat insulted with the remark. You donned the power suit, with some help from the Yamamoto brothers, as it was not easy connecting the various interfaces inside the suit by yourself.

It took 20 minutes to completely put you inside the power suit, but once inside, you could feel a sense of confidence. After all, now you were wearing something that could survive being crushed. Shuhei tossed you an assault rifle, which you managed to catch.
