It felt a little awkward (since you were not at least a head taller than the Yamamoto brothers) holding the rifle in your position, and even though you could move as per normal inside the suit, taking bigger strides than normal was going to take some getting used to.

The three of you returned back into the tunnel, and headed to the left side, the only other exit in this section of the tunnel network. The three of you exited the tunnels, taking a while to let your eyes get used to the light after being inside the dark for so long. The three of you appear to be in another room, but it appears to be empty.From your position, the left side has another door, only it was the size suitable for normal humans, On your right is what appears to be a stairwell as well as another tunnel entrance. As you looked upwards, there was a large sign that said "Top Secret: Keep Out". It seems you know where you guys should go next.

As you approached the tunnel entrance door, you could feel your ground shake, followed by loud sounds. It came from the stairwell, and you could see a normal-sized girl wearing the same school uniform coming up the stairs, and the ground shaking and loud sounds were caused by her footsteps. Strangely, she stopped walking right in front of the three of you. Her loafers felt like a size of a heavy tank to you guys.

Through your visor, you could see her face (albeit barely), so you tried to go around the side. However, before you could proceed, the girl simply shifted her left foot and dropped it down in front of you guys, blocking the way in the process.

"Hey, I recognize that suit!" The girl said, almost piercing your eardrums. "You two aren't part of the Technology Club, are you?"

The three of you froze, and said nothing while the girl tried to recall.

"No, you don't ring a bell! Guess I have to dispose of you! Can't have you guys bellowing out our secrets, can we?"

Terrified at the threat, Shuhei and you then aimed your respective weapons at her, taking her aback if her facial appearance is any indication. Now comes the tricky part. One, neither of the weapons have been tested yet, and perhaps getting away from this giantess might save your behinds for a while. Then agaiin, the giantess is clearly not friendly, if her feet are any indication, and only you are capable of surviving being crushed right now.

Both are tough decisions, but you have to make the call.
112331121112221111222111121.title: One Big Obstacle (Deja Vu)

112331121112221111222111122.content:
The coding failed, and instead of lowering the shield as intended, the console suddenly let off a loud wailing sound. The alarm has been raised!

"Oh, that's just great!" You muttered. "Now every miniaturized drone-man will be after us."

"Forget that, Hiroki!" Shuhei answered. "Let's get out of here, and fast."

"Wait!" You exclaimed. "I need to get some data from the computer. Can I ask you guys to hold this place while I get it?"

"Make it fast, Hiroki! I have no idea what the Technology Club is gonna send here!"

You nodded, and restarted the computer terminal again. You searched the desk, and to your delight, there was a portable hard drive inside one of the drawers, and it was still fresh (and suited for your size). Quickly, you plugged the device in, and started downloading the files onto the hard disk, only to find out that it required 10 minutes to complete the process.

"Bugger! 10 minutes!" You exclaimed again. "Well, at least this place has the weapons to keep us alive, even for a short while."

There was no time for any more smart remarks, as the first wave of attackers entered the armory: a bunch of sentry drones designed like mechanical pitbulls. Hiroshi wasted no time in firing his minigun, turning several of these mechanical dogs to scrap. Shuhei covered his brother, firing bursts of rounds with his assault rifle. Quickly, you grabbed your pistol, and joined in the firefight while the computer terminal does its work.

It was not long before another wave of attackers came. This time, it was brainwashed students, shrunken to a similar size as yourself and armed with either stun rods or pistols. Hiroshi fired another burst of bullets, slowing them as they approached the armory.

"Guys, try not to kill them. They are just brainwashed and not actually evil. Go for their arms or legs." You ordered, and the two brothers nodded. Shuhei was a crack shot with his assault rifle, and the two brothers worked well in tandem. Hiroshi's supressive fire managed to slow down the attackers, long enough for Shuhei to target their arms and legs for a shot. As for yourself, you had to stop any attackers that are getting too close to the computer terminal.

It was a minute left before the downloading process is complete, but the tide is turning. Both Yamamoto brothers are running out of bullets, and Hiroshi was firing his minigun in bursts. Shuhei was already down to his last magazine. The wave of sentry drones and brainwashed male students never seemed to end. Hastily, you rushed back to the terminal to have a look. What was the message displayed on the monitor?
112331121112221111222111122.title: Holding The Line

1123311211122211112221111221.content:
"The download is complete! Let's get out of here!"

You exclaimed as you pulled the portable hard drive out of the terminal. Just to make sure the damage was done, you fired a shot at the computer terminal, damaging it in the process. Hiroshi had dumped the minigun aside, taking an assault rifle (and some magazines) from the nearby weapon rack, and beckoned you to follow them.

"On Shuhei! Let's go!"

Shuhei led the way back inside the tunnels, past the bodies of neutralized students and destroyed sentry drones. You knew you could not take the same way out, so you had to guess your way around the tunnels to find an exit. There was no shortage of sentry drones and brainwashed students out to disable the three of you, and at times, you guys had to run than fight. The real problem is whether the larger members of the Technology Club had also heard the alarm (the sound was awfully loud to your ears) and have they began searching for the intruders as well.

The tunnel network around the Technology Club was vast, but despite the fact that the three of you had been running around for some time, there was no sign of a tunnel exit. Navigating in the dark was certainly not easy, and using the flashlights on the weapons is bound to draw attention. In addition, most of the tunnel doors appear to have been sealed shut. The Technology Club's security features had the three of you strangled in a noose, and it was a matter of time before the Technology Club tightened it.

The three of you finally came to a particular tunnel entrance door. Strangely, it was not particularly sealed shut, though forcing it open would require force. You heard the sound of more sentry drones coming, so this was a risk to take. Gesturing the Yamamoto brothers, the three of you charged straight at the door. Strangely, the door was forced open, but you realized that the tunnel entrance was built above the floor, a considerable height in your terms. The three of you plummet down and ...
1123311211122211112221111221.title: Time To Bail!

11233112111222111122211112211.content:
... in a very strange twist of fate, the three of you landed on something soft and fleshy, bouncing off before coming down again. After getting over the shock, you found yourself landing on something soft. The color resembled skin, and it was not until you noticed a very familiar pink bra cupping whatever you had landed on.

You had somehow managed to land right into Yuriko's bosom, and onto her left breast. You looked up, and sure enough, Yuriko's eyes were staring right down at you.

"Hiro ... HMPH!"

Yuriko wanted to exclaim, but Mikako quickly gagged Yuriko's mouth with her hand. Mikako had also seen the three of you land in Yuriko's bosom, and while amused, cannot allow themselves to be compromised. Like the tiny brainwashed students, they had heard the alarm as well (though a fainter sound).

"Sorry, Yuriko. You need to handle three passengers for a while. Follow me."

Mikako led the way, while Yuriko (and the three passengers in her bosom) followed suit. Being familiar with the compound, Mikako led the rest of you inside what appears to be a small, dark room. It was not very big, about the size of a small bedroom, and there was a computer terminal, unfortunately the size suited for the two girls to use. The room was not well lit, so there was little chance of being discovered. At least it was large enough to contain two young schoolgirls inside it.

Mikako went to the computer terminal desk, and took something out, while Yuriko carefully released her passengers out of her bosom, still embarrassed with what went down. Mikako then handed you what appears to be a computer laptop, miniaturized for your use at your current size.

"What is this place?" Yuriko asked, careful not to pierce your eardrums with the conversation..

"My personal space." Mikako said. "The Technology Club has quarters for senior staff, especially if they have to work on top-secret stuff. I got this when I received my C-class membership."

"Unbelievable." Yuriko remarked.

"Hiroki, I will need you to transfer your files from the hard drive to my computer. I will try and de-crypt them as much as I can." With that, Mikako used her cellphone to send a message to you, containing her e-mail address to transfer the files. In spite of the vast size differences, at least electronic communication is still possible, regardless of sizes.

You nodded, and the two of you began to start your work. Meanwhile, Yuriko went to have a little rest on Mikako's bed, while the Yamamoto brothers accompany Mikako. Transferring the files to Mikako was a slow process, even with the advent of more advance networking, and then there is the problem with de-crypting the data from the hard disk drive. As you finish transferring the last file, you suddenly began to feel sleepy, and then, your mind went blank.

===

You were awoken by something nudging your head. As you regain consciousness, you noticed that it was Yuriko's pinkie finger gently nudging your head, being very careful not to squash you. As it turns out, Mikako had already finished de-crypting the data while you slept.

"Did you find anything, Mikako?" Yuriko asked, looking at you before peering back at Mikako, still seated in front of the computer terminal.

"There is not much, unfortunately. Just a lot of weapons schematics and stuff. Although ... there is some kind of program software that I happened to find. It's some sort of ... virtual memory mumbo-jumbo that I am unable to explain. I know what it is, but I cannot explain it. Maybe it's best that I show you instead."

"What time is it now?" Yuriko asked.

"Morning, in the day." Mikako answered. "Perfect timing too, since nobody besides the tiny male students working around at this hour. Follow me."

Quickly, Yuriko held out her hand, allowing you to climb back aboard, which you did. Mikako opened the door, and just as she said, there was no one around.

"This way." Mikako said.

(to be continued)
11233112111222111122211112211.title: Marshmallow Landing

112331121112221111222111122111.content:
As Mikako predicted, most of the hallways were empty, and if there were any signs of activity, it must have been well concealed. You were safe inside Yuriko's curled hand, albeit with some breathing room. In a way, this was a much better mode of travel, even though the softness of Yuriko's cleavage was ... unforgettable.

Mikako stopped in front of door that labelled 'VR Facility' in kanji. Below it, a smaller green label tab with the kanji for 'Available' written on it. Mikako quietly slipped the tab aside, revealing a red label tab with 'In Session' in kanji on it. Slowly, she opened the door, peered around, and then quickly gestured Yuriko to enter. Quickly, Mikako locked the door, and switched on the lights. Once the lights were shone, what you saw immediately blew your eyes away.

From Yuriko's now open palm, you could see whole rows of what appears to be futuristic sarcophagi, with a lot of wiring connected to a central mainframe. All the sarcophagi were quite small in comparison to Yuriko, and you immediately knew who were meant to go inside those ... things. Mikako turned towards another room within the VR Facility, and as it turns out, was a monitoring facility, with several computers linked to the rows of sarcophagi-like boxes. Mikako immediately went to work, starting up the nearest available computer, and inserting the hard drive containing the files you collected into the system. After a while, one of the "sarcophagi" shone with a small, but very notable, green light.

"THERE!" Mikako's sound over the broadcast suddenly took all of you by surprise. Yuriko quickly clasped her ears together, forgetting about you inside her palm momentarily. For a while, you had the pleasure of a full view of Yuriko's ear.

"OH GOSH! SORRY!" There was silence, and then you could feel yourself leaving Yuriko's ear, still inside her palm.

"Sorry, I forgot to adjust the mic volume." Mikako answered sheepishly. "Yuriko, go ahead and place Hiroki inside that machine. The one flashing green."

Yuriko was about to ask what it was, but Mikako soon gave her the answer.

"It is a virtual reality simulation capsule, or VR capsule, as we call it. With this, you can experience the memories of whatever you found in those files. Just get in, lie down, and let the machine do the rest."

Yuriko headed towards the target capsule, and gently let you down from her palm. You headed to the capsule, and opened it. The thought of entering the capsule felt creepy at first, but after mustering some courage, you went in. You laid down as Mikako order, and surprisingly, the interior of the capsule was not as bad as you thought, though it still felt a little creepy.

"Yuriko, close the capsule. You can retrieve Hiroki-kun later. Come join me here, and you can see the images too."

Yuriko knelt down, and prepared to close the capsule.

"I will be back for you later, Hiroki-kun." She whispered, and her face was the last thing you saw before she closed the VR capsule shut. Immediately, everything felt cold and quiet. It was not long before you realize that there was some sort of helmet close to your head. Not knowing what might be in store, you quickly put the helmet-like device on. It was not long before your eyes were in sight of a blinding light. You wanted to close your eyes, but it was too late to remove the helmet. You were now being transported directly into the memory of the file you had found ...
112331121112221111222111122111.title: VR Memories (Part 1)

1123311211122211112221111221111.content:
You found yourself in some kind of white room. Words could not describe it, as no matter which direction you ran, all you saw was white. There was no ceiling, and even though there was a floor, it was not anything special. You wondered if Mikako had tricked you, but suddenly, everything started turning wavy, and you felt like you were being pulled into a vortex. Then everything went black ...

You opened your eyes, and you found yourself in a town of sorts. However, the architecture looked a lot like the sets from the Movie City in Osaka, where period dramas were filmed. Strangely, despite the appearance of a large town, there was no one in sight, even though the sun was high up in the sky. Something is amiss, you thought to yourself.

You looked down, and you found yourself wearing a tattered kimono and haori (Japanese baggy pants). You carried two swords, similar to a daisho pair in the period dramas. Curiously, you took one of the swords, and drew the sword out from its scabbard. Imagine your shock when you discover that it was a real sword.

"Hey!" A familiar voice came from behind you. "Can you stop admiring your sword and get ready? 'She' is almost here!"

You turned around to face whoever spoke to you, and to your surprise. it looked like Shuhei, except he wore a chonmage hair style, wore similar clothes like you, and carried a long spear.

"Shuhei?" You asked.

"Shuhei? Who's that?" The person answered. "I'm Sadauji. What, did you lose your memory, Harutoshi?"

Before you could ask another question, you could hear some rumbling sounds. Surprisingly, it sounded like giant footsteps, as ever since you got smaller, you had gotten accustomed to that sound.

"This is starting to get way too familiar ..." You mumbled to yourself.

In the distance, you could see a silhouette approaching the city, and in another surprise, the silhouette appeared humanoid. In fact, it felt eerily too similar to that of a female human being. As the silhouette got closer, the sound of the footsteps got louder, and the ground shook harder as the silhouette approached.

"Get ready!" Sadauji said. raising his spear into a combat stance. You were never accustomed to kendo, but you decided to try and mimic some of the flashy sword movements you saw in the period dramas.

Finally, the fog cleared up, and you could finally see whatever it was, which took you aback. It definitely looked like a human female in her early 20s, but 100 times bigger than a normal person. The figure was also butt-naked, with her breasts and womanhood in full show to you, with a crop of black hair, insanely long to be able to reach all the way to the ground.

You were too stunned in your stance, admiring the figure in front of you in both awe and fear. Sadauji, however, did not seem fazed, aiming his long spear towards the giantess approaching the city.

===

Yuriko looked on at Mikako's screen, blushing at the sight in front of the screen.

"Wha ... what kind of lewd memory is this, Mikako-chan?" Yuriko whispered, trying very hard not to raise her voice.

"I don't know. But we have no choice to keep watching." Mikako, as flustered as she was at seeing the butt-naked giantess, was trying to maintain composure so she can maintain the stability of the VR capsule.

"I don't like where this is going ..." Yuriko said ...
1123311211122211112221111221111.title: VR Memories (Part 2)

1123311211122211112221112.content:
"Time is really not on our side, so I have to side with Hiroshi on this one." You answered. "Shuhei, I am sorry, but we really do not have the time to investigate the network which you said."

"You are the leader, Hiroki. I'm OK with that."

Following that, you turned to Mikako.

"Mikako-san. Do you know any A-ranked members around here?"

"Eh ... not personally. I do not know their names, but I will recognize them if I see them ..."

Suddenly, Mikako stopped talking, as she noticed someone walking at a corridor a distance away. Her eyes widen, as if she remembers something about that person.

"Wait, that person ... she's an A-ranked member!"

All of you turned to have a look, and to your surprise (and horror), the person Mikako was talking about was actually Shizuka Kinugawa herself!

"What? Shizuka is an A-ranked member here?" You exclaimed in disbelief.

"You know her, Hiroki-kun?" Mikako asked softly.

"Know her? She has been nothing but trouble in my whole school life. Now, I am supposed to believe she is an A-ranked member of the Technology Club as well?"

You shook your head, still in denial and disbelief at the identity of your nemesis in school.

"Well, at least now we have a target." Hiroshi remarked. "Let's go get the information from her."

"Wait!" You said. "Shizuka can be notoriously stubborn and tight-lipped. My best bet is that we try and steal her pass card. Otherwise, we might need 5 normal-sized people if we want to do this the 'talking way'."

You guys could hear footsteps approaching, meaning the two girls have to get moving. You need to decide on your next course of action, and fast!
1123311211122211112221112.title: The Interrogation Plan

choices: Yuriko Got You Out In Time
You Are Stuck In Shizuka's Pocket
11233112111222111122211122.content:
You pointed straight at where Shizuka was last spotted, having made your decision.

Both girls nodded, and dashed off after Shizuka, avoiding being spotted at the same time. As the girls resumed moving again, you guys were held tightly as they closed their respective hands.

After a while, Mikako found Shizuka. She was talking to another member, but there were too much jargon used that you had no idea what she was talking about. However, it appears like she was done talking, and she might leave again, a theory which you were proven right. Shizuka started walking again, and to the girls' horror, she was walking in the direction towards them.

Luckily, there was a corner for them to hide, and Shizuka walked by without noticing either of them. Yuriko opened her hand, and you quickly signalled to her about your next course of action. Yuriko nodded, and gently walked towards Shizuka while Mikako waited at the corner. Yuriko crept closely behind Shizuka, much akin to the protagonist fron Ninja's Code. As soon as she got close, she reached her hand towards Shizuka's skirt pocket, allowing you to creep inside. Your tiny size allowed you to rummage around the skirt pocket, but asides a few coins, there was nothing resembling Mikako's card pass. You concluded that Shizuka must be carrying it in her breast pocket, a place not easily accessed, especially considering your mutual enmity and current sizes.

You crawled out of the pocket, but Yuriko's hand was now further away. Making matters worse, Shizuka started picking up speed with her walking. You looked down, and trembled at the tremendous fall that awaits you if you jump. Hurriedly, Yuriko reached her hand out to pick you out of Shizuka's skirt pocket. Was she successful?
11233112111222111122211122.title: The Shizuka Solution

choices: Yes (You Landed In Her Breast Pocket)
112331121112221111222111222.content:
Unfortunately, Yuriko's fingers were unable to swipe you in time as Shizuka walked away, meaning you were stuck with Shizuka, and not in the way you had expected. From the distance, you could see Yuriko's worried face, but after hearing footsteps, Yuriko had to turn away and hide. Meanwhile, your upper body was still poking out of Shizuka's skirt pocket.

All is not lost, however. Since there was no way for Shizuka to hold that card pass all the time, and the card pass was not in her skirt pocket, there was only one place left for Shizuka to store her card pass: the breast pocket. Looking up, you noticed that Shizuka's long hair provides decent cover, and the uniform she is wearing seems easy to climb. Slowly, you got yourself out of her skirt pocket, and started climbing her back, using her hair as cover in case she starts probing around.

After a while, you managed to climb up towards her shoulders, and in clear view of Shizuka's breast pocket ... and her breasts as well, cupped with a light purple bra. Resisting temptation, you could catch a glimpse of the pocket, and sure enough, the card pass is right there, with a giant 'A' labelled on it. Now comes the tricky part: Shizuka's walking motion is making your position very unstable, and with wrong timing, you could very well tumble right into Shizuka's breasts ... and into serious trouble. You positioned yourself, ready to make a plunge. After that, gravity starts to kick in, and you began your descent down.

Now the question remaining is whether Lady Luck is smiling upon you today?
112331121112221111222111222.title: Climbing Shizuka's Body

1123311211122211112221112221.content:
Success! You managed to sneak inside Shizuka's breast pocket without her noticing you, and you were facing the huge pass card. You tried to move it, and you noticed that it was not as heavy as you thought. You then thought of a new plan: drop the card out of Shizuka's pocket, and then get Yuriko to grab it before Shizuka knows it's missing.

However, the plan had to wait as you saw Shizuka's huge fingers reaching and taking the pass card away from the pocket. You had to wait for a loud beeping sound, before Shizuka replaced the card pass back in her pocket, taking you by surprise with the impact. You decided to take a look around at your surroundings, and to your surprise, you found yourself in some sort of conference room. Shizuka was seated at the table, with several giant-sized (in your perspective) ladies. Strangely, you could not find Hitomi among them. You can safely assume that these are the other 'A-ranked' members that Mikako mentioned earlier.

"Ladies. This meeting is now in session."

A loud female voice boomed in the air. It seems that Shizuka is now in a meeting of sorts, and it might take some time before she is done here, putting the "toss card pass out" plan on hold. However, there was another opportunity for you. You took out your cellphone, and to your relief, it still had about 60% of power remaining. It was a matter of time before the meeting begins, and your cellphone capabilities presented you with two potential options. One, use the recording device to eavesdrop on this "high-level conference" and expose the plans of the Technology Club. Two, try and sneak Shizuka's pass card out by luring her out of the conference and then getting Yuriko to grab it. Both have their risks, but if successful, you believe the Technology Club's schemes could be exposed.

What will you do?
1123311211122211112221112221.title: The Breast Pocket

11233112111222111122211122211.content:
The contents of this meeting is simply too good to pass up, so you decided to stay in Shizuka's breast pocket and record the meeting, in the hopes of exposing them later. With your cellphone, you opened the application for voice recording, and held it out of the pocket to capture the sounds.

"A-ranked member, Rika Ayase, will begin the meeting." One of the voices said.

"I am very pleased to report that the experiments of the shrinking ray have been a great success. As we speak, the preparations for the 'Master Plan' is already in motion."

Master Plan? So the Technology Club does have something planned, but you need to find out what.

"How is the progress on the clean up actions?" Another voice asked. "No one must find out too much about the Master Plan, and the technologies we will be using?"

"Regretfully, the clean up process has not been smooth. But we are doing our best to ..."

"Doing your best is not enough!"

Shizuka interrupted, standing up and slamming her hand down on the floor in the process. Her actions suddenly took you aback, but luckily, you were safe inside her pocket, and she had not noticed her "passenger" ... so far.

"Do you even know the urgency of the Master Plan? All our weapons and technologies are waiting on the success of the shrinking ray. Do you have any idea what will happen if anyone, and I mean anyone, know about this?"

"K-Kinugawa, I ... I ..."

"Calm down, Shizuka-chan." The second voice rang out, stopping the argument. "I appreciate your concerns, but do not forget why this whole Technology Club was formed."

"To ... to help propel mankind into a new age?" Shizuka murmured, somewhat embarrassed by her outburst. After a awkward silence, she sat back down.

"Exactly. Let Ayase-chan finish her job, though I agree that we must speed up the cleaning up operations. If only the world knows what we are doing over here."

There was a pause, and then the girl called Ayase continued following another question.

"Any word on ... 'it'?"

"I ... It, Chairwoman? According to these reports ..." Ayase panickedly flipped through her papers. "We might have a problem. 'It' ... has been showing signs of awakening."

"As expected. Don't worry, Ayase-chan. When 'zero hour' really occurs, the Technology Club will be ready."

There was too much jargon used for the rest of the meeting, but as you recorded the conversation, you could vaguely work out the details od the 'Master Plan'. Apparently, the shrinking ray technology is the key for the success of the 'Master Plan'. However, you need to decipher the jargon before you can figure out the missing parts of the 'Master Plan'.

It was not long before the meeting ended, and Shizuka left the meeting. However, instead of following the crowd, Shizuka moved in a different direction, apparently going deeper inside the underground facilities of the Technology Club. She stopped in front of a door with the kanji for 'top secret' boldly painted on it. Shizuka reached for her pass card (you were still safe in your pocket), and tapped it on the card reader. The door then opened with a loud and slow whirling voice, and Shizuka entered. This place was less illuminated than the upper levels, and it appears to have no one working here. Shizuka eventually reached a dead end, with doors on both the left and right side. You were not familiar with this place, so you have to go with whatever Shizuka is planning.

Which door did Shizuka choose to enter?
11233112111222111122211122211.title: Recording Blitz

112331121112221111222111222111.content:
The left door was protected with another pass reader, and Shizuka reached for her card pass. By this time, you had gotten used to it, and the only thing you need to watch out was where the card will land once Shizuka was done.

You peered out of the pocket, and you could see Shizuka walking down some dark underground tunnel. It was not long before Shizuka entered a chamber of sorts. However, what you saw inside the chamber was nothing you have ever seen in your entire life.

The chamber area was huge, and from Shizuka's standing position, you could see what it was the Technology Club had contained. It was not something mechanical or futuristic, but it had the appearance of a human female ... assuming it was human sized in the first place. It was nearly a hundred times larger than the average human, and you can imagine how small you would have been in comparison. What you were to Shizuka, Shizuka is exactly that to whatever that thing was.

"Centuries ago ... right here on this very land, the great one, known in this country as 'the Oni', appeared upon this world, and began to spread fear and terror on the populace. The Oni would have had her way, if not for the interference of the hated descendant of the 'True Blood', and her samurai retainer. What they could not slay, they bind. The samurai warrior managed to wound the great one despite their size differences, allowing time for the 'True Blood' descendant to cast her binding spell, imprisoning the great one and ending the Oni's rampage."

The big question in your mind is why Shizuka started talking like that, especially with the tale of the Oni, presumably referring to whatever the Technology Club had imprisoned in this chamber. However, what was clear to you was that the Technology Club had kept this secret away, and when you looked at the still dormant Oni, there was a good reason why. Judging from the meeting you managed to tape earlier, you know that the Technology Club intends to deal with it.

"Soon, that binding spell will fade ... and the great Oni shall rise once again to claim her rightful place as ruler of the human realm!"

Your assumptions were soon proven true, and that the Technology Club had been planning all this time to possibly shrink the Oni as a last resort. However, what you are about to hear was truly not what you had expected.

"I will personally see to that."

Those few words spoken felt like a hard wedge driven down your ears and right down into your spine. As of now, you are the only one who knows of Shizuka's true intentions, and as you observed the dormant Oni, you could only fear the worst. At this time, your mind was in a state of assumptions and verifications, trying to piece all the pieces of the puzzle together. You have no idea how Shizuka intends to betray the Technology Club, but you know that she must be stopped before she unleashs the Oni onto the streets of Tokyo.

Shizuka then turned around, and left the chamber, possibly to resume blending in with the Technology Club. At the same time, you had some time to counter Shizuka's intentions. Of course, all this will have to wait until you can re-establish contact with your allies. Safely inside Shizuka's breast pocket, you started planning.

"HEY! HIROKI!" A male voice called out from behind. You turn around, and you see it's your best friend, Daisuke.

"Hey man!" The two of you met up and did your secret handshake, a symbol of your friendship. Following that, the two of you then continued your way to school.

"I still can't believe that our old school was bought over and merged so quickly."

"Yeah, but I'm not complaining. Since we have merged with a girls' school, I myself am looking forward to getting myself a date too!"

Daisuke and you were both very similar, which may be why the two of you became fast friends since elementary school. Unlike you, Daisuke seems to struggle with schoolwork, but has little trouble approaching girls compared to yourself. The two of you continued talking and walking together all the way to the school grounds.

The school grounds was so big, you could not even put a word to describe it. The school compound also houses multiple blocks as opposed to just one in the past, and much of the school grounds had been refurbished. In the past, this was a prestigous girls' school until for some reason, enrolment declined. As you and Daisuke looked around, it seems that there are more female students than males, even after the M & A scheme. "I knew someone like you would still be around, though I wonder how that dumb Daisuke even made it through selection. Then again, it still gives me another chance to show my superiority around here. Just you wait and see, Iketani!"

"Still as annoying as ever. You never change, Kinugawa!"

Shizuka then walked off, with annoyed looks on Daisuke's face. Nothing eventful happens after finding out your class allocations, and the whole assembly went by quickly. It was soon time for class. Which class first?

Within moments, you were in classroom labelled "Physics Lab" for your first class. By a stroke of luck, you were paired with Daisuke as a partner. You guys were learning about electronics, and your first task involves dismantling an electronic device provided on the desk.

While working on the device, you had not noticed that Shizuka had secretly plugged the device to an electric output, probably waiting for a chance to get back at you. ZZAP!!!

"HIROKI! Are you all right? Speak to me man!" Daisuke said with a panicking tone.

"I'm fine, but I think I need to lie down ... " you said with a very weak tone from the pain.

The physics teacher saw everything, and told Yuriko to take you to the Health Room. Even though a girl was carrying you, the pain from the electic surge was too overwhelming for you to notice.

Inside, after a while, you were placed on a bed, still weary. You had a glimpse of the teacher examining you. Surprisingly, she looked only in her early 20s, and had a well-endowed figure. She had long black hair and very beautiful features on her face.

"So, will he be all right?" Yuriko asked.

"He will be. Though the electric charge was enough to cause pain, I'm quite surprised that he actually managed to take all that and survive. Though not dangerous, that much electric power flowing through your body can kill if it strikes any vital organs. All his organs seem OK, so I'll say no harm done."

"I thought you looked familiar. A member of the honor roll, and studying in a prestigious university. Wait, aren't you studying mechatronics, so how did you end up here?"

"Actually, I was studying biology and human medicine, but I got bored and switched courses ... "

You passed out, unable to continue hearing their conversation. The pain had subsided, but you felt a weird sensation going through your body while sleeping. Though not painful, it still felt a little funny.

You got up after a while. You looked at your watch, and realized you had slept for about two hours. The door opens, and you saw a giant entering the room. You saw the giant's foot coming down towards you, you quickly dodged as the huge foot slammed down inches away from you. You had a look at the shoe, and then looked up. You knew who it was. It was ...
