Fearing the worst, you turned around to have a glance, and to your surprise, you found your legs gone, and only a pool of blood in their place. Minako had bitten your legs right off! You panicked at the loss of your legs, and you let off a shriek of terror.

"AH! AHH ... "

You yelled out in fear until shock kicks in, and your eyes fell white, and you went unconscious, never to awaken. Meanwhile, Minako continues wolfing down the bun, until there was nothing left. Your remains join the chunks of the bun inside Minako's stomach, and to whatever may be in store inside Minako's digestive system, never to see the light of day again.

"Minako, slow down. You must be really hungry!"

"I am, and I just love ham! It tastes so good!"

"You sound just like Hiroki-kun when he eats ham."

"Hiroki-kun, huh? He sounds like a nice person. Maybe next time, we can meet up and chow down on ham together."

(Non-canon ending)
1322312111.title: Bitten In Half!

1322312112.content:
SPLASH!

You fell straight into the glass of water below you, and into the body of water inside the glass. You landed deep, but not too deep to be unable to swim out. You were not the best swimmer, but you were still a decent one, and you were able to swim to the surface.

You came out of the water, and gasped for some air. As you looked up, the sheer height from your position to Minako's chin made you wonder what would happen if the glass of water was not there. Above you, you could see Minako taking huge bites at the bun. Suddenly, you felt glad you had fallen into the water and not the bun, or you will be on a one-way trip into Minako's digestive system.

The rim of the glass was not too high up, so you swam close to the rim, and pulled yourself out of the water. Never in your life would you imagine yourself swimming with your clothes on, and inside a glass of water (to a normal person's perspective). The way down to the table felt like jumping down a high wall, but there was a wet tissue nearby that could help break your fall. Aiming for the moist tissue, you made your jump.

You landed right into the moist tissue, and luckily for you, there was no smell, which means that the liquid in the tissue must be water. You were now on the canteen table, and at your perspective, the table felt like the size of half of Tokyo. Beside you, you could hear the two girls above you having their meals. You wanted to get the attention of at least one of them, but who will it be? Yuriko, or Minako?
1322312112.title: On The Canteen Table

choices: Try And Get Help From Minako (Hopefully)
13223121122.content:
You decided that getting Yuriko's attention would be better, given that you two were childhood friends. You went straight towards Yuriko, sitting right in front of Minako. Yuriko was also having lunch, munching on sandwiches the size of an apartment right above you. The sound of her munching was not as pleasant as it might sound, but there is an indication that she is almost done with her meal. You have to hurry.

However, you were suddenly taken aback when Yuriko suddenly got up of her seat, and the loud voice in the sky saying "See you later, Minako!" followed by another loud voice replying "See you!" back at Yuriko. By the time you reached the edge of the table, you could see Yuriko's huge frame towering over you, as she turned around and got ready to leave. You went for a leap and try to grab whatever you can, be it Yuriko's skirt or legs, but your lack of physical prowess reared its flaws right here. You could almost grab her skirt, but fingers could barely even get a grip on the fabric, before you started plummeting down to the floor.

You could see that you were in for a very nasty landing onto the canteen floor, but you noticed a very strategically placed wet tissue nearby. Mimicing the protagonist from "Ninja's Code", you reached your arms out, and readied yourself for the landing by positioning your body so that your back will land first on the wet tissue. You were lucky that there was a long time frame for you at this size to carry out the Shinko no Hiyaku, or "Faith Leap" and avoid a potential death by falling.

SPLAT!

You landed on the wet tissue safely, and without too much aching on your body, although it was your first time doing this in real life. You could care less about getting yourself dry, as you saw Yuriko's feet moving further and further away. You already knew that if you were to run, you may not catch after her, let alone getting help. On the other hand, you only trust Yuriko enough to help you out in your current state, so it might still be worth risking. Looking back, you noticed that Minako was still there, her feet still firmly on the ground and not moving. You do not know Minako very well, and less about what she might do to you at your size, but it seems she may be your only hope now. You have to decide now. Chase after Yuriko, or return to Minako.
13223121122.title: The Canteen Floor

132231211221.content:
Your best bet was Yuriko, who is the least likely to hurt you at your current size. As if by luck, Yuriko stopped walking. Based on her body language, it looks like her mobile phone rang, and she had to answer it. Now's my chance, you thought to yourself, and started dashing towards her.

You already knew the size difference between you and Yuriko, but you did not care, only that you wanted to get her attention. Your lack of exercise, for once, did nothing to try and stop you (not that it did not try), but as you got closer to Yuriko's legs, your thought was trying to latch onto Yuriko's sock, and then find a way to get her attention. You panted heavily, gasping for air, but you never stopped. Even ignoring the loud thumping sounds of the feet of others, you pressed on.

However, as soon as you got close, Yuriko was done taking with whoever it was on the phone. She slipped her mobile phone back into her skirt pocket, just as you leaped up to try and grab her sock. With one turn of her foot, you made contact with Yuriko's loafer instead of her sock as she started to walk away. There was no way you could latch onto her loafer, and your body was finally cracking under the strain of running so much without sufficient exercise. Helplessly, you watched as Yuriko's massive frame turned around the corner, and walked away, oblivious to your tiny self trying to latch onto her sock and get her attention.

You wearily pressed your head on the cold, hard ground, and silently wept. Why does it always have to be like this, you thought to yourself. Ever since the two of you met as children, your relationship had always been so close, yet so far. Yuriko was very pretty, and she attracted a lot of interest from other guys. However, she had always considered you her best friend, and you remembered the time the two of you had a long chat over the phone after a male friend broke up with her. In contrast, you were pretty much the geeky boy whose only asset was intelligence. You always felt pressured that you were not good-looking enough to try and pursue Yuriko's heart. That long chat over the phone was your best shot, but you blew it by not taking advantage. Now, it feels like fate had just dealt you another blow, in that you were so close to getting Yuriko's attention, but failed in the end.

As you wallowed in both fatigue and self-pity, all you did was lay on the back, looking at the ceiling that appeared like it was several miles high.

"Go ahead! Squish me! Why should I bother? I'm never going to get Yuriko's attention, or her heart! I'm better off dead, and how appropriate for me to die like an insignificant bug!"

A giant shoe appeared in the sky, and looks like it was going to land on you. You simply closed your eyes, and waited for your demise.
132231211221.title: Life's Not Fair

choices: Plan For A Life As A Tiny
Find The Girl Or The Formula For The Potion
1322312112212.content:
You heard a deafening sound of a shoe crashing down, and then, there was silence. Slowly, you opened your eye, and you saw the ceiling of the cafeteria. You were still alive, and the shoe had missed you by a long shot.

"Oh, that's just great! Even fate won't allow me to die!"

You muttered in irritation as you slowly sat up. Yuriko was gone by now, and whoever had the chance to end your life, simply left your tiny body alone. You were still bitter about not getting Yuriko's attention, along with the frustration about your relationship with her, but at this time, it seems like fate had allowed you to live ... for now. Your body was still too weary to run or do anything, but you were still able to leave the cafeteria and head back to the main hallway.

As everybody went back to their respective classes, nobody noticed the tiny guy laying by the side of the hallway. The sound of the giants' footsteps was really uncomfortable to your ears, but at least you were still alive. At this time, you are starting to realize that perhaps not being able to get help is a sign that you are still needed at your size, somehow.

It all traces back to that girl who had dumped the liquid on you, and whatever that liquid was, it shrunk you. You were still unsure how or why such a thing can exist, but if there is a way to shrink someone, you theorized that there must be a way to enlarge someone as well. If there is a possibility of a growth potion, it might be the key to getting you back to normal size. If it does not, you have to start contemplating living your life at this size.

You did not like being small, but if this is what you have to live with for the rest of your life, you decide that you want it to be somewhere safe, and where you can properly survive. Then again, you have no clues on where to find that girl, or even how to concoct that mysterious shrinking liquid, let alone creating one to reverse its effects.

It's your choice.
1322312112212.title: The Shoe Missed You

132231212.content:
You could hear sounds of Minako munching down on something, so you decided against getting out, or you risk being found out or worse, being eaten. Your best bet will be to stay here in the pocket, and wait for the best chance to escape.

However, waiting out was easier said than thought, and you began to feel bored. You remembered the little bulge you felt while falling into the pocket, and you had suspected it was her nipple. Slowly, you gently touched it. Nothing. You started stroking the bulge slowly, like stroking a person's pet. Still nothing. You decided to stroke harder, and if still nothing, you will give up. You place your hands on the bulge again, and started moving it about like soldiers doing log exercises during training.

You could hear some giggling sounds from above, and you know that your host has felt your "actions". You wanted to "play" some more, what you heard made you change your mind.

"Ack! What's tickling me? I knew I should have worn a bra today!"

She was obviously muttering in a low tone, as her voice was not booming at all. However, you did not have much time to do anything else, as you saw two log-sized fingers entering the pocket, and started feeling about inside the pocket. Minako must be trying to locate the source of the itch. You have to avoid the fingers and not let Minako catch you, so you slowly crept about behind the fingers until they gave up. Were you lucky to escape?
132231212.title: Pocket Probe

1322312121.content:
Minako's fingers probed about in the pocket, while you tried your best to avoid them. Eventually, you could see the two log-sized fingers leaving the pocket. After seeing the fingers gone, you finally heaved a huge sigh of relief. If you were caught there and then, it would be embarrassing and stupid.

However, you decided against playing with the bulge anymore, as it was confirmed that it WAS her breast nipple (she had forgotten to wear a bra), and touching it again will bring the two fingers back into the pocket, and you might not be as lucky the next time.

Still, there was hardly any options left for you to do. Jumping out of the pocket will be too dangerous, and you risk the dangers of being only half an inch tall. Staying in here also made you bored, since "playing" with the bulge is simply too dangerous. There was really nothing left for you to do. You have a tendency of dozing off when you are bored, which is exactly what happened after a while.

"Zzz ... so bored ... "

You were asleep after a while.

===

You awoke after a while, and you find yourself still inside the pocket, although it seems like the bulge is no longer present. You decided to go take a peek and see where you are, but you will stay in the pocket if it is not safe. Imagine your surprise when you find that you are no longer in school, but in what appears to be a teenage girl's room. In addition, Minako had apparently taken off her uniform, and had hung it from a coat rack. There was no sign of Minako anywhere, so you had presumed that she is taking a bath.

Do you want to explore Minako's room, or do you want to play it safe and stay in the uniform pocket?
1322312121.title: Naptime

13223121211.content:
You decide to explore this place for yourself. After all, you might be stuck here for a while, so you might as well get used to your "new" environment. Slowly crawling down the uniform, you made it all the way down towards the skirt, and you noticed how high you are. If you were to fall down, you will surely meet a gruesome end, or so you thought. You closed your eyes, and let go of the uniform, falling straight down onto the floor.

Surprisingly, you landed only with a minor thud, and upon impact, your feet did not feel as painful as you thought. That's when it occured to you: your weight is now proportional to your height, so there is no added weight upon impact. This new discovery now means that you need not worry about jumping down tables or chairs, as you will not feel as much pain as you did before.

Minako's room seemed just like any other teenage girl's bedroom, after a little bit of exploring. You do not know a lot about Minako (even though she is Yuriko's friend), but there are some attributes about her that you know about now. There are rows of CDs near the stereo, and from the looks of it, she listens to them often. There is a laptop on Minako's desk, which she must use for accessing the Internet. Minako is also fond of manga and anime like yourself, after you find an unfinished manga volume on the floor, and noticing a very large white cat plush with a little symbol on its forehead. However, it seems like your time alone may be at an end, as you could hear thumping sounds from behind the door. Minako must be done with her bath, it seems.

Minako opened the door,and you could see her huge stature right in front of you. You could barely see her face, but what she wore was really surprising: a sailor fuku and matching penny loafers. You'd wonder by now if she wore anything but school uniforms.

"I can't believe my old uniform still fits. People will think I'm crazy if I wear this out in public, but I really like this uniform."

She closed her room door, and now believing that she is alone, she started prancing about in her uniform, humming a familiar shojo anime theme song. You wanted to stay and watch her skirt flutter about and exposing her panties, but now you know her "embarrassing" secret, you would do best to get out of here. However, as Minako's feet get dangerously close to your position, does she notice you, or is she too busy prancing about?
13223121211.title: Minako's Room

132231212111.content:
You immediately knew something was up when you had the feeling that someone was watching you. Sure enough, you looked up, and you saw Minako's towering figure looming right above you, and her huge eyes staring straight down at you. You knew the game was up. She has seen you.

"EEK! GROSS! WHAT A HUGE DISGUSTING BUG!"

You wanted to shout "No, wait!", but it was running time when Minako immediately lifted her right foot, and slammed it straight down the next moment. You managed to avoid it, but you knew it was not the end of it. She started taking another step forward, almost smushing you to pulp with her left foot. The sound of the impact between Minako's loafers and the floor is a clear indication that you do NOT want to end up underneath her foot. You could feel her foot coming down again, so you quickly lunged towards the left, avoiding her foot in the process. Quickly, you ran away from the foot, but her foot only shifted towards your direction, and before you knew it, she was using her other foot to stomp on you.

Even though only three minutes have pass since Minako tried to crush you, you felt like you had ran for thirty minutes without stopping. You finally collapsed from exhaustion, and you could see her huge foot looming over you. You crouched into a ball, praying that she is done with stomping, but is she?
132231212111.title: Stomp, Stomp, STOMP!

1322312121111.content:
You heard her huge foot crashing down on the floor. Slowly, you opened your eyes, and looked up. Minako's foot had indeed put her foot down, but strangely only merely an inch away from you. Without thinking, you started to run again, but before you could go any further, you could feel a huge shadown looming over you, and when you turned around to look, it was too late. Minako had reached down with her right hand, and using her fingers, she easily picked you up from the floor, holding only onto your uniform. You have the look on your face, resigned to whatever fate Minako had in store for you.

Minako brought you up close to her eye, and started examining you. It was not long before she knew it was you.

"Hey, I know you! You're that boy in the picture!"

It turns out she recognized you from the web photo Yuriko published on a social networking site, the one with you, Reiko and Yuriko posing by the iconic "109" building in Shibuya.

"Hiroki Iketani, right?"

You gingerly nodded your head as if you are answering her question.

She started looking at you again, and the look on her eye looked very menacing. You have no idea what is going to happen, but you knew it was going to be bad. All this time, you wanted to get her attention to no avail, but now that you got her attention, it appears that it will not end well for you.

"I wonder how a tiny human will taste like ... "

"NO, WAIT! MINAKO-SAN!"

"I'm sorry, Hiroki-kun. Since you now know my dirty little secret, I have no choice but to 'silence' you, lest you reveal my secret to everyone."

You watched in horror as she started opening her mouth, exposing pearly white teeth and a disgustingly slimy red cavern, her tongue resembling a disgusting reddish worm covered in slime. You were already exhausted from the stomping ordeal, but to end up inside Minako's stomach is not something you want. You started struggling, trying to break free from the strong grip of Minako's fingers. Minako's face did not budge, as if she enjoys seeing prey struggling before their end. You struggled with all your might, but will it break you free?
1322312121111.title: Not Safe, Nor Sorry

13223121211111.content:
You were already weak from trying to avoid being squashed by Minako's feet, but struggling to break free from Minako's grip only added to your exhaustion. Finally, you stopped flailing your arms and legs about. You were too tired to even move.

"Are you done?"

You could only watch in horror as you were flung from Minako's fingers, and flying straight into Minako's gaping mouth. Even if you could miraculously turn around, it was too late, as Minako snapped her mouth shut, sealing off any possible attempts to escape. Your already exhausted body could do nothing but plummet down into Minako's stomach, awaiting your fate inside.

You landed head first into the reddish cavern known as the stomach, and landed head first into the pool of acid. You knew that if you stayed too long, you were finished, but the end is already upon you as being too exhausted to even struggle, let alone swim, the acid did not take long to start dissolving your tiny form. You could barely see now, but you could see your uniform dissolving inside the liquid, and not long after that, your flesh. Too weak to even move, you closed your eyes, too weary to even feel the pain as your body gets dissolved inside the acid.

Meanwhile, Minako felt a little regretful for swallowing you, but not for having to kill you, but that the taste only lasted a short while. All she felt was short itch falling down her esophagus, and after that, nothing. However, another thought came into her mind. If you had shrunk, then that must mean that there may be other shrunken boys about. She decided that the first thing she will do tomorrow is to search for shrunken boys, and this time, she wants to savour the taste before swallowing them.
13223121211111.title: Minako's Stomach

13223121211112.content:
Even though you were already getting tired from running away from Minako's feet, being swallowed by her is definitely not something you want to happen. Overcoming your weariness, you kept on struggling even as Minako watched you struggle with a that satisfied look.

However, her grip gradually lessened on your uniform, and after a while, by sheer luck, you managed to wriggle out of Minako's grip. The long fall down onto the floor felt like falling down a skyscraper, but you know the impact once you reach it will not be as hard as if you were normal-sized.

THUD!

You fell onto the floor with only a slight pain on your back, the part which you landed with, but you decided to hide from Minako's sight lest she starts finding you again. Hurriedly, you dashed towards the white cat plush nearby, and hid behind it before you could hear loud footsteps. Minako was on the hunt for her "prey". You stayed still and did nothing, not even going for a sneeze or a cough. Even though your voice is barely audible to her ears, you do not want to trigger anything towards you.

"GRR!!! WHERE DID HE GO?"

After a while of searching, Minako finally gave up looking for you. With an irritated grunt, she walked towards the door, and left the room, slamming the door hard in the process. Behind the white cat plush, you heaved a sigh of relief to avoid being eaten. However, now you must plot your next course of action. You can go back and hide in the school uniform pocket, or do you want to escape from the small hole in one corner?
13223121211112.title: Freedom!

132231212111122.content:
You were not going to take any chances with Minako any more, and the small hole looks like your ticket out of this giantess' room. Without her inside the room, now was your chance to escape. Hurriedly, you ran towards the small hole, and went through it, not stopping to look back lest Minako returns and tries to stomp you again.

The hole led out towards the front yard of Minako's house. You saw the paved road leading towards the outside, and you took it, crawling out underneath the gate. You quickly ran behind the outer wall, and stayed there, away from any human eyes. Only then did you finally heave a sigh of relief. That was a close call, and you had thought that you were a goner when Minako spotted you. At your current size, almost everyone will be seeing you as a bug, so you thought that you will want to avoid any human contact until you were back to normal size.

Unfortunately, you suddenly realized that you were in unfamiliar territory. This was not your neighborhood, as the houses certainly looked a little more 'high-class' than the ones you remembered. No matter which direction you went, you can only confirm one thing: you will get lost.

Your stomach started growling, and then you remembered the bento that Yuriko had packed for you. It had gone cold, but it was your personal favorite: chicken chunks in sauce with rice. You remembered when Reiko had her first cooking attempt, sometime after your mother resumed her career as a fashion designer. It was the same dish, but because the meat was under-cooked, you remember that you were stuck in the bathroom for the rest of the night. Still, Reiko had improved significantly, enough that Yuriko, who was three years her senior, turned to her to ask for cooking tips when her own parents started travelling for work reasons. Food had never tasted so good, you thought to yourself as you placed a spoonful of rice covered with gravy inside your mouth.

The meal was satisfying, you thought to yourself, letting off a burp in delight. However, it seems like there was no time to relax, as you heard the sound of a door opening and closing, followed by the sound of footsteps. Cautiously, you looked from behind the wall.

It was Minako.

You looked at her in both awe and terror, considering this was the person who almost crushed you to death before. She wore a bright orange dress, bright red sandal high heels, and carried a red purse inside her hands. Curiously, she did not move, as if she was waiting for someone. Ironically for you, if there was anyone that could get you out of here, it was Minako. You knew it was suicide to get Minako's attention again, but if she did not notice you, you could always easily ride between her toes until you were in familiar territory, assuming she goes there. Then again, perhaps you can return back to the house and hide out somewhere until she gets back.

It's your call.
132231212111122.title: The Ayasegawa Yard

1322312121111221.content:
If she never notices you, then you were safe, you thought to yourself. Slowly, you approached Minako's enormous frame, being very careful for her not to notice you. Luckily for you, her mobile phone started ringing, and she answered it. Her voice and conversation were barely audible to your ears, but you were not after her attention. While she was busy, you slowly crept up towards the opening revealing the toes on her right foot, and crawled in.

Minako's choice of footwear contrasted heavily with Yuriko's. You have been to Yuriko's house multiple times, and you noticed that none of Yuriko's shoes were open-toed. Yuriko had always said that she never liked showing her feet, preferring covered shoes. Earlier, when you were escaping, you caught a glimpse of the rack of sandals and open-toed shoes on the shoe rack in the distance. Judging from the style of housing and clothing, Minako was definitely from a wealthy family, and those shoes might have been a sign of flaunting her wealth and taste.

Minako hung up her phone. Luckily for you, before she could look down at her feet, a large red sports car pulled up on the road. The sound of the engine drove an aural spear inside your head, and you had to cover your ears and eyes in both pain and discomfort.

"YUICHI!"

Minako exclaimed, driving another aural spear into your head. The car pulled up beside her, and Minako climbed inside it, oblivious to the tiny passenger riding on her right foot.

"You're late, Yuichi! You know how much I hate waiting!" Minako said, talking to the immense form of a man driving the vehicle.

"Sorry, my honey!" The man, identified as Yuichi, apologized. You watched from Minako's shoe as the large shoe dropped down on the pedal, and the two were off.

You did not bother too much about the two giants and their conversation above their heads, and the engine noise practically drowned out the chatter they had. However, you could still identify some of the topics they were talking about. You can very much confirm that Yuichi was Minako's boyfriend (despite their age gap), and that both of them were from wealthy families, and they were going on a date. This explains Minako's attire, and even though she looked really good, her nearly killing you back in her room made you very cautious about coming in contact with her.

The car finally pulled to a stop, and the couple arrived at ...
1322312121111221.title: Minako's Date

13223121211112211.content:
The car finally stopped moving, and the giant couple exited from the car. As Minako got off the car, you found yourself in some indoor parking lot. It did not seem familiar at first, but when the couple started walking further inwards, where the bright lights were, you finally remembered where you were: the newly opened mall.

You remembered the first time you were here, and though you wanted to just bring Yuriko here, Reiko insisted on tagging along. You did not mind spending time with your younger sister, but you had really wanted the chance to just be with Yuriko. Your first time here was uneventful, to say the least, as all you guys did was to grocery shopping followed by an ice cream treat.

Speaking of an ice cream treat, that was precisely what Yuichi gave to Minako. A white drop of melted cream fell from Minako's cone, and landed close to your position. You were tempted to lick it, but the giant couple started walking again, moving away from the drop. You cursed underneath your breath, but at the same time, thankful that neither of the giant couple saw you.

Yuichi then took Minako to a clothing store. You had overheard the couple saying that Minako wanted another dress for some event organized by her father in a few weeks, so that was no surprise. The giant couple browsed around the clothing store, with Minako picking up several dresses from the racks. She then excused herself, and headed towards the changing room.

As the door closed shut, you quickly got away from her foot, and just in time as Minako started removing her sandal heels. Luckily for you, she was too engrossed with trying on the outfits to notice the tiny passenger that had hitched on her foot. As Minako continued to try on the dresses, she failed to notice her original orange dress falling off the coat hook, and onto the floor ... right where you were positioned. Your surroundings was nothing but orange now. You struggled to try and get to a safe corner and wait for Minako to put on her shoes again, but her dress made it difficult to move, let alone see, where the exit was.

Minako then noticed that her orange dress had fallen off the coat hook. She crouched down, and started to pick it up. As the unending stretch of orange cloth gets removed from your head, you sprinted away underneath the cover, and towards her sandal heels. Minako turned her head around, but did she notice you?
13223121211112211.title: Trip To The Mall

132231212111122112.content:
You started placing your hands over your face as Minako's gigantic frame crouches down, with her huge hand coming down, looking like it might grab or squash you underneath it. The hand crashes down, and it was a while before you opened a small peek hole between your fingers. Luckily for you, Minako reached for something that looked like a bright metallic pin with her fingers, and promptly picked it up, completely oblivious to the tiny person that had taken cover underneath her dress.

As Minako got changed back to her original dress, you quietly crawled back to her shoe, sticking to the left side this time. Minako slipped her sandal heels back on again, still oblivious to the tiny passenger by her toes. Minako left the changing room, taking the dresses with her, probably with the intention to buy it.

You looked up and grumbled as you noticed Yuichi's massive frame handing a credit card to the cashier by the counter, upon which Minako gently pecked him on the cheek. For a geeky person like you, someone like Yuriko seems like an incompatible match, and a lot of people have given you crap for hanging around her, even though you two were childhood friends. As such, you find it uncomfortable to show your affection for her, and in turn, hard to confess without making you either a laughing stock or marked by jealous males wanting a shot at earning Yuriko's love.

After some shopping, the couple (and you in tow) headed towards one last stop: the arcade. The din surrounding the area was so uncomfortable that it made your head hurt, forcing you to cup your ears. Hurriedly, you reach in your pocket, and to your relief, you found a piece of tissue that you may have forgotten about. You tore the tissue in two, roll each torn piece into a ball, and then placed a ball in each ear. It was not much, but at least the sound was not as painful as you had before.

With the noise problem dealt with, looking around was much easier now. You looked around, but the couple walked so fast that you could barely make out any of the towering figures above you. The couple then stopped at what appears to be a city-sized air hockey table to you. Yuichi went to the opposite way, and after a while, faint sounds of crashing sounds were heard, presumably the couple had started playing.

As the couple continued their game, you hopped off Minako's foot and looked around some more. It took a while before you noticed a very familiar pair of legs and shoes wearing a very familiar pattern of socks. Immediately, you knew who it was: Yuriko.

The couple were still engrossed in their game, but you had no idea how long before either call it quits and left. Then again, if the pair of legs really was Yuriko, your chances of survival are much higher compared to Minako, who had tried to kill you when she thought you were a bug.

You had to make your choice before you get lost, alone and tiny on the arcade floor. Stay with Minako's toes, or go after Yuriko (presumably)?
132231212111122112.title: Trip To The Mall (Continued)

13223121211112212.content:
The car finally stopped moving, and the giant couple exited the car, with Minako unknowingly carrying you on her right shoe. As she stepped out of the car, you caught a glimpse of where they had arrived: a very high-class restaurant in the Shibuya district of Tokyo. The pair started walking towards the door, and the sound of the giants' footsteps made you really uneasy.

The giant couple were then led towards a table for two, and then sat down. High above the table, they started talking, and you decided to leave Minako's shoe for now. All you could see from underneath the table were multiple pairs of legs, as the giants and giantesses walked and talked above you. You looked at yourself, still wearing the school uniform that had shrunk with you. If you were to grow right now, you will stick out like a sore thumb. In addition, you have no idea what Yuichi will do to you if you had embarrassed him on his date.

The giant couple continued talking about stuff while you stayed underneath the table, awaiting the moment when these two finally leave. You felt like you had made a bad decision by following the couple to the date, as it appeared to be no one available to help. Of course, most of it was because you had been staying hidden from sight. You thought about wanting to venture out, but the giant feet slamming about on the floor made you very uneasy. Then again, waiting for the giant couple to finally leave might take a while, and there was nothing you could do while you wait.

It's your call.
13223121211112212.title: At A Fancy Restaurant

1322312121111222.content:
Suddenly, there was a loud sound that irritated your ears, causing you to clasp your ears. It turned out to be Minako's mobile phone, and she answered it. Barely recovering from that aural din, you quickly sneaked back into the house, avoiding Minako's feet in the process. You traced your steps back towards the hole, and as you approached the hole, you noticed a red sports car pulling up. Minako got inside the car, and in a few seconds, they were gone.

You knew that it will be a while before Minako gets home, but you also know that you want to find a hiding spot where she cannot find you. Your intention is to get back to school the next day, and find someone else to help instead of Minako. With that, you crawled through the hole, and back in familiar grounds: Minako's room.

You heaved a sigh of relief that nobody was home. You remembered the white cat plush that you hid from Minako's stomping, and gently stroked the fur. Then, you noticed the tag, on it its purchase price. 4800 yen. If you were going to spend that much money for Yuriko, you knew it had to be a birthday gift. Even though your father is a successful manga artist and your mother a fashion designer, they were always cautious when it comes to money despite their steady incomes. The most they will splurge on is on a family vacation, and even then, the furthest you had ever been was Seoul, when you were only 9 years old. The wealth disparity between your families presented itself in the form of a white cat plush.

Minako had hung her uniform, and at your current size, there was no way you could go back and hide in there any more. You noticed Minako's bag, and to your disappointment, no openings. All had been zipped tightly, and your tiny frame was too small to even grab it, let alone pull it. You will have to wait until morning, and hope that Minako opens her bag sometime for you to sneak in and hide out until you get to school.

While you wait, you noticed the manga tome that Minako had left lying on the floor. Despite its size, the page was actually light enough for you to flip the pages (though it was still too heavy for you to carry to a safe location). Surprisingly, it was one of your Dad's old works, 'The Alien Girlfriend'. You remembered your Dad doing a one-shot manga about a shoujo (girls) story, and this must probably be the one. While you waited for Minako to return home, you decided to have a look at one of your Dad's works.

Several hours went by until you heard the same engine sound pulling up from outside. This was followed by the jingling of keys from outside the house. Quickly, you stopped reading the manga, and ran back behind the white cat plush, as you heard footsteps approaching the room. The door opened, and ...
1322312121111222.title: Hiding Out In Minako's Room

13223121211112221.content:
... your "hostess" enters her room, tired but with a pleasant look on her face. You stayed at your hiding spot, making sure Minako does not see you, lest she tries to crush you again. Minako closed the door, and then started stripping, removing the orange dress she had worn, revealing her reddish bra and panties underneath. You immediately close your eyes and look away, the sight of Minako in her undies was certainly tempting, but you also knew that leaving your hiding spot will lead to certain death. You turned back towards the light, opening a small peephole with your fingers even as you covered your eyes.

Minako then started to take off her bra, unknowingly exposing her bare breasts to a tiny "guest" hiding underneath her desk, and tossed it to the ground. You found it strange that Minako started stripping before heading to her dresser, but that was what she did. Minako pulled out a similar set of red undies, and then started taking off her panties. For a brief moment, you were probably the first man to have seen Minako naked, with full view of her womanhood, before she slipped on a cleaner pair of panties, followed by the bra.

Minako let off a yawn, which felt like the sound of a jet flying above your head to your ears, and then proceeded to switch off her room lights before slumping onto her bed. It was not long before you heard snoring noises coming from the bed, which felt like a bunch of trains slowly pulling out of a station to you. It was only now did you feel safe enough to crawl out of your hiding spot. You noticed the bra and panties that had been left on the floor. It disgusted you a little to see Minako just chuck her brasserie on the floor and expect the maid to pick it up later. You slowly approached the brasserie. Minako was not Yuriko, but judging by the cup size, seems like both of them had similar bust sizes.

As Minako continued to sleep, you approached her brasserie, ready to explore it further, and then you noticed her purse strewn on the floor. You could choose to hide in it instead and hope that Minako will pick it up and bring it to school, as unlikely as that sounded.

What will you do?
13223121211112221.title: Spending The Night At Minako's

choices: Stay And Watch The Drama Unfold
Get The Hell Out Of Here
13223121211112222.content:
"Urgh ... Yuichi ... let go of me! I can walk by myself!"

You recognized the voice as Minako's, and as the door opened, you noticed the giant frame of Minako being held by a guy, presumably named Yuichi based on what she said.

"You've been stumbling ever since you got to the car! There's no way I'm letting you walk home like this," Yuichi said, as he gently sat Minako down on her bed, while you watched everything from behind Minako's white cat plush. "Geez, it was just one whiskey bon-bon chocolate! How did you get drunk like this?"

"Yuichi ... do you like me?" Minako asked. You watched the drama unfold, but chose to stay put. Minako was already pretty dangerous when sane, so there was no telling what she'll do to you in her current drunken state.

"Get some rest, Minako," Yuichi dodged the question. "You're drunk."

However, as he turned around and prepared to leave, he felt Minako's arms wrap around him. Minako, although still drunk, had that look on her face.

"Do you like me, Yuichi?" Minako sounded slurry. "I know you've been seeing Yuko behind my back, you two-timer!"

"We were just discussing homework," Yuichi pleaded. "You know I wouldn't do anything behind your back."

"Yuichi! You liar!" Minako then forcefully dragged Yuichi onto the bed, and even though their voices was booming inside your ears, you still could not help but observe. Minako was surprisingly strong to be able to drag Yuichi onto her bed, and then force herself onto him.

"Minako? What're you doing?" Yuichi's voice certainly did not hide his fear of Minako, especially in her drunken stupor.

"I'm going to make you mine! Tonight!" Minako declared. "I'm going to make sure Yuko can never, ever take you away from me!"

"Minako! No! Don't do this!" Yuichi was frightened now as Minako started to take her dress off in front of him, revealing her bra and panties. The sight before you was stimulating your senses hard, and you could feel your heart thumping as you watched the drama of these two giants unfold.

"You like me now?" Minako asked. "You're the first person who has ever seen me like this! You should feel honored to see the heiress of the Ayasegawas in her bra and panties."

Not quite, Minako, you thought to yourself. I had seen them, albeit unintentionally.

"Yes! I like you! I like you!" The fear in Yuichi's voice seemed to escalate the more he spoke, as he is fully aware of the consequences if anyone caught him like this. "I beg you, please! Just, get some rest!"

"Oh ho ... now you're begging me?" Minako got up, but she still had Yuichi pinned under her legs. Then, she noticed Yuichi's pants. "Hu hu hu ... you must have quite the goods down there! Now ... let me have a good look at them ..."

"Minako! No! I'll be the one in trouble, not you!" Yuichi exclaimed as Minako's hands reached for his pants. "Please, just let me go now!"

"Huh? Let you go?" Minako answered. "I already told you: I ain't letting you leave until I make sure Yuko can never, ever, take you away from me!"

"Alright! Alright! You win! You want to do this, fine!" Yuichi exclaimed. "But I ask you, just get off me. I'll take off my pants!"

"And let you run away?" Minako said. "No way! You take your pants off right here, right now!"

Yuichi had the look of surrender on his face as he reached for his pants buckle and loosened it. Maybe he had regretted going out with Minako, or maybe he did get seen with this Yuko girl, but whatever it is, it seemed like he had given up with convincing Minako to just let him go in her current drunken state. Carefully, he pulled his pants off his legs, allowing them to fall down as they reached his knees, letting gravity do the work.

"Hu hu hu ... it's just as I expected," Minako said, as she saw the bulge coming out of Yuichi's briefs. Then, she placed her hands behind her back, and from your view, you could see her unfasten her bra, before she took it in her hands, exposing her bare breasts to Yuichi. She then threw the bra aside, and it landed just a short distance away from our position near the white cat plush.

"Do you like my breasts, hmm?" Minako asked seductively, while Yuichi looks on with a strange mixture of horror and pleasure. "Much bigger and natural than Yuko's, no?"

"Yes ..." Yuichi had an answer so soft that it sounded natural to your ears.

"Now, to take it all off ... starting with you, Yuichi!"

A part of you wanted to stay and watch this drama continue, but another part of you has had enough, and just want to get out of here. While you and Yuichi were complete strangers, you cannot help but wonder if he even deserved this treatment. But then again, staying around could potentially scar you mentally for life, regardless of what she does.

It's your call.
13223121211112222.title: A Dangerous Situation

1322312121112.content:
You crouched into a ball, and prayed that she does not stomp you. Unfortunately for you, curling yourself into a ball may be the stupidest thing you have ever done. By stopping, you had given away your position to Minako, and as the bug you were to her eyes, you were finished.

Minako placed her huge shoe down on you, which felt like a heavy pile of bricks dropping right on you. There was no time to flee or panic, as the huge shadow of Minako's shoe immediately engulfed you, and the next thing you knew, she dropped her huge foot on you.

Unable to cope with Minako's weight which she exerted on her foot, there was nothing you can do but brace yourself for what is about to happen. As the pressure from her foot starts to kick in, you could feel every bone in your body crack, and blood vessels bursting. The pain from your cracking bones and blood vessels was simply too much, and you whited out, never to awaken. You can call it a merciful departure of sorts, for if you had been conscious all along, you would have met a gruesome and painful death, having to endure shattered bones and blood gushing out of your body from all directions, which was exactly what happened to your corpse in the end.

Minako then removed her shoe to see what she had crushed back then, and saw the pool of blood and the bits of gore left behind. Seemingly remorseless, she simply wiped your remains off her floor and dumped them inside the trash. As for the blood on her shoe, she did not seem troubled, as a simple wash will remove te blood stains, destroying any remnants to indicate you had existed or the terrible fate you had met below the foot of this giantess.
1322312121112.title: Flattened!

132231212112.content:
Her massive feet pounded the carpet floor loudly, approaching you with at a menacingly fast pace. Trembling with fright, you watched in fear as she lifts up her large foot, and hovers it over you.Quietly, you closed your eyes, and feared the worst.

BOOM!

For a while, it felt that her shoe was so close to you. However, as you opened your eyes, imagine your surprise when you notice how close her shoe was to your tiny body. That was too close, you thought to yourself. You know that the next time, she might actually step on you for real, so you quickly got away from Minako, and ran towards the huge desk near the edge of Minako's room. Quickly, you hid behind one of the huge legs, and watched as Minako continued her silly prancing. You were lucky to escape back then, as you saw her foot slam down on your original position. If you had stayed there, you would have ended up as a bloody red stain on the carpet floor.

Eventually, Minako gave up prancing about. She then walked towards her stack of manga volumes, and picked up one book fro the stack, the book like the size of an apartment. She then walked towards her desk, and then sat down on the chair nearby. You were still at the desk watching as she walked towards the desk, and sat her huge frame on the nearby chair. As she sat down and started reading the volume, you stayed where you are, looking at her huge feet nearby.

You were never a fan of feet, but there was something about Minako's feet there that aroused your "interests" a little. Minako was still reading her book, and for some reason, she started taking her right foot off her shoe, only so slightly. However, as time passed, she kept on moving her right foot in and out of the shoe. You don't know why, but the sight of Minako's foot slipping in and out of the shoe had really got you turned on. Do you want to join in by entering the shoe, or do you think this is a bad idea?
132231212112.title: Shoe Play

133.content:
Regardless of whatever that liquid that caused your shrinking effect, you know that you have to get back to class. You crawled underneath the cubicle door, and headed towards the main door. It was after you saw the door did you realize how small you were now. The main door itself was as tall as the Tokyo tower, and luckily for you, leaving the toilet does not involve any climbing; you simply crawled through the door gap.

The small concrete cracks on the floor now felt like fissures to you, and you don't want to get stuck in them, especially when people start walking around. You carefully made your way on the floor, avoiding the cracks as you go. You walked on until you saw another door, and after squinting your eyes to have a look, you realize that it was the ladies' bathroom. You looked back, and the distance between both bathrooms seemed like a walk from your house to the convenience store a few blocks away.

There was not much time to think, as you could hear loud thumping sounds from a distance. What was it?
133.title: Going Back To Class?

choices: Wait For Her To Come Out
1331.content:
The thumping sounds got louder and louder, like a stampede of horses and cattle together. As you could see a face in the distance, you knew who it was: Hitomi Kawasaki, Shizuka's best friend. While she hangs around with Shizuka, Hitomi is not as mean as her friend, from your knowledge. While you know she can help you, it will have to wait as she is running straight towards you!

You lunged away, narrowly avoiding her large feet pounding away on the floor. The sound of her feet pounding was unbearable, but at least you managed to avoid death.

"BATHROOM!"

You saw Hitomi's massive form push the door to the ladies' bathroom, enter, and the door slamming shut with a loud thud. After that, you could hear footsteps moving about frantically inside. You were not surprised, as Hitomi had always been putting weird things inside her mouth, mostly goaded by Shizuka. From bugs, weird liquids, exotic "food", Hitomi had "tasted" them all, and you were surprised that after all that, all she gets are upset stomachs.

There is the risk that Hitomi might swallow you if she sees you, but then again, at this time, some help is better than none. You could enter the bathroom and try and find Hitomi, wait for her to come out and try and get her attention. Then again, Hitomi might just make things worse for you, and maybe getting her help might be the worst decision you make in your life. What will you do?
1331.title: Hitomi Needs To Go

13312.content:
You decide to wait for Hitomi to come out, and maybe hitch a ride on her shoe. It might not be the most comfortable way of transport (especially for your ears), but it beats walking around in your tiny form. You waited by the bathroom door, and you could hear Hitomi's voice from behind. It sounds like she had a bad case of the runs, probably caused by what she ate.

Soon, you could hear flushing sounds, and you could tell Hitomi is done with her "business". You stood up, and got ready. Sure enough, Hitomi opens the bathroom door, and her giant loafer crashes right down in front of you. Ignoring the loud crashing sound, you scrambled up her shoe, and grabbed hold before Hitomi starts walking again, lest you fall off.

You managed to climb onto the top of Hitomi's shoe, and from there, you were temporarily safe, minus the stamping of her feet on the floor. With such an "opportunity", you decide to have a look up Hitomi's skirt, but the movement of her towering legs did not help much. As Hitomi walked on, all you could do now is go with the flow, going where Hitomi is walking to.

Hitomi is going ...
13312.title: Shoe Ride

15.title: Creative Choice

info.brief_description: Another school shrink story. GP for additions.
info.description:
UPDATE: I'm not exactly pleased with how this story is going, so I'm going to rewrite this story all over again from scratch. I apologize to those who had added to my story, but I really wish to rewrite it from the beginning. GP points will still be awarded for additions.

This can be considered a prelude to my previous story, Shrunk In Japan.
Link: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1502010

It is your first day at school in semi-futuristic Japan. Under weird circumstances, you have shrunk and now you must find a way to get back to normal, avoiding the perils of the tiny kind. Can you survive?

Characters:
Hiroki Iketani (main character) A 2nd year high school student being dragged into an upcoming mess. Physically weak but very intelligent.
Yuriko Takamoto Hiroki's childhood friend, knows each other like the backs of their hand. 2nd year high school student, borderline C-cup breasts, short hair, slim but not considered "hot".
Reiko Iketani Hiroki's sister, 1st year middle school student. Mature and serious for her age. Takes care of the house. No exact measurements yet.
Shizuka Kinugawa 2nd year high school student, your nemesis. A social butterfly with a mean streak. Full C-cup breasts, long hair, figure like a model.
Hitomi Kawasaki 2nd year high school student. Shizuka's best friend and lackey. Medium C-cup breasts, but excellent figure.
Motoko Kijima Temporary worker at school, serving as the school nurse. Figure similar to Shizuka, but is much nicer.
Mikako Nagama 2nd year student, student council member. Not snobbish compared to Shizuka or Miki. Petite size and average figure. B-cup breasts.
Hiroshi and Shuhei Yamamoto Neighbors and close guy friends. Hiroshi is a 3rd year student while Shuhei is a 2nd year student. They love their bikes.

RULES:
1. As much as possible, try not to kill off Hiroki.
2. No one-liner or two-liner chapters. Be creative, add more. GP for good additions.
3. Nothing gay or lesbian.
4. HAVE FUN!
